6Rumxiikastsi tkachi yatnaka. Rukshikna pimrine tunwanatachine, mkamrurewatkane. Wane chinna, ‘¿Klu chinanu gewi psolgogneko ntunwashgognenata?’
 
7“Wane chinruna, ‘Gi rixanu gi satuna kamrurewjixwu.’
“Wane chinna, ‘Gajewa gixa koxa. Nusanate gyanu.’
 
8“Wa kayi rixinitka kgisanateru wane chinru girukotlewjixanru, ‘Ptomganna kamrurewatachine. Pwenutanutkana kamrurna wenru. Gapkatatachine pyinuwaka wenutletanu, ga wa muchichachinpotunanuko.’
 
9“Rapokna wa rumxiikastsitka tkachi yinuwaka kamruretachine. Pamoleproji satkaka yoptota. 
10Rapookoxna muchi kamrurewletachine. Kagwaka yoptoretluna wanna pnute. Ga wa wanna koxa satkaka pamoleproji yoptota. 
11Rawatkalona. Kegemgayegitluna wa kgisanateru. 
12Wane chinna, ‘Wa nyi gapkatatachine pshinitsonu kamrurewtapna. Ga wa wixako pixka pixna, wa gakota salewnalgognenatachinwu ga wa gemeru.’
 
13“Wa wale gigita. Wane chinru satu wannate, ‘Nomole, gi wa mpoyagkaakotu nixyi. ¿Gi ge pupiratyano pamoleproji chinanu? 
14Ga ga pixanu pwanutka. Pyanutka. Naluka genekletkoxlu wa tye gapkatatachri pixako pixka. 
15¿Gi ge munanshichkotni wa nkamrutanru wa nalukyawaka gita wa gitanuya? ¿Waka ksotanuygalegolyi gi rixanu kiglerno gita?’
 
16“Wane rixanna muchichachine. Wannapni gapkatatachinpatka. Ga wa gapkatatachine, wannapni wa muchichachinpatka. Gi rixanu gixolunni wa tomgakalune, ga wa gi gixpotna wa tsomitkalune.”
 
17Gerosale kanikinpatka Geso, pamole gepi yimaklene kegnetetamnugapo ranikna. Wane chinna, 
18“Xani Gerosale wkanikanutka, ga wa Gita Yineru Wgenno samyookalurpatkano tsrukakalune sasertotene yegi, ga wa yonchikgapine yegi. Ruklukanuwnayegjixannona nupninripa. 
19Payineko yegi samyokannona yenetyapnona, kochipjetyapnona, koroshishkita rutakyapnona. Seyni mapgogne chininri nyotunkaako.”
 
20Giyagni tyayegitlu Sewereyo wgenene ginro twugeneneyma. Tyoptsojityegitlu. Pagixanu tagjitlu.
 
21Wale wane chinro, “¿Klu paluka?”
Wala wane chinru, “Wane pchinanu tuplatinripna nyi gepi nwugenene satu potuklesretate ga wa satu pkegnetesretate pogirewatyawakaya.”
 
22Wane chinna Geso, “Gi gimata wa gixa gagjitanru. ¿Gimkatge giiretyalo wa girapistono wa Gita girinro? ¿Gimkatge gkatletikolu wa katlu wa Gita katikolu?”
Wanna wane chinru, “Wumkatlu.”
 
23Wane chinna, “Wa girapistono nurapre girini. Wa katlu wa Gita katikolu wale koxa gkatikolupa. Seyni wa tuplalu npotuklesretate, wa nkegnetesretate gi wa Gitanni nenekyaplu, ga wa wannanupni galpokyegitkalunepni Nuru chinanu.”
 
24Wa pamole yijnakotinri, rumtuwnana wa gepi moletkakachine chinanu. 
25Geso tomgana. Wane chinna Wale, “Gimata wa tsrukakalune payineko yegi towutlewpotutna. Wanna gitsrukatene tsru gitaaka wanna chinanu. 
26Seyni gi wane gixkakanu, seyni girukokta galuka tsru gixletnachriwa gixyegkakluko walepni wa gipxakjerupa. 
27Girukokta gixyegkakluko galuka muchinanu gixletnawa, walepni gwayegrerupa. 
28Gita pixka wa Yineru Wgenno gi nuna nupxakikolupa, seyni nupxaklewatinripa, nenekyaplu nuwekinri nwenutyaplu ruspakinripna gixolune yine.”
 
29Geriko yamtyatkana. Gixolune yine gomkagitlu. 
30Gepi maygalene gatnugapostsi tuplatachine, wa yijnakotinitkana wa Geso giknoginritka, wane china sapletna, “Gitsrukaachi, Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanunwu.”
 
31Gixolune yine chigetjetna pochke rixinripna, seyni wanepnute saplewjetna, “Gitsrukaachi Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanunwu.”
 
32Wa Geso tunwata. Tomgana maygalene. Wane chinna, “¿Klu galukatka wa nixyapgi?”
 
33Wane chinruna, “Gitsrukachi, Wumrekgatinripa.”
 
34Giyagni Geso getwamonutna. Kamrukaygaletna. Wanekluyakawa retatkana. Romkagitatkaluna.
1Kayegikatkaluna Gerosale. Wetpage yana, Goliwa Magkateya. Giyagni Geso yokanatna gepi yimaklene. 
2Wale wane chinna, “Tujra pokchi wunaple gyanu. Wane gikshikinro mporo kwugenero tsatkaluro, twugeneyma. Gkoshpirokanro. Ganikyegitanno. 
3Girukokta wane chininipgi, ‘¿Klu chinanu gkoshpiroklo?’ Wane nchinanu, ‘Gitsrukaachi galukna. Waneklutka satkakjixanna mporone.’ ”
 
4Ptowruko wa tye wane gixkalurni wa poyagkakikolupa wa tokanchi geneklewatachri chinyawaka. Wane china:
 
5 Wane pchinanro Gerosale, wa Siyo nshicho, 
 Petanru Pogire punyegitjeru. 
 Mayogotu, mporotji tuplatachri, 
 ga wa mporo wgenetji. 
 Walenwa prachi kgitjiklero wgene. 
 
6Ga wa yimaklene wane ya. Wa Geso china towutyawakpotukna rixna. 
7Rawpatkalona wa mporo ga wa twugene. Sapowakatjitatkalona gimkaluyma. Wanna gogo tuplamta. 
8Gixolune yine potu gikwekamkata gatnugapoya. Pimrine gistaklu gagmunasurkaka. Rukwekluna gatnugapo 
9Gixolune kosekamtachine ga wa kaptomtachine saplewjenanumta. Wane chinananumtna:
 “¡Wuya, Tawiklopisha! 
 ¡Gimalwutkaluru ginachri Gitsrukaachi giwakaya! 
 ¡Wuya tengognepotuya!” 
 
10Wa Gerosale rapokamtinitka, psolu pokchi gajeneko gimyeka. Wane chinna, “¿Katni wa tye?”
 
11Ga wa gixolune wane china, “Tyenwa Geso, Nasare Kalilesreta giyakatyachri, tokanchi geneklewatachri.”
 
12Geso jiglokamta kpashiwakapji Goyakalunu. Ruknokna pejnuruneko kgishanrewaklerunni gagjijetachinni kpashiwakapjiya. Yawnajkaklo kwalkaka gipekoserojiprojitachinni, motkoko gishanretachinni tuplapijere koxa. 
13Wane chinna, “Yonatkalurni:
 Wa nopji gagjigognewakapji chinkalurupni. 
Ga wa gixa wane gixatkalu gitawakapna
kachowgurune gwiyawakapna.”
 
14Giyagni kpashiwakapji runyegityaluna maygalene, ga wa myankane. Rutuukakna. 
15Tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa yonchikgapine getlu giglajrukaka Wale kamrutanru. Ga wa mturune retna saplewjetachine kpashiwakapjiya, wane chinachine, “¡Wuya, Tawiklopisha!” Rumtuwnana.
 
16Wane chinruna, “¿Gi ge pjemna wane chinyawakna?”
Geso wane china, “Gigi. ¿Gi ge pagogne getyongatlu: Wa mturunenamaya ga wa gashichachinenamaya puglepotutlu gimalwuru?” 
 
17Ruknokamtna. Tsru pokchi ruyakatya. Wetaniya ya. Wane rawamta.
 
18Goyechnokawpotuko tsru pokchi satokatka. Nachneru. 
19Retlo satopje gikera gatnugapostsi gwachro. Yayegitlo. Gike rukshikyalo. Tosurepjeni. Wane chinro, “Gi pagogneko kajpatkayi.” Wanekluyakawa tuprigamtanatka gikerni.
 
20Yimaklene getlo. Ruglajitna. Wane chinna, “¡Ge! ¡Wanekluyakawa tuprigamtanatka gikerni!”
 
21Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Galikakni wane nchingi, wa kalixlegi gixinipa, gi wa gnutanshinikanutini, gi wa tyepjeni wa gikerapirana wane gixanu, seyni koxa wa tye magka wane nchininiplu gixa, ‘Puxrikanu. Tsru wenu puknokinwa,’ wane rixanu. 
22Wa gagjigognetinipa pejnuruko girukokta gagjita galixinri, gyoptotanru.”
 
23Wa kpashiwakapji yinitka, wa runkaklewanatini, rapyegitluna tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa yine tsrutene. Wane chinruna, “¿Katu gitakyi tyeya?”
 
24Giyagni Geso gigitna. Wane chinna, “Gita koxa gepomgangi satu tokanchiya. Wa ginkakinipno Gita koxa ginkakangi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri. 
25Wa Gwa katlewle ¿ginaka giyakatyachrini? ¿Tengogne waka yinyegiyakla?”
Giyagni wannananuko gishinikanuwata. Wane chinna, “Wane wchininipmaka: Tengogne giyakatyachrini, wane chinanunwu, ‘¿Klu chinanu koxa gi galixlu?’ 
26Wa wane wchininipmaka: Yine yegi giyakatyachrini, gixolune yine wpikanuna. Gi rixanu pejnuruneko kagwaklu Gwa tokanchi geneklewatachri Goyakalunu rixinri.”
 
27Rugitluna Geso. Wane chinruna, “Gi wumata.”
Wale koxa wane chinna, “Gi Gitako ginkakangi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri.”
 
28“Seyni ¿gi pixka getle gixlu gixa? Gepi wgenru satu jeji. Tsru gituru rapyegita. Wane chinru, ‘Wiwi, nusanate nowashate pyanu. Tyegogne wane pkamrurewatini.’
 
29“Wale gigita. Wane china, ‘Gi jmerno.’ Seyni gowukshini renshinikanuta. Wane yatka.
 
30“Gapkatatachri rapyegitatnaka. Waneko pixka chinatnaklu wale. Wale gigita. Wane china, ‘Gitapni, papa.’ Seyni gi wane ya.
 
31“¿Giru wa nyi gepi ruru gishinikanru kamruta?”
Wanna wane china, “Tsru gituru.”
Geso wane chinna, “Galikakni wane nchingi wa gijgawenutachinni, kapoklewaklerone gixa pnute jiglokanna Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka. 
32Gwa ginyegitgi poyagkaklewlugapoya. Gi wa galixlu. Ga wa gijgawenutachine ga wa kapoklewaklerone galixlu. Ga wa gixa getinri gi wa waneklu genshinikanuta wa galixyaplu.”
 
33“Gyijnakotanru satu yapkaklu. Waneru satu jeji kgisanateru. Wale gitaklu sana gowasha. Pirijeretjetlo. Tapgatyawakapa jitota. Tenopjiru kamruta. Renekamtna sana girukotachine. Pnu yatka wajra. 
34Tjirgikolustsitka wayegrene yokanyegitna sana girukotachine yegi rawapyapluna sana gwiyachritka.
 
35“Ga wa sana girukotachine kashichna wayegrene. Satu kochipjetna, ga wa satu ruylatna, ga wa satu sotlujetna. 
36Rumepe yokanretatnakna pimrine wayegrene muchichachine pnute. Waneko pixka rixkanna wannani. 
37Gapkatatachri potu gituru yokanyegitna. Wane china, ‘Kagwakpiratanruna noturu.’ 
38Wa sana girukotachine retinitkaluna gituru, wane chinkakna wannakakluko, ‘Tyenwa yoptotachripa. Wuya. Wuylaganru. Waneyapwu wa yoptotanrupmaka.’
 
39“Kashichanruna. Gowasha ruknokyanruna. Wane ruylatyanruna.
 
40“Giyagni wa kgisanateru gininitka, ¿gi rixanutkana wa wanna sana girukotachine?”
 
41Wane chinruna, “Wa gektune ruylapotutanna. Pimrine girukotachine renekamtanutnaklu sana. Wanna genekanru sana gwiyachritka topapko gapokinitka.”
 
42Geso wane chinna, “¿Gi ge pagogne getyongatlu wa Tokanchi Yonatkaluruya?
 Wa sotlu myoptotkotu kamrupjitachineya 
 Wale gitaaka yoptowaka gitsejita. 
 Gitsrukaachi chinanu kamrutka wa tye. 
 Rakaglajiygaletwu. 
 
43“Giyagni wane nchingi, wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka konkalurupni gixyegiya. Panerune reneeko wa pogirewatyawaka kamrure kamrutachinepa. 
44Katupnikta tye sotlu gitspetanuna rumlokpotutanuna, ramgapotutanuna. Ga wa tye sotlu gijrukgogotanrunapa ramgapotutanuna.”
 
45Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa Gwariseyone yijnakotinitkalu yapkaklukaka Wale chinyawaka, rumatluna wannapirana china yanumsaletinri. 
46Rujgaluna gi rixpoko kashretyapluna, seyni gixolune yine pikna, gi rixanu tokanchi geneklewatachri kagwakyaluna.
1Rugita Geso. Yapkaklu runkakyatnakna. Wane china, 
2“Tengogne pogirewatyawaka satu jeji pixka rixa pogirchi. Kashimyolu kamrutyalu gituru. 
3Wayegrene yokanata tomgiyapna chanixkalune kashimyolu yegi. Seyni gi raluka ginretna.
 
4“Rumepe yokanretatnakna pimrine wayegrene. Wane china, ‘Ginkakapanna chanixkalune, “¡Getanru xani! Ralixatka nnijitu nwakate jejine ga wa nuxowaakakanune giylatkalunetka. Pejnuruko galpokotkalurutkani. Ginanu kashimyolu yegi.” ’
 
5“Wanna gi jemlu, seyni ralimtna. Satu rusanate ya. Ga wa satu marnewjetyawaka ya. 
6Pimrine kashwayegretanruna wale wayegrene. Rektutetkanna ga wa ruylatkanna. 
7Ga wa pogirchi yijnakotinri wa tyepirana, jigekanuwata. Yokanatna solalotene. Ruylajixanna wa nyi kgiylalewaklerunni. Yochpikpokchitanna.
 
8“Giyagni wane chinna wayegrene, ‘Wa kashimyolu galikaka galpokotkalurni, seyni wa chanixkalune gi wa rumuklunina. 
9Giyagni gajewa. Rutspalgapotyawaka gyanu. Nchanixanna ginnakokta gikshikanune, kashimyolu yegi yinripna.’ 
10Yatkana wanna wayegrechine. Wa gatnugapkaka yana. Rapatjemtkana pejnuruneko rukshikanunna mugleneymananuko ga wa kiglerune. Ga wa kashimyolu yegi yomitna nachnewatachine.
 
11“Jiglokamta pogirchi retyapna wa nachnewatachine. Wane retyalu satu jeji kashimyolu getachinemkalu mutaakatu. 
12Wane chinru, ‘Nomole, ¿gi pixpoko jigloklemta gewi wa kashimyolu getachrimkalu mutaakatyi?’
“Seyni wale pochke. 
13Giyagni pogirchi wane chinna wa kamrurewyegitjene, ‘Gostujixitanru, ga wa gostumyotanru. Maleka giknokaganru mapshagawaka.’ Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.
 
14“Gi rixanu gi gepikna chanixkalune, ga wa gi gixna tsomitkalune.”
 
15Giyagni wane yana Gwariseyone. Jemanshinikankakna wa kashtokanutyapluna. 
16Yimaklenna yokanyegitluna Giroreyoneyma. Wane chinna, “Yimaklewatachri, wumatyi Pixni mayrokletu. Galikaka potu punkaklewata Goyakalu gatnugapotepirana. Gike pkagwakpirata, gi rixanu gi putakyagokna jejine. 
17Giyagni punkakanwu. ¿Gi pixka getle pixlu Pixa? ¿Wa munanshichkotnige Goteyone genekyaplu wenrukaka wa Pogirchi Susa waka gike?”
 
18Seyni Geso gimatlu wanna muglenu. Wane china, “Sanowashatachingi, ¿klu chinanu gimlukanutno? 
19Gekakgitanno wa sroschiproji Susa wenutikolupa.”
Ranikyegitluna paproji. 
20Wane chinna Wale, “¿Katunni wa tye yaglu ga wa toyonga?”
 
21Wane chinruna, “Susa yagluni ga wa Susa yongani.”
Giyagni wane chinna, “Giyagni genekanru Susa Susanni, ga wa Goyakalu Goyakalunu.”
 
22Yijnakotinitkaluna, ruglajitna. Kaspukamtatkaluna. Yatkana.
 
23Walegogne rapyegitluna Sariseyone, wane chinachine maleshlu yotunrupa gipnachineya. Repomgaluna. 
24Wane chinna, “Yimaklewatachri, Moysisi wane china: Mwugenetniko gipninina satu, wa repuru gwanro wale gnunronanni, ruxolewnakakinripa giklopishapa yegwakluni chinanupa. 
25Wixa yegi wanena payokgiprerune moletkakachine. Muchinanu tsru gnunrowata. Waleni gipnanuna muknokawgenetkatniko. Repuru gwatnaklo. 
26Waneko pixka rixana gapkatatachrini, ga wa mapa rixinrini, ga wa payokgiprepotunanniko. 
27Pejnurunniko gipnanatka. Tapkata gipukatanatka suxni. 
28Giyagni wa yotunruklupa ¿giru gnunropni wa payokgiprenni gnunronanni? Gi rixanu pejnurunenniko gnunronanni.”
 
29Giyagni rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Gixa pupjeta gi rixanu gi gimatlu wa tokanchi yonatkaluru gi wa Goyakalu giyaklewleko. 
30Gi rixanu yotunruklupa gi wa jejineko gnunrowatanu. Gi wa suxoneko gnuruwatanu, seyni tengogne gajene Goyakalutowrerune pixka rixanutkana. 
31Wa yotunotachinepa gipnachinepirana, ¿gi ge getyongatlu wa tokanchi Goyakalu chinyawakgi? 
32‘Gitni wa Gawra Goyakalute, Gisaka koxa Goyakalute, ga wa Gakowo koxa Goyakalute.’  Gi wa gipnachine Goyakalutni, seyni giwekachine Goyakalute.”
 
33Wa yijnakotinitkaluna gixolune yine, ruglajitna wa runkakyana.
 
34Giyagni wa Gwariseyone yijnakotinri Wale kochrokna Sariseyone, rapatjetna wanna mkoje. 
35Satu wannanyi yonchikgapine gepomgalu. Rumlukanutyaplu, repomgalu. Wane chinru, 
36“Yimaklewatachri, ¿girni wa tsru potu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi pejnuruko pnute?”
 
37Rugitlu. Wane chinru, “Pushinikanru Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute psolpotuyako pajiya, psolpotuyako punshinikanuya,  psolpotuyako pushinikanutletanruya. 
38Tyenwa tsru potu ga wa muchinanu yokanru. 
39Ga wa gepi chininri tye pixka rixa: Pushinikanru pumole pixnanuko pixka.  
40Wa tye gepi yokanru chinanni pejnuruko Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru ga wa tokanchi geneklewatachine chinyawaka.”
 
41Rapatanatinna Gwariseyone, Geso gepomganna. 
42Wane chinna, “¿Gi nchina gixa wa Kristoya? ¿Katuklopishni?”
Wane chinruna, “Tawinu.”
 
43Wane chinna Wale, “Giyagni ¿gi rixa Tawi wa Giwekikaluruya wane chinru Gitsrukaachi? Wane china:
 
44 Gitsrukaachi wane chinru 
 Nutsrukate, 
 ‘Ptuplatanu npotuklesretate, 
 wa nutakinpotukna Pixa kamnixjene 
 pujixipta rapukote.’ 
 
45Giyagni waleko Tawi wane chininri Gitsrukaachi, ¿gi rixpokotyawaka giklopishayapni?” 
46Gi satuna gimkata gigletokanutlu. Walegognekakayakawa gi satuna tserpiranawata gepomgaletlu wanepnute.
1Giyagni gixolune yine yanumyegita Geso, ga wa yimaklene koxa. 
2Wane chinna, “Moysisi tuplapijere tuplatna yonchikgapine ga wa Gwariseyone. 
3Giyagni pejnuruko chinyawakgina gkamrutyaplu, wale gkamrutanu. Seyni gi wa kamrutyawakna gkamrutanu gixa. Gi rixanu wane chinna, seyni gi wane rixa kamruretluna. 
4Gi rixanu rumlutluna ginolu, kyapre ganikolu. Wale rutjikaakana yine. Seyni wannako gi wa gimyojiyakna raluka komyekletyaluna.
 
5“Ga wa pejnuruko kamrurna wane rixna wa retikolupa yineya. Gi rixanu tserutamtapotutlona yoptoyegitjerna yonchimta. Tserutluna gimkaluptostsimta gwachri. 
6Ralukluna tsrukakalune tuplapijere meyiwluya, ga wa tsrune tuplapijere ginkaklewawakapji gajerkaka. 
7Ralukluna giputuya ralukikolna, ga wa yine wane chinyapna, ‘Rawii, Rawii.’
 
8“Ga wa gixa gi wa ‘Rawi’ nchinko, gi rixanu satupjeru gyimakjeru wa Kristo ga wa pejnurunekgi gixa moletkakachingi. 
9Gi satuna gixa ‘nuru’ nchinanu tye chijiya, gi rixanu satupjeru Giru tengogne Gajeru. 
10Gi wa kgiykolewaklerune nchinko gi rixanu satupjeru giykotjeru. Walenwa Kristo. 
11Wa tsru potu gixa yegi gajeru, gipxakjerupni wale. 
12Gi rixanu girukokta tsru potu gixnawa, walepni wa mturupotupa. Girukokta walenanuko mturu potu gixnawa walepni wa tsru gitaako.
 
13“¡Gi waneni gixa yonchikgapingi, ga wa gixa Gwariseyone, sanowashatachingi! Gi rixanu gixni wa gishyatlu wa tengogne pogirewatyawaka yinyegiya. Gi rixanu gi wa gixako jigloka. Gi koxa gichi jiglookakletna jiglokachinmaka. 
14¡Gi waneni yonchikgapingi, ga wa gixa Gwariseyone sanowashatachingi! Gi rixanu gkonapjijetanna gipnagnurutachronni. Gixashleya gogagjirgognerkakgi. Giyagni giklukanuwnapotutanuna.
 
15“¡Gi waneni yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyone, sanowashatachingi! Gi rixanu tsru wenu ga wa popriwaka chiji gyotaljeta gixa, satupje Goteyo gitaknachriwa gixkakyapa. Ga wa wane rixkoklunu, wane gixkaklu Gigena xirnachri gajeru pixkalutu gixa pnute gepi kata rixanu.
 
16“¡Gi waneni gixa! Maygalenekgi kosekachingi. Wane chinachingi, ‘Girukokta wa kpashiwakpotugruko kawchinanu koschekachri, gike rixa. Seyni girukokta wa kpashiwaka potu gajero kori kawchinanu koschekachri walenwa giklukanuwnachrini.’ 
17¡Seprolokachingi ga wa maygalengi! Gi rixanu ¿girni wa tsrupotu? ¿Waka kori waka kpashiwaka potu wa kori kpashiri rixikowaka? 
18Ga wa, Girukokta gima wa genekashlu yochpikjetikowakakwa kawchinanu koschekachri, gike rixa. Seyni gima girukokta wale gogo gwachri genekashlu kawchinanu koschekachri, walenwa giklukanuwnachrini. 
19Maygalengi, ¿girni wa tsru potu: genekashlu waka yochpikjetikowakakwa wa genekashlu kpashiri rixikowaka? 
20Wa yochpikjetikowakakwa kawchinanu koschekachri, gikwa kawchinanu koscheka ga wa waleymananuko pejnuruko walekwa gwachri kawchinanu. 
21Kpashiwakapji kawchinanu koschekachri, walepji kawchinanu koscheka ga wa walepji Gwachri kawchinanu. 
22Tengogne kawchinanu koschekachri, Goyakalu tuplapijere kawchinanu koscheka ga wa wale gogo Tuplatachri kawchinanu.
 
23“¡Gi wanengi gixa, yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyongi! Gi rixanu pamolete gwenutyalu pgamlusureru, ga wa ganisiji, ga wa kominoji, ga wa gkaspuklu wa tsru potu yokanru Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi chinyawaka. Walenwa poyagkaklewlu, getwamonrewlu, ga wa galixlewlu. Tyekaka gimkata kamrureta. Gi wa pimri koxa gkaspuka kamruretanu. 
24¡Maygalenekgi kosekachingi! ¡Yosla gixirikachine pixkagi gixa, ga wa kameyo gnikloka!
 
25“¡Gi wanengi gixa, yonchikgapingi, Gwariseyongi! Sanowashatachingi. Gi rixanu mpowratlu kolpeto rogote ga wa kajpapago rogote, seyni gitokoya katsepoylu chowguchi ga wa makotnachinwa. 
26Gwariseyo maygaletyi, muchinanu gapka powratanru kolpeto gitokote ga wa kajpapago gitokote, wa rogo gajeru koxa powra rixinripa.
 
27“¡Gi wanengi gixa yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyongi! Sanowashatachingi. Gi rixanu wane pixka gixachingi, yomlechkaka galatawnachri. Maleka galikaka retika kiglepotlu. Ga wa gitoko katseplu gipnachrigapu ga wa pejnuruko kapcholu. 
28Waneko pixka gixa gixa koxa. Maleka galikaka yine getyawakgi poyagkakachinepgutgi. Seyni wa gitokoteya katsepoygi nsanowashle ga wa gmukochire.
 
29“¡Gi wanengi gixa, yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyongi! Sanowachatachingi. Gi rixanu gixa kamrutlu wa Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachinni kapnatikowaka. Gigletlu poyagkakachinni yomle. 
30Wane chinachingi, ‘Wutsrukatenniklu gawkamka koxa wixa, gi wa wupxakmakna Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatchinni giylatikolu.’ 
31Wane gixa gipgujtaletnawa wa Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachinni giylatachineklopishangi. 
32Gixa koxa poyagkakanru gitsrukatenni yaglu.
 
33“¡Gimnu pixkalungi! ¿Gi gixpoko gasukletinri Gigena xirnachri giklukanuwnayegjixikolupa? 
34Giyagni Gita yokanyegitgi Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine, ga wa kgimatkalerune, ga wa yonchikgapine. Pimrine wanna giylatanu gixa. Koroshishkita gitakanna. Pimrine wanna gkochipjetanu ginkaklewawaklepjiya. Papokchimnunanuka gkojwakinna. 
35Wa gixa giklukanuwninripa pejnuruneko poyagkakachinegraga, chiji gipkaakalurugraga, wa Gawili poyagkakachrigragakluyakawa Sakariygragaklupotunanuko, Warachi wgene, wa gixa giylatanruna kpashiwakpotugruko ga wa yochpikikowakakwa ganikajiteswa. 
36Galikaka wane nchingi, wa nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine giklukanuwna pejnuruko tyekakaya.
 
37“¡Gerosale, Gerosale! Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachinni giylatachriyi. Ga wa pyokanyegitikolunni sotlujetachriyi. ¡Gi pejnu katananukta naluka gapatjewgenretyi, gaxawripa pixka tapatjewgeneta! Tomejimpuko tutakna. Ga wa pixa Gesosale gajengi gi galuklu. 
38Gwiyawakapjikaka giknokamtanuna gixapni. 
39Gi rixanu wane nchingi, xaniyakawa gi getanutkanno wa gixa wane chininpotunanuko:
 Giglenshinikanyegitkalurni 
 Gitsrukaachi giwaka ginyachri.” 
1Kpashiwakapji rushpakamtya Geso. Yatka. Rapyegitluna yimaklene, rekakgityapluna kpashiwakapjikaka. 
2Geso wane chinna. “¿Getluge tyekaka? Galikaka wane nchingi, gi wa rutukanuna sotlu rogotkakinripa, gi wa mujroleekatunpakni.”
 
3Goliwa Magkate tuplata. Yayegitluna yinaklene wanna mkoje. Wane chinruna, “Punkakanwu. ¿Giklupni wa tyekakapa? ¿Klu getkaluru wanepa wa puninipa ga wa yoptukgognetyawakapa?”
 
4Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Xako gi satunako yokwitangi. 
5Gi rixanu gixo ginanu ngiwakaya. Wane chinachinepa, ‘Gitni wa Kristo.’ Gixopni yokwitanna. 
6Gyijnakotanutkalu giylalupirana ga wa pogiwlesha giylalupirana. Gi gkegeknanuwatanu. Rumkata wane gixleta, seyni gi wa yoptukyawakapnichi. 
7Gi rixanu yotunyegkakanna pachijne gajene pachijne gajene yegi ruylakakinripna. Ga wa pogirewatyawaka gajene yotunyegkakanna pogirewatyawaka gajene. Waneplu nachlukaka ga wa giyolikchijrukaka pachijnemnunanukaya. 
8Tyekakapni pejnuruko muchichachripa wa kachinolkakapa.
 
9“Wanepnute gixapni samyokalunenapgi nsaletikolupa ga wa giylatikolupa. Ga wa gayegixko payinemnunanukoya Gita giwaka chinanu. 
10Giyagni gixopni gitspekaakona. Samyookakanna. Rayegixkakanna. 
11Rupgujewnanna wanna migje Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine. Yokwitanunna gixoni. 
12Mukochri gixolewnakalu chinanupa, gixopni masata galuklewletannatka. 
13Seyni wa kashnantakanshinikanutachripa yoptukyawakapotunanuko wale gognetkaako. 
14Muchinanu ptowruneko payinerumnunanuka runkakikolupna Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi pogirewatyawakapirana. Waneklupatkani yoptukyawakapa.
 
15“Giyagni getinpatkalu gagnanutkaluru gimtuklewatachri potu, Ntanyili, Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri chinyawaka, kpashiwakapji rawanatini, 
16(Wa getyongatachripa gimata jemanru), waneklu Gote gwachinepni gasukanuna. Magkakaka yanna. 
17Panchi gogoshrichi gwanatachripa gi gijrukanuna ranikyaplu gipji gajeru. 
18Wa sana gwachri gi wa satkapanu rawapyaplu gimkalu. 
19¡Gi waneni wa kamshironepni wa gashichakachinepni wale gognekakpatka! 
20Gagjigognetanu gi waneyapgi ginapuklu gasuktalu, gi wa gapnanutikalurgogneko. 
21Gi rixanu wanepatkalu tsru salewakchi wa mwajejetkatu reyinuwakletinitkalu tye psolchijneko ga wa xanigognenanu salewakchi. Gi wane rixanu. 
22Wa Gitsrukaachi ma sustakanmaklu walegognekaka gi pamanenupnikmaka gishatkapkona, seyni tsomitkalune chinanu sustaklu walegognekaka. 
23Giyagni satu wane chininipgi, ‘Gewru Kristo,’ ga wa wane chininipgi, ‘Ga ga waneru,’ gi wa galixanu. 
24Gi rixanu rupgujewnanna wale migje Kristone, ga wa wanna migje Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine. Kamrutanruna tsru getkalurkakapa ga wa koglajrukakapa yokwitikolupmakna tsomitkalune wa rumkatmaka wane gixleta. 
25Xani nunkakatkagi ma mapookanuwa.
 
26“Giygani girukokta wane chininipgi, ‘Wane rawa, yineru mwiyawakanumka,’ Gi wane gyanu. Ga wa ‘Gitokogruko rawa,’ gi galixanru. 
27Gi rixanu, wa rawrakle pixka rixanu, tkachi gishpatyawakasreta rawrakini pixka ga wa rumxityawakasretpotunanuko pokamlata, wane pixka nixa ginretanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno nuninipa. 
28Gi rixanu ginakakokta rawmanetanu gipnachri, wane rapatjetinna klatatalune.
 
29“Wa ruknoginitka tyegogne gajeru salewakchi, waneklu:
Ruchpokanu tkachi.
Ga wa ksuru gi wa pokamlatanu.
Ga wa tengogne tujirotini katagirkaka.
Wa gichkolkaka tengogne gajeru kowshiwshitko
 
30“Wanepnute tengogne rupgujewninitka Gita Yineru Wgenno yigapkakle. Giyagni kegeknanuwatanna payinerumnunanuko tye psolchijne gajeruko. Retinpatkanona Gita Yineru Wgenno ginachripatkano. Tengogne gajeru kyachgapererumko numunanu.  Tsru nuyakle, tsru noyaknu numunanu. 
31Nyokanatanna notowrene. Tsro pogimnupotuplo kowgimayma nyokanatanna. Wanna gapatjetanna ntsomitanune gepkoxamkojesretayako, yoptukyawakapotunanuko tengogne ga wa pasreta yoptukyawakpotunanuko.
 
32“Gimatanru yapkaklu gikerapiranaya. Wa tyosnuygalejiplutinitka, tupcheksuretinpatka, gimatanutkalu wa walapustsitkani. 
33Waneko pixka gixanu gigognepirana. Getinpatkalu wane gixlutkani tyekaka, gimatanutkalu gi gowukpatkalu. Gipgyaptostsitkalu. 
34Galikaka wane nchingi, gi ruknoganu tye gimuweekakgognenatachinesha wa ptowruko tyekaka ma mixkanuwa. 
35Wa tengogne ga wa chiji giknoganu, seyni wa ntokanu gi giknoganu.
 
36“Seyni walegogne, wale gipapko, gike gimata, gi wa Goyakalu towreruneko tengogne gajene, gi wa Gituruko, ga wa Girchipje galikaka gimata. 
37Gi rixanu Nowgogneklu pixka nixa gapokletanu Gita Yineru Wgenno. 
38Gi rixanu wa gonnewlu ma mapookanuwagognekaka wane rixa nikletna, rurna, ganunrowatna, ga wa ganuruwatna wa Nowe jiglokingognepotunanuklo pumlekwa. 
39Gi rumatna rapokinipotunanuko gonnewlu ga wa ranikanna pejnurunniko. Wane pixka rixanu napokinipa Gita Yineru Wgenno. 
40Giyagni gepi jejine sana gwanatanu. Satu ganiika ga wa satupni giknokamtkona. 
41Gepi suxone ginripagita satu ginripiya. Sato ganiika. Satopni giknokamtkona.
 
42“Giyagni gixa giyokanu. Gi rixanu gi gimata girugogne runanu Gitsrukate. 
43Ga wa gimatanru wa tye. Wa kwangixlerupji gimatkamka girpapko runinripa kachowguru, ruyokanmaka. Gi retashatanmaklu kotamgiyaplu gipji. 
44Giyagni galpokotinwa gixa koxa, gi rixanu gi gimata gixa girpapko nunanu Gita Yineru Wgenno.
 
45“Giyagni ¿girupni wa wayegrechri gaponshinikanutkaluru ga wa kshinikanuru? Wale rutakamta rutsrukate gipji gajene chinanu, wale geneka nikletyapna nikjetinnapapko. 
46Giglenshinikanyegitkaluru wale wayegrechri wa runini rutsrukate rukshikyaplu wane gixanatachri. 
47Galikaka wane nchingi pejnuruko wane rixle chinanu rutakanru. 
48Ga wa gektutu wayegrechri wane chinanutka rajiya, ‘Ramga ginreta Nutsrukate,’ 
49Yinuwaka giylakletletna ruwayegretkone. Nika, ga wa rura gimetachineyma. 
50Wale wayegrechri gitsrukate ginanu. Ma kagwakgognetinitgogne, runanu. Ma mumatinpapko runanu. 
51Kochipjepotutanru. Sanowashatachineyma rutakanru walenupa. Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.
1“Giyagni tengogne pogirewatyawaka pamole maklojine pixka rixanu. Wanna koscheklo yochpiikalurkaka wannanuko. Rushpakamtna yoptotapyapatkaluna gnunrowatachripa. 
2Pamyona manshinikanurone, ga wa pamyo koxa kanshinikanurone. 
3Giyagni wa manshinikanurone koscheklo yochpikjetanrona, seyni gi ranikluna ringi. 
4Seyni wa kanshinikanurone ganiklu ringi pastonoya yochpikjetkaluroyma. 
5Ramganatinikopshini gnunrowatachripa ruxapnewanatna, rutnonatna pejnuroneko. Rumkanatna.
 
6“Ganikajyechno jemka saplechi wane chinachri, ‘¡Tyepatkani! Gnunrowatachripatkani. Gishpakanu. Gyoptotapanru.’
 
7“Giyagni pejnuroneko maklojine yotunota. Ruglepokotlona yochpikjetanrona. 
8Giyagni manshinikanurone wane chinna kanshinikanurone, ‘Psoji genekanunwu gringite. Wa wyochpikjetanro giwniyanatkawu.’
 
9“Seyni wa kanshinikanurone gigitna. Wane chinna, ‘Gike. Gi getko poyagotanu wixa chinanupa ga wa gixa chinanu koxa. Seyni gagjitapangonuklu gixanupa wa ragjijetikowakaya.’
 
10“Ragjitapakopshinruna rapokatka gnunrowatachripa. Ga wa galpokonatachinetka jiglokamtatkaluna kashimyolu yegi. Rushyatkatka gipgyapto.
 
11“Gowukshini pimrone gina maklojine. Wane chinna, ‘Gitsrukaachi, gitsrukaachi, pkotpukyegitanunwu.’
 
12“Rugita wale. Wane china, ‘Galikaka wane nchingi, gi numatgi.’
 
13“Giyagni giyokanu. Gi rixanu gi gimatlu gigogne, gi wa gipapkoko.
 
14“Gi rixanu tengogne pogirewatyawaka satu jeji pixka rixa wajra yachri. Tomgana wayegrene. Renekamtna wane rixle. 
15Satu reneka satu pacha waragkaproji, ga wa satu gepkoxamkojemole waragkaproji, ga wa satu gepmole waragkaproji. Satkaka rumkatyawaka renekna. Wajra yatka. 
16Wa satu pacha waragka yoptotachri ralimta. Marnewatatka. Walaya satu pacha waragkatnaka yoptotatnaka. 
17Waneko pixka rixa wa gepkoxamkojemole waragkaproji waneyalutu. Gepkoxamkojmole waragkatnaka yoptotatnaka. 
18Ga wa gepmole waragkaproji yoptotachri ralimta. Jitotlu chiji. Yogimatatkalo rutsrukate serojiprojite.
 
19“Gowukshini potu runa wanna wayegrechine gitsrukate. Ruglepokotluna kwentatna. 
20Rapoka satu pacha waragkaproji yoptotachri. Raniklo pimro satu pacha waragkaprojitnaka. Wane china, ‘Gitsrukaachi, satu pacha waragka penekamtno. Petanu. Pimro satu pacha waragkaproji nyoptotatnaka walaya.’
 
21“Rutsrukate wane chinru, ‘Poyagnu, wayegrechri kigleryi ga wa poyagkakachriyi. Psotsotaji putakika poyagkakachriyi. Gixo potu chinanu nutakinyi. Putsrukate gimuwatyawaka pjiglokanu.’
 
22“Rapoka koxa gepkoxamkojmole waragkaproji yoptotachri. Wane china, ‘Gitsrukaachi, gepkoxamkojmole waragkaproji penekamtno. Petanu. Pimro gepkoxamkojmole waragkaproji nyoptotatnaka walaya.’
 
23“Rutsrukate wane chinru, ‘Poyagnu, wayegrechri kigleryi ga wa poyagkakachriyi. Psotsotaji putakika poyagkakachriyi. Gixo potu chinanu nutakinyi. Putsrukate gimuwatyawaka pjiglokanu.’
 
24“Rapoka koxa gepimole waragkaproji yoptotachri. Wane china, ‘Gitsrukaachi, numatyi jeji shiko gajiryi. Pma mutaklewatyawakanu pjirgiya. Pma muknokajityawakanu papatjetya. 
25Npika. Nalimta. Nyogimatlo pserojiprojite chiji gitokote, wa gepmole waragkaproji. Waneyyi wa pixanu.’
 
26“Rugita rutsrukate. Wane chinru, ‘Wayegrechri mugletyi ga wa ma mernuwatachriyi. ¿Pumatmakge wa nma mutaklewatyawakanu njirgiya, nma muknokajityawakanu napatjetya? 
27Giyagni pumkata gitakletlo nserojiprojite kgipekoklerune yegi, wa napokini nyoptotanmaklo gitanuko ga wa gixolewnachroymananuko.’
 
28“ ‘Giyagni gkonanro waleya gepimole waragkaproji. Wa satu pacha waragkaproji waneyalutu genekanro. 
29Gi rixanu waneyalutu psoluko reneeko. Ruxolewnayegitanru. Ga wa waneyamigjetu, wane rixleko koniko. 
30Ga wa wayegrechri gike gapri migje maleka mapshagawaka giknokanru. Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.’
 
31“Wa noyaknu numuninipa Gita wa Yineru Wgenno ga wa pejnuruneko notowreneyma, natajiwniyawaka ntuplapijere ntuplatanu. 
32Gita getanu rapatjekaakona payinemnunanuka. Nkotspalatanna. Wa gowegane girukotachri pixka kotspalatna gowegane chiwo wgeneneyegiya. 
33Potuklesretate galikaka nutakanna gowegane. Kegnetesretate nutakanna chiwo wgenene.
 
34“Giyagni Gita pogirchino wane nchinanna npotuklesretate gajene, ‘Ginanu, Nuru giglenshinikanutanune. Gyoptotanru pogirewatyawaka gixa chinanupa galpokotkaluru ma mutaakonuwa tye psolchijneko. 
35Gi rixanu nachinanno. Geneka nikletno. Nonunnagatewanata. Geneka giiretno. Pnu giyakatyachrino. Gyoptotno. 
36Mamkatno. Gmakatno. Nyayixa. Nsalwayegitno. Yoshmakjetikowakananno. Ginyegitno.’
 
37“Giyagni poyagkakachine gigitanno. Wane chinannona, ‘Gitsrukaachi, ¿giklu wetyi pnachinatini ga wa woglutyi, waka gonunnagatewatachriyi ga wa weneka giiretyi? 
38¿Giklu wetyi pnu giyakatyachriyi ga wa wyoptotyi, waka mamkatyi ga wa wmakatyi? 
39¿Giklu wetyi pyayixanatini ga wa yoshmakikowaka pwini pixa, ga wa wunyegityi pixa?’
 
40“Wa Gita pogirchino gigitanna. Wane nchinanna, ‘Galikakni wane nchingi, girukokta wa mturu potu wa nyi nomole wane gixini, wane gixno Gita.’
 
41“Wanepnute wane nchinankoxna wa nkegnetesreta gwachine, ‘Gixrikinno, kamakpiratkalungi. Xirnachri gyanu gike rixiniko muwnakatu, tsru kamchi chinanu galpokotkaluru ga wa gitowrenenupa. 
42Gi rixanu nachi nixinina, gi geneka nikletanno. Nonunnagatewanatinina, gi geneka giiretanno. 
43Pnu nuyakatinina, gi wa gyoptotanno. Mamkatu nixini, gi wa gmakatanno. Nyayixinina ga wa yoshmakikowaka nwini, gi wa nsalwayegitanno.’
 
44“Giyagni wanna koxa gigitanno. Wane chinannona, ‘Gitsrukachi, ¿giklu wetyi wa pnachinatini ga wa ponunnagatewatini ga wa pnu puyakatini, mamkatu, ga wa yayixachriyi ga wa yoshmakikowaka pwini, waneklu gi wa wupxakyi?’
 
45“Gita gigitanna. Wane nchinanunna, ‘Galikaka wane nchingi, gi rixanu gi wane gixlu satu nyi mturpotune, gi wa Gita wane gixa.’
 
46“Wane yanunna saletikowakapna gike rixiniko mnikawnakatu. Ga wa poyagkakachine wane yanna giwekikowaka gike rixiniko mnikawnakatu.”
1Wane rixa. Rali ginkakletinitkalu Geso pejnuruko tyekakapirana, wane chinna yimaklene, 
2“Gixa gimatlu wa gepigogne giknoginpatka, waneplu Tsru Giknoglushgogne ga wa Gita Yineru Wgenno samyooko, koroshishkita nutakikopatka.”
 
3Giyagni tsrukakalune sasertotene, ga wa yine tsrutene gapata. Sasertotene gitsrukatpotupji rapatyana. Kaygwasu giwakni. 
4Jemanshinikankakna kashichyapluna Geso yokwireyna, ga wa ruylatyapluna. 
5Wane chinna, “Gi wa tsrugogneklupni. Ma mejnugimalewatinitipna yine.”
 
6Wetani rawanata Geso, gijirgitutpachri Simopji. 
7Tapyegitlu sato suxo. Waneylo pastono klatalo, pgamlugalu yegi. Kwenuru potu. Nikawaka tuplanatini Geso, tuyokjiwutlu.
 
8Wale retna yimaklene. Rumtuwnana. Wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu wane tixa salewnaleta? 
9Gi rixanu tumkata gishankakotmaka tsru wenruya, renekikolupna kwamonurune.”
 
10Geso gimatlu. Wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu nsalewnakaklo twu suxo? Gi rixanu kigleru kamrurchi tkamrutyano. 
11Gi rixanu waneygognenanupgi wa kwamonurune gixayma, seyni Gita gi wa gimwagognenanutanutkagi. 
12Gi rixanu tuyokmanetno pgamlugalo, wa nkapnatikolupa tkamrutyano. 
13Galikaka wane nchingi, ginakakokta runkakletiko Kiglerupotunanu Tokanchi wa psolchijneko wa tye koxa tkamrutanru wala wane chinkalurupa wa tushinikikolupa wala.”
 
14Giyagni satu pamole gepi rixinri, Gota Giskaryote giwakatletachri tsrukakalune sasertotene yegi ya. 
15Wane chinna, “¿Klu galuka genekletno, gita samyokangi Wale?” Rupiratyaluna mapmoleproji.
 
16Wanekluyakawa rujgalu ruglepoktapinri samyokyaplu.
 
17Muchinangogne jimaprojpa gisekachri myapjetkotugognekaka yimaklene ginyegitlu Geso. Wane chinruna, “¿Ginaka paluka galpoklejixwu wa Tsru Giknoglushgogne pnikyawakapa?”
 
18Wale wane china, “Pokchi gyanu wale jeji yegi. Wane nchinanru, ‘Yimaklewatachri wane china, “Nogognestsitkani. Pixa yegi Tsru Giknoglushgogne nkamrutinri nyimamkleneyma” ’ ” 
19Ga wa yimaklene Geso chinyawakna kamrutna. Ralpokotluna Tsru Giknoglushgogne chinanu.
 
20Kayimnu chininitka nikawaka tuplatatka pamole gepi yimakleneyma. 
21Wa nikanatinna, Geso wane china, “Galikaka wane nchingi, satu gixate rixinri samyokanutkano.”
 
22Wamonuwnapotutna. Yinuwaka wane chinretna satkaka, “¿Gitgetkopni, Gitsrukaachi?”
 
23Giyagni rugitna Wale. Wane chinna, “Girpaktanwa Gitayma gigakachri kolpetoya gimyoya, walepni wa samyokanno. 
24Galikaka Gita wa Yineru Wgenno wane nyanu chinyawaka wa yonchi Gitapiranaya. ¡Gi waneni wa tye jeji, wale chinanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyooko! Kiglemkalu tye jeji chinanu ma mushpaakannimka.”
 
25Giyagni rugita Gota wa samyokjeru. Wane chinru, “¿Gitgetkoni, Rawi?”
Wane chinru, “Pixa chinyawaka.”
 
26Nikanatinna wanna, Geso kashichlu jimapro. Ruglenshinikanyegitlu. Jiknaglu. Renekna yimaklene. Wane chinna, “Gyoptotanru. Gnikanru. Tyenwa nomane.”
 
27Kashichlo girapistono. Poyagnutyegitlo. Renekna. Wane chinna, “Giranu walaya pejnurunekgi. 
28Gi rixanu tyenwa nograga wa gerotu tokanchi gipiratkaluru chinanu, gixoluru yineru chinanu giyookaluru, wa mukochri kaspukikolupa. 
29Ga wa wane nchingi, xaniyakawa gi wa nuranutkalo twu gowajga wa walegognepotuko wa nuranro geroto wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawakaya.”
 
30Wa wanna shikaletinitkalu gimalwuru, rushpakamtatkana. Goliwa Magkate yana.
 
31Giyagni Geso wane chinna, “Tye yechno pejnurunekgi gixapni gitspeekaakona Gita chinanu. Gi rixanu kayongalutkani:
 Nuylakanru girukotapratachri, 
 ga wa gowegane gapatyawaka gajene 
 kotspalkaakona. 
 
32Wa nyotunotinpatka, Gita gapka kosekanu gixaya. Kalile nyanu.”
 
33Petro gigita. Wane chinru, “Pejnurunekmaka gitspetanu Pixa chinanu, gike nixiniko nutspetanu gita.”
 
34Geso wane chinru, “Galikaka wane chinyi, tye yechno ma yanumatkanugnapuwa gaxawripa, mapa kata pnutatanno.”
 
35Petro wane chinru, “Numkata gipnaletankoxmaka Pixayma, gi nnutatanyi.” Ga wa pejnuruneko yimaklene wane china.
 
36Giyagni sana ya Geso wannayma. Getsemani chinikowaka sana yana. Wane chinna yimaklene, “Gewi ntuplatanu, nagjigognetapinikopshini.” 
37Ranikna Petro ga wa gepi Sewereyo wgenene. Yinuwaka wamonuwnaleta. Ga wa kojwakanshinikanutka. 
38Giyagni wane chinna, “Nonshinikanu nwamonuwnapotutya gipukchi pixka potuko. Gkagwakanu gewi. Giyokanu Gitayma.”
 
39Wane rajrinya psotsotaaji. Yoptsojita. Yonoogojpotuta. Ragjigogneta. Wane china, “Nuru, rumkatini wane gixletikolupa, ruknoganu tye salewakchi Gitaya, seyni gi wa Gita galukyawakapni, seyni Pixa galukyawakapni.”
 
40Yimaklene yegi ya. Retamtna gimkanatachine. Wane chinru Petro, “Giyagni ¿gi gimkata giyokletge Gitayma pshinitsonu? 
41Giyokanu. Gagjigognetanu gma yantaletikotupa. Wa jmerenshinikanurungi galikakni, seyni gimane muchkotni.”
 
42Rumepe wane yaletatnaka. Ragjigognetapa salewnalepirana. Wane china, “Nuru, nma murkanuwalo gi tumkata giknogletini Gitaya wa twu girapistono, wane gixkalurupni palukyawaka.”
 
43Rumepe yayegletatnakna. Retamtna gimkanatachine, gi rixanu ruxapnewlena chinanu gi rumkata gimrekaygaletna. 
44Rajrinatnaka. Ragjigognetapa mapa kata rixinri. Waneko pixka chintokanutatnaka.
 
45Wanepnute yimaklene yegi yatnaka. Wane chinna, “Gimkapanuchi. Gapnanutanutka. Nopapkostsitkani Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyookotka kmukochirerunemyoya. 
46Gyotunotanutka. Gayanutka. Gi gowukatkalu nsamyokjerupa.”
 
47Wa yanumsanatiniwa, runatka Gota satu wa pamole gepi rixinrina. Waleymana gixolune yine kyoglolewaprerune, kgagajererune. Runna tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrunekoxasreta gajene. 
48Wa samyokjerupa genekna saturutu gimaxiklechi. Wane china, “Girukta namlutanu gita, Walepakni. Gkashichanru.”
 
49Rapyegitinitkalu Geso, waneklu wane chinru, “¡Rawi!” Ralukatkalu ga wa ramlutlu.
 
50Geso wane chinru, “Nomole, ¿klu chinanu puna?”
Giyagni rapyegitluna. Geso. Kashichatkaluna. 
51Ga wa satu Gesoymalutu koshpaklu yoglolewapre. Rustaklu sasertotene gitsrukate potu wayegreru. Yostakjepitlu.
 
52Giyagni Geso wane chinru, “Pumretanru pyoglolewapre. Rawyawaka putakanru. Gi rixanu pejnuruneko yoglolewapi koschekachri, yoglolewapiko ruylatiko. 
53¿Waka gkagwakluge gi numkata gagjiretlu Nuru; Walemka gitakyegitanutkano yokgipimole waragka pnute solalone gitowrene? 
54¿Seyni gi rixpoko poyagkaakotanmaka Tokanchi Yonatkaluru wane chinachri rumkata wane gixleta?”
 
55Waneklu Geso wane chinna wa gixolune yine, “¿Ginyegitno gixa yoglolewapiyma gagajeyma, kachowguru pixka gixa kashretnoge? Pagognemnunanuka gixayma ntuplanata. Nunkaklewata kpashiwakapjiya. Gi wa wane gkashichyano. 
56Seyni pejnuruko tyekaka wane gixkaluru poyagkakikolupa wa yonchi, Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine yonga.” Ruknokamtluna pejnuruneko yimaklene. Rasukatkana.
 
57Ga wa Geso kashichachine ganiklu. Sasertotene gitsrukate potu Kaygwasu yegi ranikatkaluna, rapatyawakatkana yonchikgapine ga wa tsrune. 
58Wa Petro gomkagitlu gogajxigiyako. Sasertotene gitsrukatpotupjipotunanuko romkagitlu. Gitoko jigloka. Tuplanata towrechineyma retyaplu rushinityawakapa.
 
59Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, pejnuruneko jemanshinikankakjetikowakaya rujgaluna gipujtalewlusha galikaka migje Geso chinanu ruylajixyapluna. 
60Gimka gepikna gipgujtalewashatachine gapokachine, seyni gi rukshikluna.
Gapkatamtachine gepi gapoka, 
61wane chinachine, “Wale wane china, ‘Numkata jijrolekletlu kpashiwaka potu Goyakalunu, ga wa mapgogne nkamrupjitanutnaklu.’ ”
 
62Palna sasertotene gitsrukate potu. Wane chinru, “¿Gike pugita? ¿Klu rupgujtatyayina wa nyi?” 
63Seyni Geso pochkeru.
Sasertotene gitsrukate potu wane chinru, “Goyakalu giwekachri kawchinanu nkoschekjixyi. Punkakanwu, ¿Pixlege wa Kristo, Goyakalu Wgenyi?” 
64Geso wane chinru, “Pixa chinyawaka. Seyni wane nchinyi,
Xaniyakawa gixa getanno
 Gita wa Yineru Wgenno 
 tuplatyawakapa giyaklu potuklesretate, 
 nuninkoxapa kyachgapererumkoya tengogne.” 
 
65Giyagni wa sasertote gitsrukate potu suskamkata. Wane china, “Mupashiregnuchi china. ¿Klu wanepnute magatyawu gipgujtalewatachine? Getanu wa xani. Gyijnakotatkalu ma mupashiregnuya. ¿Gi pixka getle gixlu?”
 
66Rugitna. Wane chinna, “Ruklukanuwna rupninripa.”
 
67Giyagni rutskagjegojitluna. Yotmutluna. Pimrine giptagojitlu. 
68Wane chinna, “Kristo, Goyakalu chinanu punkakanwu: ¿Katu giylakyi?”
 
69Malekputu tuplanata Petro. Wane tapyegityalu sato wayegrechro. Wane china, “Pixa koxa Geso Kalile gajeruymananyi.”
 
70Seyni pejnuruneko getanuya nutata. Wane china, “Gi numata gikta pchina.”
 
71Rushpaka. Maleka gajeru gipgyaptote ya. Satu getatnaklu. Wane chinna wa wane gwanatachine, “Tye koxa Geso Nasare gajeruymananu.”
 
72Wale kawchinanu nutatatnaka. Wane china, “Gi numatlu wa jeji.”
 
73Pshinitsonu rapyegitluna wane gwanatachine. Wane chinruna Petro, “Galikakni pixa koxa wannaymananyi. Gi rixanu ptokanu pumatika wa wane pixinri.”
 
74Giyagni yinuwaka kamakpiirewleta. Yinuwaka Wale kawchinanu chinreta, “Gi numatlu wa jeji.”
Waneklu gaxawripa yanumatatka. 
75Rushinkaplu Petro wa Geso tokanu, wane chininri, “Ma yanumatkanuwa gaxawripa, mapa kata pnutatanno,” chinyalu. Rushpakamtatka. Maleka ya. Chiyampotuta.
1Goyechnokawpotuko jemanshinikankakjetikowaka jiglokna tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa yine tsrutene Geso chinanu, wa ruylatyapluna. 
2Rostutluna. Ranikatkaluna. Pilato girukotlewatachri yegi samyokluna.
 
3Giyagni Gota wa samyokjeru retatkalu wa ruklukanuwnayegjixikolutka, kashrijetanshinikanuta. Satkaklo wa mapamoleproji tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrune yegi. 
4Wane china, “Gita mukochirewatatka. Nsamyoklu muklukanuwnakatugraga.”
Wa wanna wane chinru, “¿Gi rixwu wixa? Petanru pixa.”
 
5Ruknokamtlo sroschiproji kpashiwakaya. Ralimta. Rushriknojitnanatkawa.
 
6Tsrukaklune sasertotene gwalo sroschi. Wane chinna, “Ginanshichkalurni tuknokikolu wa kpashiri gignantakikowaka, gi rixanu granchi wenroni.” 
7Jemanshinikankakna. Walaya ragjitluna kajpa kamgakleruchijne, pnu giyakatyachine kapnatikowakapa. 
8Giyagni wane chinkaluru Granchichijne xanigognenanu. 
9Waneklu poyagkakatkalu Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri Geremiya wane chinyawaka: Rawlona mapmoleproji sroschi wa rutakwenutikolu wenru, wa pimrine Gisrayiliklopishane gitakwenutanru.  
10Reneklona kajpa kamgakleruchijne chinanu, Gitsrukaachi chinyawakno. 
 
11Girukotlewatachri getanu tunwata Geso. Ga wa girukotlewatachri gepomgalu. Wane china, “¿Pixlege wa Goteyone Pogiryi?”
Geso wane china, “Pixa chinyawaka.”
 
12Wa jigyegitkoklunu tsrukakalune sasertoteneya ga wa tsruneya koxa, gike rugita. 
13Giyagni Pilato wane chinru, “¿Gi ge pjema gi pejnupiranananukta jigyegityayina Pixa?” 
14Gi satuna tokanchi rugityalu. Giyagni girukotlewatachri giglajpotuta.
 
15Wa tsrugogneklu satu yineru rushyegjetna gostutkaluru girukokta ralukanruna. 
16Giyagni waneyananna gostutkaluru kpogiru, Warawasu giwakatletachri. 
17Giyagni rapatinitkana, Pilato wane chinna, “¿Giru galuka wa nkaspukyegityapgi? ¿Warawaslege waka Geso wa Kristo chinkaluru?” 
18Gi rixanu wale gimata wa ranxalna chinanu samyokluna.
 
19Gitakyagoklewatikowaka tuplanatini wale, ganunro yokantokanyegitlu. Wane chinru, “Petashatanru Wale poyagkakachri. Gi rixanu xawakni gixo nsalewna Wale chinanu nupnawleya.”
 
20Ga wa tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrune gishinikanutna gixolune yine wa Warawasu galikaka ragjitinripna, ga wa Geso ruylajixinripna.
 
21Rugita girukotlewatachri. Wane china, “¿Giru galuka wa nyi gepi wa nkaspukyegityapgi?”
Wanna wane china, “Warawasupni.”
 
22Pilato wane chinna, “Giyagni ¿gi nixyaplu Geso wa Kristo chinkaluru?”
Pejnuruneko wane china, “¡Koroshishkita gitaakalurupa!”
 
23Girukotlewatachri wane china, “¿Klu gektutu kamruta?”
Wanepnute potu tsaplewatna. Wane chinna, “Koroshishkita gitaakalurupni.”
 
24Giyagni Pilato getinri gike rumkata, seyni wanepnute galikaka rixa gejnugima, gonu koscheka. Reromyoga gixolune yine getanu. Wane china, “Muklukanuwnakatno tyegragaya. Gixa getanutkalu.”
 
25Pejnuruneko yine gigita. Wane chinna, “Wixa chinanupni gigragaya, ga wa wwugenene chinanupni.”
 
26Giyagni kaspukyegitna Pilato Warawasu. Rali kochipjetjixletinitkalu Geso, samyokatkalu koroshishkita rutakikolupa.
 
27Giyagni girukotlewatachri solalotene ganikatkalu Geso. Tsrupji Pretoryopji ranikluna. Pejnuruneko solalone gapatyegitlu. 
28Giyagni Waleko gimkalu komkagatkaluna. Pakni yoshmookaluru pixkalutu mkachri yoshmakatkaluna. 
29Kona kamgikaluru sagyeta yoshmakjiwutatkaluna. Katsluksu samyokluna, potuklemyo. Yoptsojityegitluna. Ruxpiranatluna. Wane chinruna, “¡Wuya, Goteyone pogire!” 
30Rutskagjetluna. Kashichluna katsluksu. Ruylajiwutluna. 
31Rali gixpiranatletinikaluna, komkagatkaluna mkachri. Waleko gimkalu yoshmakatnakluna. Ranikatkaluna, koroshishkita rutakyapatkaluna.
 
32Rushpakamtinitkana. Retluna Surene gajeru, Simo giwakatletachri. Wale rutjijixlona Geso koroshishkitate. 
33Rapokluna Kolkota chinikowaka. Walenwa Gijiwuswaga yegi chinikowaka. 
34Reneka giiretmakluna winga shepichlega yapjetkaluro. Retumgamkalo. Gi raluka giiretlo. 
35Koroshishkita rutakatkaluna. Kotspaltamkatluna. Gipenoklu rutakluna gimkalu. 
36Tuplatna. Wane retanatyaluna. 
37Gijiwu gogwakate rutakyaluna jigyegitikolu yonga, wane chinachri:
Tyenwa Geso Goteyone Pogire.
 
38Giyagni Waleyma koroshshkita rutaakana gepi kachowgurune, satu potuklesreta, satu kegnetesreta. 
39Wa giknogachine mupashiregnuchi chinruna. Ruwnownojiwutna. 
40Wane chinruna, “Pixni wa kpashiwakapji jijrolekachripyi, mapagogne pkamrupjitanutnaklu. Pixnanuko gognetkakinwa. Goyakalu Wgene pixinipa, koroshishkita pujrukini.”
 
41Waneko pixka china gixpiranatletluna tsrukakalune sasertotene, ga wa yonchikgapine, ga wa tsrune. Wane chinna, 
42“Pimrine rognetkaka. Walenanuko gi rumkata gognetkakletnawa. Goteyone Pogirmaka, koroshishkita rujrukini xani. Walixanmaklu. 
43Raponshinikanutkamkalu Ruru Goyakalu. Rushatkapanru xani ralukiniplu. Gi rixanu wane china, ‘Goyakalu Wgenno.’ ” 
44Waneko pixka rixa yangaletluna kachowgurune Waleyma koroshishkita gitaakalune.
 
45Tumananutkani ruchpokatka tkachi psolchijnepotunanuyako. Kayinwakasreta rapokinpotunanuko rumrekatka. 
46Kayinwakpapko Geso saplewata. Tsru plaji rixa. Wane china, “Geloyi, Geloyi, ¿Lama sawajtani?”  Walenwa, “Noyakalute, Noyakalute, ¿klu chinanu puknokatkano?”
 
47Jeminrina pimrine wane gwanatachine, wane chinna wanna, “Pete. Wale tomgalu Giliya.”
 
48Waneklu rasukamta satu wannate. Rawlo katsopi. Kachgalu shichponkaklu. Katsluksu rutaklu. Reneka giiretlu. 
49Pimrine wane china, “Getashatanru. Wetkoxewa gikta runanu Giliya rognetkakapyaplu.”
 
50Rumepe saplewletatnaka Geso. Tsru saple rixa. Kaspukatkalu ruwekinri.
 
51Waneklutka mkachrichrata gimaletanatachri kpashiwaka gajeru giskakamtatka. Gepichratatkalu. Teno rumuyaka giskakletyatka chijiina. 
52Ruyolikchijita. Sotlukaka gitspatjeta. Rutpukamta yomlechkaka. Gi gepika kpashirinni gapnanutachinnimane yotunota. 
53Wa yotunotinitka Wale, waneklu yomlechi rushpakyatkana. Kpashiri pokchi yatkana. Gixolune yegi rupgujewnayegitna.
 
54Ga wa ksolaloteru ga wa waleymalune Geso girukotanatachine getlu wa giyolikchijru, ga wa wane gixkalurkaka. Tsru piklu rixanna. Wane chinna, “Galikakni Goyakalu Wgenni wa tye.”
 
55Wane rawanatna gixo suxone gowuka getanatyachine. Kalile romkagityaluna Geso. Rupxakanatluna. 
56Wannaymana Mariya Maktala gajero, ga wa Santiyako, Gosi ginro Mariya, ga wa Sewereyo wgenene ginro.
 
57Kayi rixinitka runa satu jeji ponikolu, Garimate gajeru. Gosi giwakatletachri. Wa Geso yimaklerkoxni wale. 
58Wale yayegitlu Pilato. Gesnimane ragjita. Giyagni Pilato genekjixmanetlu. 
59Gosi gwamanetatkalu. Powrachratalu poyitatkalu. 
60Waleko giyomlepmaka gerotupna rutaklu, sotlu yomlechi gipgyaptote gakanokachri. Wane yiyatka. 
61Wane rawanatna Mariya Maktala gajero, ga wa sato Mariya. Tuplanatna yomlechi ginaple.
 
62Waleprikgogne, walenwa gapnanutikalurgogne, Pilato yegi rapatyana tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa Gwariseyone. 
63Wane chinna, “Gitsrukaachi, wushiniklu wa wale kyokwirewaklerni wane china, ‘Mapagogne giknoginpatka nyotunotanu.’ 
64Giyagni pyokanrewatanu girukotayomletikolupa mapgogne rixinpotunanuko, ma chowgutapyapluna yimaklene goyechno, ma wane chinyanupna yine, ‘Yotunomtatka gipnachinetskalaya.’ Gapkatatachri pupjeru muchinanu pnute ma mixinitipa.”
 
65Pilato wane chinna, “Waneygi girukowatachine. Gajewa. Gignantakanru gimatyawaka.” 
66Wane yatkana. Rugnantakluna yomlechi. Rupitluna sotlu, girukowatachineymananuko.
1Ruknoginitka gapnanutikalurgogne, rumrerekamtinitka muchinangogne wa simana, wane yana Mariya Maktala gajero ga wa sato Mariya, yomlechi retapyapna.
 
2Waneklu waneru tsru giyolikchijru. Gi rixanu Gitsrukaachitowreru gijruka tengogneya. Rapoka. Rakaprurutlu sotlu yomlechi gajeru. Wale gogo tuplanatatka. 
3Rawrakle pixka rixgojita. Gimkalu klataa rixpotuta giwru pixka. 
4Wale piklena chinanu wa girukowatachine giypiypitana. Gipnachine pixka rixanna.
 
5Goyakalutowreru gigita. Wane chinna suxone, “Gi mpikanu gixa. Gi rixanu numatgi Geso gijga, wa koroshishkita gitakanatkaluru. 
6Gi wa gewitkalu. Yotunomtatka wa Wale chinyawaka. Ginanu. Getapanru rutakanatikowaka. 
7Gajewa. Nteyakawamtanu. Ginkakapanna wa yimaklene yotunomtinritka gipnachinetskalaya. Kosekatkagi. Kalile yatka. Wane getinitkalu. Nunkakatkagi.”
 
8Giyagni wanna yomlechi teyakawamtyatkana. Pikachine ga wa gimuwatachine potu. Rasukamtna yimaklene runkakapyapna. 
9Makakta Gesokni wa yoptotapna. Wane chinna, “Kiglenshinikanupgi.” Rapyegitluna. Kashjixitluna. Yoptsojityegitluna. 
10Giyagni Geso wane chinna, “Gi mpikanu. Gajewa. Ginkakapanna nomolene wa Kalile yinripatkana. Wane retinnona.”
 
11Wane yakopshinna, pimrine girukowatachine pokchi yatkana. Tsrukakalune sasertotene runkakapna pejnuruko retanrutkana wane gixachritka. 
12Rapatjetna tsruneyma. Jemanshinikankakna. Gixo sroschi reneekana solalone. 
13Wane chinkana, “Wane nchinanu, ‘Yimaklene goyechno ginapa. Chowgutpatkaluna, wumkanatni wixni.’ 
14Wale yijnakotinipa girukotlewatachri, wixa giglepokyegitangi. Mkojwakanshinikanutkane wixkakangi.” 
15Wanna yoptotlo sroschi. Wane rixna wa runkakikowakna. Giyagni poshalpiranatka Goteyone yegi xanigognenanu.
 
16Giyagni pamole satupje yimaklene Kalile yatkana, satu magka yegi wa Geso chinyawakpotukna. 
17Retinitkaluna yoptsojityegitluna. Seyni pimrine nutanshinikanyegitlu. 
18Rapyegitinitkana Geso, ruynumsatna. Wane chinna, “Psolpotuko nutakika tengogne ga wa chiji. 
19Giyagni gyanu. Gyimakanna payinemnunanuka. Gkatanna Girchi giwakaya, ga wa Gituru giwakaya, ga wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri giwakaya. 
20Ginkakanna kamrutyapluna pejnuruko nyokanatyagi. Gjemanu: Gixayma nwanu psolgogneko yoptukgogneshatyawakpotunanuko.”
1Tyenwa yinuwakikolu Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi Geso Kristopirana Goyakalu Wgene. 
2Wane rixa yokanatkaluru Gisayiya Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri. Wane china:
 Gita yokanatlu notowreru pixa penute. 
 Wale galpokotanru patnugapote. 
 
3 Yineru mwiyawakanu saplewatyachri wane china: 
 Galpokotanru Gitsrukachi gatnugapote. 
 Mpotukatanru gigapkaka. 
 
4Gwa katlewata yineru mwiyawakanuya. Wane runkakyana yine genshinikanutachinepa katinripna. Ga wa kaspukamukochiretikolupapirana runkakna. 
5Rushpakyegitluna pejnuruneko Gotesreta gajene ga wa Gerosale gajene koxa. Wanna ptowruneko katka Gorta gapgaya. Rupgujtamukochiretnawana.
 
6Wa Gwa makatlu kameyopixi. Wa pamta gipchiji rushrika. Wale niklu tsetse ga wa wrolga gosha gajeru. 
7Runkaklewata. Wane china, “Runa najxigi Gita pnute muchkonurutu. Gi wa Gita gimukluni nyomshokinri nkoshpirokyaplu yoshmaklejixitsa. 
8Gita galikakni katgi gonuya. Wa Wale katangi Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya.”
 
9Wane gixlutkani walegognekaka. Nasare Kalilechijne runyatka Geso. Wane Gorta gapga Gwa katyalu Geso. 
10Waneklu wa gonu yotunotyatka. Retlu gitpukachri tengogne, wa Giwekikaluru motkoko pixka rixa, Wale gogwaka gijrukyachri. 
11Tengogne runya satu tokanchi wane chinachri, “Pixni Noturyi nalukanruyi. Pixa gigletanshinikanutno.”
 
12Waneklu wa Giwekikaluru ganiklu yineru mwiyawakanu. 
13Wane rawanata yineru mwiyawakanuya gepkoxamkojemolgogne. Wane rumlukanutyalu Satanasyo. Wane rawanata kmatsurunetskala. Goyakalutowrerune tengogne gajene gipxaklu.
 
14Waneklu kashichkoklunutka wa Gwa. Wanepnute Geso wane ya, Kalile ya. Runkaklewata Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi pogirewatyawakapirana. 
15Wane china, “Gigogne poyagkakatka. Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka gi gowukatkalu. Genshinikanutanu. Galixanru Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi.”
 
16Tsru wenustsi Kalile yapamta. Retlu Simo repuruyma Gantirishi, chalugjetachine tsru wenuya, wa kshimagaklerune. 
17Wane chinna Geso, “Ginanu gwagajxigitanno. Yine gwapjetachine nixkakanutkagi.” 
18Waneklutka ruknokamtatkaluna chalnena. Romkagitatkaluna.
 
19Wane rajrinya. Retlu Santiyako, Sewereyo wgene repuruyma Gwa. Wanna koxa kanawa gwanata. Ramtatluna chalkaka. 
20Waneklutka tomgana Wale. Ruknokamtluna rurna Sereweyo kanawaya kamrurewakleruneyma. Wane yana. Rawgajxigitluna.
 
21Kapernawo rapokinitkana, gapnanutikalurugognekaka jiglokjeta ginkaklewawakapji. Wane runkaklewlejetya. 
22Ruglajitna wa runkaklewleya. Gi rixanu runkakna tsru gitaakaluru pixkako rixa. Gi wa yonchikgapine pixka rixa. 
23Waneru runkaklewawaklepjiyna jeji wa kamchi puchotlewatachri waneyalutu. Wale saplewata. 
24Wane china, “¡Ya! ¿Gi pixannatkawu Geso Nasare gajeru? ¿Puna pumtukpotutapyapwu? Numatyi Kpashiryi Goyakalunu.”
 
25Geso chigetjetlu. Wane china, “Pochkepyi. Pushpakanutka waleya.” 
26Wa kamchi puchotlewatachri shipchojtakakanru jejni. Saplewjetana tsruplaji. Rushpakamtatka wa waleya.
 
27Pejnuruneko giglajita. Giyagni repomgakakna. Wane chinna, “¿Klunerni wa tye? ¿Klu gerotu ginkaklewlutkani wa tye? ¡Waleni wa tsru gitaakaluru pixka rixa! Wale yokanatna kamchine puchotlewatachine. Jemluna Wale.” 
28Waneklu pogiwata psolchijnepotunanuko Kalilesretaya.
 
29Wanepnute rushpakamtinitkana ginkaklewawakapjiya, wanna wane yana Simo, Gantirishipji, Santiyakoyma, Gwa koxa. 
30Wa Simo gimajiro gikluga. Tpachwata. Giyagni walapirana runkakluna. 
31Giyagni rapokinitka kosemyotlo, yotunkaklo. Tupachwalgamtatka. Wala gipxakatkana.
 
32Wa kayi rixinitka wa rumxikinitka tkachi ranikyegitluna pejnuruneko yayixachine, kamchichachine. 
33Wa pejnuruneko tsru pokchi gajene gapatjeta gipgyaptoya. 
34Geso gituukakna gixo yayixachine pnumnunanuka gixachri yayixluya. Wale giknokna maleka gixo kamchine. Gi ruchi yanumsaletna kamchine, gi rixanu rumatluna.
 
35Yotunomta goyechnokawpotuko, ma mumrereekanuwa. Rushpakamta. Wane ya yineru mwiyawakanu. Wane ragjigognetya. 
36Simo, waleymalune gijgalu. 
37Rukshikluna. Wane chinruna, “Pejnuruneko gijgayi.”
 
38Wane chinna Geso, “Wane gayanu papokchikaka gawastsitanune yegi. Wane koxa nunkaklewatini. Wale chinanukni nuna.”
 
39Wane ya. Runkaklewananumta runkaklewawaklepjikakayna psoluko Kalileya. Ruknokyana maleka kamchine.
 
40Satu gijirgitutachri ginyegitlu. Ragjipotutlu. Yoptsojityegitlu. Wane chinru, “Palukiniplu pumkata powratletno.”
 
41Geso getwamonutlu. Romyokyegitlu. Kamruklu. Wane chinru, “Naluklu. Powra pixinripa.” 
42Waneklutka gijirgitlu gitukyegitatkalu. Powratkalu.
 
43Rujretlu. Yokanatatkalu. 
44Wane chinru, “Gike punkakanu. Seyni pyanu. Sasertote pekakgitapinwa. Penekashatanru powranuya wa Moysisi yokanatanru. Walepni gipgujtalewlu wanna chinanu.”
 
45Wa wale gishpakamtatka. Yinuwaka ginkakletletlu gixo. Poshalpiranamtlu. Giyagni wa Geso gi wa gimkata gapokletlu gipgujewnaleta tsru pokchiya, seyni maleka rawanata yineru mwiyawakanuya. Runyegitluna Wale pnumnunanuka gajene.
1Gi gixogogne giknoginiwa, Kapernawo rapokatka. Yijnakyegitinitka panchitkalu, 
2rapatjekakna gixolune. Gi wa gipgyaptoko poyagotatka. Geso ginkakna wa tokanchi.
 
3Runna. Ranikyegitluna giktegachri. Ranikjene gepkoxamkoje. 
4Gi wa rumkata gapyegletluna gixo yine chinanu. Suswakluna wa washre Wale ginaple. Wane rixa kotpukleswatluna. Wane jijrukyaluna gijeko wa giktegachri giklugyawaka. 
5Geso getlu wanna galixle. Wane chinru giktegachri, “Wiwi, pmukochirkaka pkaspukikatka.”
 
6Wane koxa tuplanatna pimrine yonchikgapine. Wanna gishinikanuwata rajiyna. 
7Wane chinna wanna, “¿Klu chinanu wane china yanumsaleta wa tye? Mupashiregnuchi china. Gike gimkata kaspukmukochirewleta. Satupjeru Goyakalupje.”
 
8Giyagni rumata Geso Walenanuko wane rixanshinikanutinrina. Wane china, “¿Klu chinanu wane gixanshinikanuta tyekaka wa gajiya? 
9¿Girni wa myapretu potu? Wane chinikolu giktegachri, ‘Wa pmukochirkaka pkaspukikatka,’ ga wa wane chinikolu, ‘Pyotunotanu. Pkoschekjekotanu. Pyanutka.’ 
10Wa gimatyaplu wa Gita Yineru Wgenno tyechijneya gitaakalurno kaspukmukochiretjerupno,” wane chinru giktegachri, 
11“Pixa wane nchina, Pyotunotanu. Pkoschekjekomtanu. Pyanutka pupji.”
 
12Yotunomtatka. Waneklutka koschekjekomtatka. Rushpakamtatka pejnuruneko getanu. Giyagni pejnuruneko giglajita. Rumalwutluna Goyakalu. Wane chinna wanna, “¡Gi pagogneko wane pixkalutu weta!”
 
13Rumepe gishpakleta. Tsru wenu yatka. Pejnuruneko yine ginyegitlu. Wale ginkaklewyegitna. 
14Ruknogamta. Retlu Rewi Galgweyo wgene. Tuplanata girukotlewatachri wenutikowaka. Wane chinru, “Pomkagitanno.” Palnamtatka. Romkagitatkalu.
 
15Waneklu wane rawanatini Geso wa nikawakakwa Rewipji, gixna gijgawenutachine ga wa kmukochirerune nikawakakwa koxa rawanatna Gesoyma, yimaklene koxa. Gi rixanu gixolunni yine. Romkagitluna. 
16Wanena yonchikgapine. Wannanwa Gwariseyone koxa. Retanatluna nikyawaka wannayma kmukochirerune ga wa gijgawenutachine. Wane chinkanna wa yimaklenni Gwariseyoneya ga wa yonchikgapineya, “¿Gi rixatka wa wannayma nika, rura, wanna gijgawenutachine ga wa kmukochirerune?”
 
17Geso yijnakotlu. Wane chinna Wale, “Wa gichkolune gi galuklu kpinrewakleru, seyni yayixachine galuklu. Gi wa nuna ntomgiyapna poyagkakachine, seyni wanna kmukochirerune ntomginripni.”
 
18Wa Gwa yimaklene ga wa Gwariseyonenu gogajirewata. Runna. Wane chinruna, “¿Klu chinanu wanna Gwa yimaklene wa Gwariseyone yimaklene koxa gogajirewata, ga wa Pixa yimaklene gi wa gogajirewata?”
 
19Wane chinna Geso, “Gi rumkata gogajirewletna wanna kashimyolu getachine gnunrowatachri wannaymalutuwa, Gita pixka nyimakleneymano. Wa wannayma rawanatini gnunrowatachri gi rumkata gogajirewletna, xani pixka wa Gita gimwakopshinna nyimaklene. 
20Runinpatka pagogne wa gnunrowatachri konikolgognepatka wannayegiya. Waneklu rogajirewatanna wanna.
 
21“Gikena gamatlu wa muchkirgakatu mkachri gitsole. Wane rixkoklunu, waleko gerotu sama suskaklu gitsole. Wanepnuteyaka rixa giskakletanatka. 
22Gikena giyokgatlu winga gerotu, tsapkaka tsrutsoleji. Wane rixkoklunutka, winga suskakanru tsapkakni. Tuyokgata wino. Tsapkaka salewna. Seyni wa winga gerotu tsapa gerotu tutakgatka.”
 
23Wane rixa. Sana yapanata gapnanutikalurgogne. Yimaklene yanananumta. Yinuwaka sustakagwuremtluna gitaklugwu. 
24Giyagni Gwariseyone wane chinru, “Petanu. ¿Klu chinanu wane rixna gapnanutikalurgogne wa ginanshichkalurgogne?”
 
25Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gi ge pagogne getyongatlu wa gi rixpokota Tawi, magatini wa nachichini wale ga wa waleymalune? 
26Gi rixpoko jiglokletlu wa Goyakalupji, wa Gawiyatari walenwa sasertote gitsrukatpotu. Niklu jimaprokaka gekakgitkaluru. Wa walenwa ginanshichkaluru niklu. Sasertotenepje niklu. Reneekoxna rumotsane.”
 
27Wane koxa chinna Geso, “Wa gapnanutikalurgogne yine chinanu kamrutka. Wa yine gi kamrutka gapnanutikalurgogne chinanu. 
28Giyagni wa gapnanutikalurgogne koxa gitsrukatno Gita wa Yineru Wgenno.”
1Jiglokatnaklu ginkaklewawakapji. Waneru satu jeji giprigamyotachri. 
2Giruktatluna Geso wa gapnanutikalurgogne rutuukaklewatinri wa jigyegityapluna. 
3Wane chinru wa jeji giprigamyotachri, “Pyotunotanu ganikajiya.”
 
4Wane chinatnakna Geso, “¿Girni wa gapnanutikalurgogne muklukanutu kamrutkalurupa: waka kiglerge waka gektutlege? ¿Gognetkaklurge giweklu waka giylalu?” Ga wa wanna pochke.
 
5Reknojtayegitna. Jigekanuwata. Wamonuwna wa shikgaji rixinrina. Wane chinru jeji, “Pomyokanu.” Romyoka. Ruglewamyotatka. 
6Rushpakamtna Gwariseyone. Waneklutka Giroreyoneyma jemanshinikankakyegitluna Wale ruylatyapluna.
 
7Geso gitspalamta. Tsru wenu ya yimakleneyma. Romkagimtluna gixolune yine Kalile gajene Gote gajene koxa, 
8Gerosale gajene, Gitome gajene, ga wa pasreta Gorta gajene, Tirostsi gwachine, Sitostsi gwachine, gixolune yine. Jemyegitluna gi pixkalutukokta kamruta. Runyegitluna Wale. 
9Wane chinna Geso wa yimaklene galpokjixanutkalo kanawa gixolune yine chinanu ma machpakyanupluna. 
10Gi rixanu gi gepika rutuukaka. Giyagni rujirkojetna Wale gogo yayixachine pejnunanuka kamrukyapluna.
 
11Ga wa kamchine puchotlewatachine getinri yoptsojityegitluna. Saplewatna. Wane chinna wanna, “Pixni wa Goyakalu Wgenyi.” 
12Geso gijretna gixo gi rupgujetanruna.
 
13Kanika magka. Tomgana Wale gishinikanune. Runyegitluna. 
14Geso gitakna pamole gepi Waleyma gwachinepa, wa yokanatanunepa ginkaklewatachinepa, 
15wa kamchine maleka ruknokyapna. 
16Rutakna pamole gepi: Simo; wale rutakgiwakata Petro; 
17wa Santiyako, Sewereyo wgene; Gwa, wa Santiyako gepuru (Giwakatna Wowanerge; walenwa rutlogle pixkalune), 
18wa Gantirishi, wa Wilipi, wa Wartolo, wa Matiyo, wa Tomasu, wa Santiyako Galgweyo wgene, wa Tateyo, wa Simo Muchkopiranawatachri; 
19wa Gota Giskaryote samyokjerupa.
 
20Panchi rapokinitkana, rapatjetatnakna yine. Giyagni wa wanna gi gimkata nikletna. 
21Wa jempiranyegitluna wa Wale gimwanune. Runna kashichyapmakluna. Wane chinna wanna, “Sepronachrinatkani.”
 
22Gerosale yopikyana yonchikgapine. Wanna wane china wa waneylu Welsewo, wa tsru potu kamchiyma ruknokna kamchine maleka.
 
23Wa tomginitkana Geso, wane china yapkakluya, “¿Gi rixpoko maleka giknokletinwa Satanasyokakluko? 
24Wa pogirewatikowaka gajene wannakakluko kotspalanshinikankakmaka, gi rumkata gwagogneretna wa wale pogirewatikowaka gajene. 
25Panchi gajene wannakakluko kotspalanshinikankakmaka gi rumkata gwagognereta wa wale panchi gajene. 
26Wa Satanasyo yagotinmakwa walenanuko wa, kotspalanshinikanutinmakwa gi rumkata gwaleta seyni nikawnanu. 
27Gike gimkata jiglokletlu gipji gichkolu, chowgutyaplu rejnunkate ma mostutkanuwalu wa gichkolu. Waneklu chowgutyalu gipji gajeru. 
28Galikaka wane nchingi, kaspuukalurupni wanna yine wgenene pejnuruneko mukochirkakna, mupashiregnuchi girukokta mupashiregnuchi yanumatini. 
29Seyni girukokta wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri mupashichkatu, gike rixiniko kaspukiko seyni giklukanuwnachri mukochri gike rixiniko mnikawnakatupa.”
 
30Gi rixanu wanna wane china, “Waneylu kamchi puchotlewatachri.”
 
31Tuna runro, repurune koxa. Maleka rawna. Repukmakluna. 
32Wa gixolune yine ruxiplatjene wane chinruna, “Petanu. Malekna punro, pepurune. Rujgayina.”
 
33Wa Wale gigitna. Wane china, “¿Katni wa nunro, wa nepurune?”
 
34Retjetna ruxiplatanune. Wane china, “Getanna nunro nepurune. 
35Wa girukokta kamrutlu Goyakalu galukanru, ga ga walenwa nepuru, nepuro, nunro.”
1Rumepe yinuwaka ginkaklewleta tsru wenustsiya. Rapatyegitluna gixo potu yine. ¡Gi pejnunanukta! Giyagni ratskotatka kanawa. Wane tuplatatka tsru wenuya. Pejnuruneko yine chiji gwa, tsru wenuwnaga. 
2Runkaklewyegitna Geso yapkakluya gi gepikapirana. Wane chinna Geso runkaklewleya,
 
3“Gjemanu. Satu kgitaklewakleru gishpakamta rutaklewtapanu. 
4Wane rixa kopalajreta. Pimriji gatnugapostsi gapokajita. Runna koshichine teno yapachine. Niklokajitluna. 
5Pimriji sotlu gwiyawaka gapokajita mawiyawakanu potu kajpa. Waneklu rupcheknimka gi rixanu gi wa tenru kajpa. 
6Ga wa rushpakini tkachi jimanatkalu. Ma matskinu chinanu rupriganatka. 
7Pimriji kona yegi gapokajita. Tseruwna konkaka. Kapotanatkalu. Gi kajinatkalu. 
8Pimriji kiglewaka chiji, gapokajita. Wane jiwatya. Tseruwna. Ruxolewna. Rawa satu mapamoleji, satu patsrujirmoleji, satu satu pachaji.”
 
9Wane chinna Geso, “Kajnakopnalu wa yijnakotinripa, yijnakotanu.”
 
10Walepje rixini repomgaluna rawastsitanune pamole gepiyma wa yapkaklupiranaya. 
11Wane chinna Geso, “Ga wa gixa geneeka gimatyaplu giyogimanatkaluru Goyakalu pogirewatyawakapirana. Wa maleka gajene ginkaaka yapkaklupjeya pejnurukopirana.
 
12Retinna retanmakna, ma mumatinitipna.
 Jeminna, jemanmakna, ma mumata jeminitipna, ma kashrijetikotupna, 
 ma kaspukmukochiretkanupna.” 
 
13Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gi ge gimatlu tye yapkaklu? ¿Gi gixpoko gimatletanru ptowruko yapkaklu? 
14Wa kgitaklewakleru gitaklu tokanchi. 
15Ga ga wannanwa gatnugapostsi gwachine. Rutakikna tokanchi. Wa jeminitkana waneklu runa Satanasyo. Konyanna tokanchi rajna gitaakaluru. 
16Waneko pixka rixna wa gitaakalurune sotlu gwiyawaka. Wa jeminitkaluna tokanchi waneklu yoptotluna rumuwleyna. 
17Gi wa waneyna gitskina wanna. Wa pshinitsonu gwachinepa. Wa runini salewakchi, wa kojwawakchi tokanchi chinanu waneklu rutspekaakana. 
18Pimrine gitaakalune wannanwa konyegirune wa tokanchi jemachine. 
19Wa kojwakanshinikanrukaka tyegogneya ga wa ponikolewlu yokwire ga wa getsotanrewlu pagixankakaya jigloka. Kapotlu tokanchi. Gi wa jiwatanatka. 
20Wannanwa gitaakaluru kiglewaka chiji, wa jemachine tokanchi. Wanna yoptotlu. Jiwatna, satu mapamoleji, satu patsrujirmoleji, satu satu pachaji.”
 
21Wane koxa chinna Geso, “¿Taniikege yochpikjetkalurompuko wa gimatumpuko ga wa shechimpuko tutakikolupa? ¿Gi ge katalo kgapiko tutakikolupni, wa tpokamlatinripa? 
22Gi rixanu maleshlu wa yogimatkaluru ma mupgujetikotupa. Gi wa pochkeruko mpogijetkotupni. 
23Girukokta kajnakopnalu wa yijnakotinripa, yijnakotanu.”
 
24Wane koxa chinna Geso, “Xakoka gyijnakotanru. Wa yantapi gixa yantajetinro, walako yantatingina gixanuko. Gyognikyegitko gixapa. 
25Wa waneyalutu wanepnute reneeka. Waneyamigjetu wane rixle konikona.”
 
26Wane china Geso, “Wane rixa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka wa satu jeji gitaklu giji chijiya. 
27Rumka, yotunota, goyechno ga wa gogi. Wa kajiruji gipcheka. Tseruwna. Gi rumata gi rixpokota. 
28Walenanuko jiwkaknawa wa chiji. Muchinanu yosnukapcheta; wanepnute gigwutka, wanepnute giji galixachri gigwuya. 
29Wa ralijitinitka waneklutka gistakapi rustajikatka gi rixanu rapokatka gipapko jirgikolupa.”
 
30Wane china Geso, “¿Giru wutakanru wale pixkalutu pogirewatyawaka Goyakalu? ¿Giru yapkaklu wutakanru? 
31Wa mostasaji pixka rixa. Wa chiji rutaakoklunu walenwa mtserutu ptowruko kajiruji giyagokolutu wa chijiya. 
32Wa rali gitakletkoklunutka. Rupcheka. Tseruwna tsru potu ptowru kshana gitaakaluru pnute. Tsruplukakni. Giyagni koshichine tengogne gajene gimkata gwaleta gichiklempuko.”
 
33Gixo tye pixkalutu yapkakluya Wale ginkakna tokanchi wa rumkata jemletyawakna. 
34Ga wa yapkaklu migje gi wa runkakna Geso, seyni Waleko yimaklene wannapje rixini runkakpokowakatna ptowruko.
 
35Wa walegogne wa kayi rixinitka wane chinna Geso, “Wakanu gayanu.”
 
36Wa yokanatkatkana gixolune yine. Waneklu ranikatkaluna yimaklene kanawaya. Wane koxa yana pimro kanawkaka Waleyma. 
37Yopyoka tsru kannipgyalu. Tuygajetlo gishpurga kanawa. Giyagni katsepgatkalo kanawa. 
38Tostsi rawananumta. Rumkananumta rutspannojreya. Komyekluna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, ¿gikenna rixyi wa wupninripatka?”
 
39Wa yotunotinitka chigetjetlu kannipgyalu. Wane chinru wa tsru wenu, “Pochke. Pushyanamatanu.” Rutuka wa kannipgyalu. Mayegixgataa rixanatka.
 
40Wa wane chinna Geso, “¿Klu chinanu mpikatka? ¿Klu chinanu gi galixgognenatawa?”
 
41Pikna tsru piklu. Wane chinkakna wannakakluko, “¿Katni wa Tye? Wa kannipgyalu wa tsru wenu jemyawaklu.”
1Wakanu yana tsru wenuya Gerasenonesreta. 
2Wa ruptekinitka kanawaya, waneklutka yoptotaplu satu jeji yomlechi gajeru. Kamchi puchotlewatachri waneyalutu. 
3Yomlechi yegi gwachrini wale. Gikeko gimkata gosturetatkalu, gi wa yowumatsayakoxapa. 
4Wa gi gepi kata wane rostutkamkatka supoya yowumatskoxaya. Wa yowumatsni rustonjemtana waleya. Wa supni tutskinjemtana. Gikena poyago gipuchkakletlu. 
5Psolyechnoko psolgogneko wane rixa saplewjenanumta magkaya yomlechkakaya. Rustajitnawa sotluya.
 
6Wa retinitkalu wa Geso gowukayako rasukamta. Yoptsojityegitlu. 
7Saplewata. Tsruplaji rixa. Wane china, “¿Gi pixanutkano Geso, Goyakalu teno potu Gajeru Wgene? Kachingagjire nixyi Goyakalu kawchinanu, gi wa psaletpotutanno.”
 
8Gi rixanu Geso wane chinatkalu, “Pushpakyegitanru tye jeji, kamchi puchotlewatachri.”
 
9Geso gepomgalu, “¿Klu giwakyi?”
Rugitlu. Wane china, “Ngiwaka Gixoluru, wa gixolurunpotwu.” 
10Wa ragjitlu maleka ma yokanatyaplu tyesretaya.
 
11Wanenanru magkastsi gixoluru kochi. Nikanatna. 
12Ragjitluna pejnuruneko kamchine. Wane chinna, “Kochi yegi pyokanatanunwu wa wanna wjiglokyapa.” 
13Geso gichichna. Rushpakamtatkana kamchine puchotlewatachine. Kochinni jiglokamtatkana. Gixolunni kochinni gipjita gijrukyanatka. Tsru wenu rapokanna. Wanegetkonna gepi waragka. Tsru wenu gagyekyachinena.
 
14Wanna kochi girukotachine gasukamta. Runkaklewtapna tsru pokchiya, ga wa sana gajene koxa. Runatkana retapyapluna klunerukta wane gixkaluru. 
15Runyegitluna Geso. Retluna wa kamchitpachri wa gixoluru gwanatanru. Tuplanatatka. Kamkatkalu. Kanshinikanutkalu. Pikanna. 
16Retanatjene ginkakna gikta rixpokonatka wa kamchitpachri, wa kochinepirana. 
17Yinuwaka gagjiretluna Geso wa rushpakinripa wannasretaya.
 
18Ratskota kanawa. Wa kamchitpachri gagjitlu wa Wale yegi rawinripatka. 
19Geso gi galuka ganikletlu. Wane chingonuklu, “Pupji pyanutka pumwanune yegi. Punkakanna gikta rixpokotatkayi Gitsrukaachi. Wale punkakanna retwamonutyayi.” 
20Ralimta. Yinuwaka ginkaklewletatka Ntekapoliya gikta rixpokotatkalu Geso. Pejnuruneko gimyeka.
 
21Koprugatatnaka Geso kanawaya. Wakanu ya. Rapatyegitluna gixo yine. Tsru wenuwnaga rawa. 
22Runa satu wa tsru gitaakalurune ginkaklewawakapji gajenyegiya, Gayro giwakatletachri. Retinitkalu yoptsojityegitlu Gesojixistsiya. 
23Wane chinru, “Wuya wanepnawakla nshicho wgeneji. Petapanunro. Tupnakastsinatkani. Putakamyogogotanunro tutskalginripa. Tuwekanu.”
 
24Geso waleymamnutka. Romkagimtluna gixolune yine. Rachpakluna.
 
25Sato suxo gigragalewatachrona. Pamole gepi walapu gigragalewatachrona. 
26Gixo kpinrewaklerunyegimka tyanitka. Wanna chinanu tsalewna gixo. Tnikatlewatanatka ptowruko walanuko tixinri. Gikena gipxakanro. Seyni taalinanumtana. 
27Tjempiranyegitinitkalu Geso, tuna Wale gajxigiya wa gixolune yine yegi. Tkamrukamkatlu. 
28Wa wane china wala, “Nkamrukamkashatinri nutskalganu.” 
29Waneklutka tograga gitskikatka. Tumatnawa tomaneya tuglewatinritka wa tsalewnanatinri.
 
30Waneklutka Geso gimatatka Walenanuko rushpakamtyatka giyaklu. Ruprotaka wa gixolune yine yegi. Wane china, “¿Katu kamrukamkatno?”
 
31Wane chinruna wa yimaklene, “Gi ge petna wa gixolune yine gachpakyawakyi. Seyni wane pchina, ‘¿Katu kamrukno?’ ”
 
32Wale geknojtata retyaplo katukta wane gixlu. 
33Wa suxo pika. Tutatata. Tumata wa wala gixyawaka. Tuna. Tyoptsojityegitlu Wale. Tunkaklu ptowruko galikaka. 
34Wale wane chinro, “Wiwi, palixle gitskalakyi. Pyanu. Kiglenshinikanpatkayi. Kiglepatkayi wa psalewninrinanutka.”
 
35Yanumsatiniwa Wale, ginkaklewawakapji gitsrukatepji runyana pimrine. Wane chinna, “Pshichni tupnanatka. ¿Klu chinanu pkojwakawalu Yimaklewatachri?”
 
36Seyni Geso jemashatlu tye tokanchi wane chinkaluru. Wane chinru tsru gitaakaluru ginkaklewawakapji gajeru, “Gi pumyekanu. Palixashatanu.”
 
37Gi wa ruchichlu wa satu gininripa Wale gajxigi ga wa Petro, wa Santiyako, wa Gwa, repuru wa Santiyako 
38Wane ya gipjiya ginkaklewawakapji gitsrukate. Retlu sejrechi, chiyagatachine, saplewjepotutachine. 
39Jiglokamta. Wane chinna Geso, “¿Klu chinanu nsejrewna nchiyaganata? Wa mturo gi tupna seyni tumkanata.”
 
40Ruxpiranatluna. Wale maleka giknokna pejnuruneko. Ranikna wa mturni giru ga wa tunro, ga wa Waleymalune koxa. Jigloka mturni gwiyawaka. 
41Ga wa kosemyotinitkalo mturni, wane chinro, “Talita komi.”  Walenwa yokaakaluru: “Mturo, pixa wane nchinyi, pyotunotanu.” 
42Waneklutka mturo yotunotatka. Tyanatka, gi rixanu waneyatkalo pamole gepi walapu. Waneklutka ruglajitna. Tsru giglajru rixna. 
43Wale gijretna gikena gimatanru. Wane china teneeko tnikanru.
1Rushpakamta waneya. Rapoka gichijne. Romkagitluna yimaklene. 
2Rapokinitka, gapnanutikalurgogne yinuwaka ginkaklewleta wa ginkaklewawakapjiya. Gi gepika yijnakotlu. Ruglajitna. Wanna wane china, “¿Ginaka rumatyalu Wale tyekaka? ¿Klu gimatkalewlunwa tye renekikolu wa Wale? ¿Gi pixkalutunanni ruyaklekaka kamrutkalurni gimyoya? 
3¿Gi ge kyosokoklerukni tye, wa Mariya wgene, wanna Gosi, wa Gota, Simo wanna yegwaklu? ¿Gi wa gewna wixayma repurone?” Wale rutspenshinikanutyana.
 
4Wa Geso wane china, “Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine kagwakpiratkalunni, seyni gichijnepjeya, ga wa gimolenyegisretaya, ga wa gipjiya mkagwakpiratkotni.” 
5Gi wa rumkata kamruretlu waneya wa satu ruyakleya. Rutuukakna psotsotajiko yayixachine, walepje. Wanna gogo rutakamyota. 
6Ruglajita wa ma malixleyna. Sajrukamta papokchikaka walesreta. Runkaklewata.
 
7Tomgana Geso wa pamole gepi. Wa yinuwaka yokanretna gepkaka. Tsru rutakna wa kamchine puchotlewatachine chinanu.
 
8Yokanatatkana gikena ranikanna wa gatnugapoya, satupjeru kanojerna; gi wa nikanruna, gi wa tsapako, gi wa sroschiko tsapaneyna. 
9Wa rutakanrona yoshmakjixrechishpatapje. Gi wa gepimkalu rutakanna. 
10Wane chinna Wale, “Ginakakokta gjiglokanu satu panchi, wanepji gwanu gishpakamtinpotunanuko waneya. 
11Wa pejnuruneko wa gma yoptotjenepa, gma jemjenepa, gishpakamtinpatka wa waneya giplokjiximtanu gistapjixipagi wa rumatikolupa wanna chinanu.”
 
12Rushpakamtatkana. Runkaklewatna wa yine genshinikanutanu. 
13Gixo kamchine maleka ruknokna. Ruyookana ringi gixo yayixachine. Rutukna.
 
14Pogirchi Girore jemyegitlu. Gi rixanu rumatkatka Geso giwaka. Wane china, “Gwa wa katlewatachri yotunota gipnachineya. Giyagni kgiyaklewaklerni Wale.”
 
15Pimrine wane china, “Giliyni.”
Pimrine wane china, “Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachrini. Satu tokanchi geneklewatachri pixka rixa.”
 
16Jeminitka Girore wane china, “Gwakni wale wa nustaknoojixanru. Yotunotatka.”
 
17Gi rixanu muchikawako Girore towyegitanru. Kashijixlu Gwani. Rostujixlu wa yoshmakwaka wa Giroryana chinanu repuru gnunro Wilipi. Wa wala ganunrota Girore. 
18Gi rixanu wa Gwa wane chinatkalu Girore, “Ginanshichkalurni wa pepuru gnunro waneyyi pixinri.” 
19Giyagni Giroryana gayegixlu. Taluka giylajixletlu. Gi tumkatlu. 
20Gi rixanu wa Girore piklu wa Gwa. Rumatlu wa wale jeji poyagkakachrini wa kpashirni. Girukotlu. Giyagni jeminri gi rumatanshinikanuta. Yijnakotlu rumuwleya.
 
21Runa pagogne ruglepoktapini wa Girore wa poyagkakawalaputetini. Meyiwlu nachnewlupa kamruta wa tsrukakalune, tsru gitaakalune, wa wanna potu Kalile gajene chinanu. 
22Tjiglokamta Giroryana nshicho. Tansata. Tmeyitlu Girore ga wa waleyma gwanatachine nikawakakwa. Pogirchi wane chinro makloji, “Pagjitanno klunerukokta paluka. Gita genekanyi.”
 
23Wale kawchinau wane chinro, “Pagjitanru pejnunanuka nenekanyi. Ganikajiko npogirewatyawakaya nenekanyi.”
 
24Tushpakamta wala. Wane chinro tunro, “¿Klu nagjitanu?”
Wala wane china, “Wa Gwa katlewatachrijiwu pagjitanu.”
 
25Waneklutka giyampotu tjiglokyegitlu pogirchi. Tagjitlu. Wane chinru, “Naluklu xawakniko, penekyapno satu kotajipi Gwa Katlewaklerujiwu.”
 
26Wa pogirchi wamonuwnapotuta, seyni Wale kawchinanu chinrekaka, waleyma gwanatachine nikawakakwaya chinanu, gi raluka giknokakletokanuta. 
27Waneklutka pogirchi yokanatlu satu girukotjeru. Yokanatlu ranikjiwutikolupa. Wa wale wane ya. Rustaknojitlu yoshmakawakaya. 
28Ranikjiwutatkalu kotajipiya. Reneklo makloji. Wa makloji geneklo tunro.
 
29Jeminitkana wa yimaklene, runna. Ranikluna gimane. Yomlechi rutakluna.
 
30Yokanatanune rapatjetna Geso yegi. Runkaklewyegitluna ptowruko klunerukta kamrutanrunapirana, wa runkaklewtapinrina. 
31Geso wane china, “Ginanu gixa mkoje yineru mwiyawakanuya. Gapnanutanu pshinitsonu.”
Gi rixanu gi gepikna wane ginachine yachine. Gi wa kagognena nikinripna.
 
32Ralimtna wanna mkoje sato kanawaya yineru mwiyawakanu. 
33Gixo geta yaletna. Rumatkana. Wane rasukyegitluna chijiya ptowruko tsru pokchikaka gajene. Wanna gapka gapoka. Rapatyegitluna Geso. 
34Ruptekamta Geso. Retna gixolune yine. Retwamonutna gi rixanu gowegane pixka rixna gi waneyna girukotjerna. Yinuwaka ginkaklewyegitna gixopirana.
 
35Wa kayi rixinitka yimaklene gapyegitlu. Wane chinna, “Gewni yineru mwiyawakanu. Wa kayitkani. 
36Pyokanatanna yine wa sana yinripna, wa pokchikaka tyesretaya wa ragjityapluna nikanrupna.”
 
37Rugita Wale. Wane china, “Gixa genekanna nikanropna.”
Wane chinruna, “¿Wanerge gayanu? ¿Wagjitanro jimapro gepi pachproji wenroloto, wenekyapna nikinropna?”
 
38Wale wane china, “¿Gi pejnu jimapro waneygi? Getapanro.”
Rumatinitkana. Wane chinna wanna, “Pamyo. Gepi shima.”
 
39Towutna wanna tuplatinripna pejnuruneko paptogkaka peklomta poleru. 
40Tuplatna paptogkaka satu pachkaka ga wa pamyomolkaka koxa. 
41Geso kashichlo pamyo jimapro ga wa gepi shima. Tengogne yigata. Ruglenshinikanyegitlu. Wa jiknajrotlu jimapro. Renekna yimaklene rutspamtinripna. Raneksatkana wa pejnuruneko wa gepiroto shima koxa. 
42Nikatkana pejnuruneko. Jinanutkana. 
43Koschekluna psojkaka pamole gepi kojita katsepo, ga wa shima koxa. 
44Wa nikachine pamyo waragka jejine.
 
45Waneklutka kanawa ratskojixatkana yimaklene wa Wetsayta gapka yinripna wakanu. Wane yakopshinna yokanatna gixolune yine. 
46Rali gingaletinitkana wane ya magka. Ragjigognetapa.
 
47Wa kayi rixinitka wa kanawa ganikajgatkalo tsru wenuya. Walepje chiji gwatka. 
48Retna kegeknanuwatna ranikgatyawakna. Wa kannipgyalu satkakanna. Wa goyechnokawpotuko Geso ginyegitna. Tsru wenumta yapananumta. Raluka giknoglemtna. 
49Retinitkaluna wa tsru wenumta yanamtyawaka. Kagwakluna pagixanu. Saplewatanna.
 
50Gi rixanu pejnuruneko getlu. Rumyekanna. Waneklutka Geso giynumatna. Wane china, “Kiglenshinikanupgi. Gitni. Gi wa mpikanu.”
 
51Ratskota kanawa wanna yegi. Rutukamta kannipgyalu. Ruglajpotutanna. 
52Gi rixanu gi rumata jemluna wa jimaprokakapirana. Shikowgajitna wane rixinrina.
 
53Wa koprugatinitkana, wane yana Genesarchijne. Rutspakatkana. 
54Ruptekinitkana wa kanawaya, waneklutka rumatkatka Geso. 
55Rasuktatna psoluko walesretaya. Yinuwaka gwapletkana pnumnu gajene yayixachine gijekoyna ginakakta jemyegityawakluna. 
56Ginakakokta rapoka pokchikaka, tsru pokchikaka, sana, rutaakana giputkaka yayixachine. Ragjitluna wa kamrukashatyapluna gimkaluptostsiya. Wa pejnuruneko wa kamrukachine wanna gitskalgatka.
1Rapatyegitluna Gwariseyone, pimrine koxa yonchikgapine wa Gerosale giyakatyachine. 
2Wanna getinna wa pimrine Wale yimaklene nikyawakna gimyoyna gimuteru, walenwa merkakotu yangakanna. 
3(Wa Gwariseyone, pejnuruneko Gote gajene waneyna giykolu rutsrukateynina wa gixo kata ma meromyogkanna ma merkakanotkanna gi wa nikanna. 
4Giputu ruyakatyana ma powratkannuwana gi nikanna. Gixo pimripirana wa yoptotanruna kamrutanruna, wa gerkikaluro wa girapkaka, gashgajkaka, yowumaswagkaka.)
 
5Repomgaluna Gwariseyone ga wa yonchikgapine, “¿Klu chinanu wa pyimaklene gi wa wane rixna wa gitsrukaachinni giykole, seyni nikna wa gimyoyna gimuteru?”
 
6Geso wane china, “Sanowashatachingi. Goyakalu tokanu kigle reneklewata Gisayiya gixapirana. Wane rixa yonatkaluru:
 Nyi yine gispuyna kagwakpiratno 
 seyni rajiyna wajra yanna Gitaya. 
 
7Magijeru yonogleyegitnona.
 Runkaklewatna wa Goyakalu tokanu pixkalutu 
 wa yokanrekakna wa yine. 
 
8Wa gixa giknoklu Goyakalu yokanatanru tokanchi. Waneygi wa yine giykole.”
 
9Wane chinkoxna Geso, “Kigle giknokle gixlu wa Goyakalu yokanatanru tokanchi wa gomkagityaplu wa gixako giykole. 
10Wa Moysisi wane china, ‘Pkagwakpiratanru puru punro.’  Wane koxa china, ‘Girukta gogimtukaklu ruru, runro walepni wa gipnanu.’  
11Ga wa gixa wane china, ‘Wa satu jeji wane chininri wa ruru ga wa runro, “Ptowruko gitanu wa wale gipxakyapmakyi, korwani” ’ (Walenwa genekashlu Goyakalunupa). 
12Gixa gi gichichanutkalu pagixanu kamrutinripa ruru, runro chinanu. 
13Gixa kaspuklu wa Goyakalu tokanu wa giykole chinanu wa gixako genekanru. Gixo wale pixkalutu gkamruta.”
 
14Wa tomgatnakna gixolune yine. Wane chinna Geso, “Gyijnakotanno pejnurunekgi. Gimata jemanu. 
15Gike wane wa yineru malekate wa jiglokinripa rumkata puchotletyaplu, seyni wa yineruyako gishpakyachri walenwa puchotlu wa yineru. 
16Girukokta kajnakopnapa wa yijnakotinripa, yijnakotanu.”
 
17Rutspalamtinitka wa gixolune yine yegi, jiglokinitka panchi, repomgaluna yimaklene wa yapkaklupiranaya. 
18Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gixa koxa wane gixa mumatjemkangi? ¿Gi ge gimata jemlu wa pejnuruko maleka gwachri wa jigloklu yineru gi rumkata puchotletlu? 
19Gi rixanu gi wa jigloklu wa raji seyni ginanwakapje. Rushpaka gichkajetyawaka.” Wale powratlu ptowruko niikaluru.
 
20Wane china, “Wa yineruya gishpakyachri, ga ga walenwa puchotlu yineru.
