21Wa gitoko rajiyna yine rushpakya gektutu shinikanchi, gimopatlewlu, gapoklewlu, giylalewlu, 
22chowguchkaka, gimkapnuglu, muglenchi, yokwikaklu, mpogijpatnuchi, sotanugnuchiygale, mupashiregnuchi, tserpiranawlu walenanuko, sepronchi. 
23Ptowruko wa tye muglenchi gishpaka gitokoya. Ga ga walenwa puchotlu yineru.”
 
24Wane yiyatka Geso. Tirosreta ga wa Sitoya yatka. Jiglokamta panchi. Wale galuklu gike ma mumatyanupa, seyni gi rumkata yogimleta.
 
25Seyni waneklutka tjemyegitlu sato suxo. Tshicho wgenejni waneyanro kamchi puchotlewatachri. Tuna. Tyoptsojityegitlu gijixistsi. 
26Wa suxni Kriyko, Sirogwenisanemole. Tagjitlu ruknokyaplu maleka kamchi tshichoya.
 
27Geso wane chinro, “Petashgapkatanna jinanu rixinripna yine wgenene. Gi kigleru kashichikolupa wa nikanruna wgenchine, ruknokikolupa kewene yegi.”
 
28Tugitlu wala. Wane chinru, “Gigi, Gitsrukaachi, seyni wa wanna keweneko nikawakakwa rapukote nikyaluna wa mturune gipopejre.”
 
29Wale wane chinro, “Tye tokanchi chinanu pyanutka. Wa kamchi gishpakyatkalo wa pshicho.”
 
30Talimta topji. Tetamtatkalo tshicho tukluganatatka tojeko, wa kamchi gishpakyatkalo.
 
31Wane yiyatnaka wa Tirosretaya. Sito yapamta. Tsru wenu Kalile ya, Ntekapoli ganikajite. 
32Ranikyegitluna satu majnakotu, myanumatkatu. Ragjitluna rutakamyogogotyaplu.
 
33Geso ganiklu yine mwiyawakanu Walepje. Yoshmakamyojita gijnakopnakakaya. Rutskagata. Kamrukannutlu. 
34Tengogne yigata. Kosennipgyapotuta. Wane chinru, “Gegwata.” (Walenwa: Putpukanu.) 
35Rutpukajnakopnatatka. Waneklutka rushpirokatka wa kashinatjeru wa ginnu. Yanumpotutatka.
 
36Yokanatatkana Geso gikena runkakanna, seyni gixkatmaka wane china wanepnuteko runkaklewamtna. 
37Tsru giglajru rixna. Wane chinna wanna, “Kiglepotlu ptowruko kamruta. Jemkakna majnakone. Wa myanumatkane yanumkaka.”
1Wa walegognekaka wanetnakna gixolune yine. Gi wa waneyanna nikanruna. Geso tomgana yimaklene. Wane chinna, 
2“Netwamonutna gixolune yine, gi rixanu waneyatkana mapgogne Gitayma. Maleshayna nikanruna. 
3Wa nyokanatinnatkana ma niikanna wa gipjina, rujxipakgapotanunna. Wa pimrinni gowuka giyakatyana.”
 
4Rugitluna yimaklene, “¿Ginaka giyakatyachro jimapro wa satu gimkata ginanuwkakletanunna gewi yineru mwiyawakanuya?”
 
5Geso gepomgana. Wane chinna, “¿Gi pejnu jimapro waneygi?”
Wanna wane china, “Payokgipre.”
 
6Yokanatna wa gixolune yine tuplatinripna chiji. Kashichlu wa payokgiprerutu jimapro. Poyagnutatka. Jiknajrotlu. Wa renekna yimaklene rutspamtinripna. Reneksatna gixolune yine. 
7Waneyna psotsotaji shima wgenkaka. Wale giglenshinikanyegitlo. Wa yokanatna rutspamtinripna. Rutspamtna gixolune yine yegi. 
8Nikatkana. Jinanna. Koschekluna wa gixetachri psojkaka payokgipre kojitaya. 
9Wanegetkona gepkoxamkoje waragka yine. Yokanatatkana. 
10Waneklutka ratskota wa kanawa yimakleneyma. Wane ya Talmanutasreta.
 
11Runna Gwariseyone. Yinuwaka yoptopiiretluna. Rujgaluna Waleya getkaluru tengogne gajeru. Yantaletluna. 
12Wamonuwnalenshinikanuya kosennipgyapotuta. Wane china, “¿Klu chinanu rujgaluna getkaluru tye gimuweekakgognenatachine? Galikaka wane nchingi, gi wa reneekona getkaluru tye gimuweekakgognenatachine.”
 
13Kaspukatkana. Kanawa ratskotatnaka. Wakanu ya.
 
14Ramtaka gwalemtluna nikanruna. Maleshayna. Satupje jimapro waneyna wa kanawa. 
15Yokanatna Geso. Wane china, “Xako. Ggirukotinwa wa gisekachriya wa Gwariseyonenu, wa gisekachri koxa Girorenenu.”
 
16Yoptopirkakna wannakakluko. Wane chinkakna, “Jimapro maleshaywu.”
 
17Geso gimatlu. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Klu gyoptopirkakya wa maleshaygi jimapro? ¿Gi ge gishinikanuwatawa? ¿Gi ge gimata jemanatawa? ¿Waneygi shikolu gaji? 
18Kaygalmakgi ¿gi ge geta? Kajnakmakgi ¿gi ge gjema? ¿Gi ge gishinika? Wa njiknajrotinitkalu pamyo jimapro wa pamyo waragkaneya ¿gi pejnu kojita katsepo wa psojkaka gkoschekyatkalu gixa?”
 
19Wanna wane chinru, “Pamole gepi kojita.”
 
20“Wa payokgipre jimapro wa gepkoxamkoje waragkaneya ¿gi pejnu kojita katsepo wa psojkaka gkoschekyatkalu gixa?”
Wanna wane china, “Payokgipre kojita.”
 
21Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gi ge gimata jemawalu?”
 
22Rapokna Wetsayta. Rawapluna Wale yegi satu maygaletu. Ragjitluna kamrukyaplu. 
23Geso kanjimtlu wa maygaletu. Raniklu pokchi kegneteya. Gitskaga sagaygaletlu. Rogwaka rutakamyoyegitlu. Repomgalu, “¿Gi ge petlu pa gixanu?”
 
24Rumrekgata. Wane china, “Netna yine, wa yanachine wa gagmuna pixka gixachine neta.”
 
25Rumepe gitakamyoyegletatnaklu wa giygale. Waneklu retatka. Ruglewatatka. Retashpotutatka gowuka ptowrupotuko. 
26Geso yokanatatkalu gipji. Wane chinru, “Gi wa pokchiko pyanu.”
 
27Yatkana Geso wa yimakleneyma. Pokchikaka ya Susari Wiliponu yegi. Wa gatnugapoya repomgiyna wa yimaklene. Wane chinna Wale, “Wa yine ¿katu wane chinna Gita nixinri?”
 
28Wanna gigitlu. Wane chinruna, “ ‘Gwa Katlewakleru;’ pimrine, ‘Giliya;’ pimrine, ‘Satu Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine.’ ”
 
29Wa Wale gepomgana, “¿Ga wa gixa katu wane chinno?”
Rugita Petro. Wane chinru, “Pixni Kristoyi.”
 
30Rujretna ma yanumsatinitipna Walepirana gikena.
 
31Yinuwaka ginkakletna wa Yineru Wgene salewninripa gixo, ma yoptotikotupa tsruneya, tsrukakalune sasertoteneya, ga wa yonchikgapineya. Ruylatikolupa. Yotunotanu mapgogne chininri. Wane chinru tye tokanchi gipgujetkaluru. 
32Wa Petro ganiklu. Yinuwaka chigetjeretlu. 
33Geso giprotakyegitna. Retjetna yimaklene. Chigetjetlu Petro. Wane chinru, “Najxigi pyanutka, Satanasyo. Gi rixanu gi pushiniklu wa Goyakalupirana, seyni wa yinepirana galikaka pushinika.”
 
34Tomgana Geso wa gixolune yine yimakleneyma. Wane china, “Katukokta galuka gwagajxigletno raalixinwa walenanuko. Rawanro koroshishkitate. Romkagitanno. 
35Girukokta galuka gishatkapletlu wa ruwekinri, ruwekinri ramginina. Girukokta gamtakanru ruwekinri Gita chinanu, Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi chinanu, rushatkapanru ruwekinri. 
36Gi rixanu ¿klu kigleyanaplu wa yinerupni psolchijnekmaka waneyapmaklu wane rixle, seyni ruwekinri ramgapotutinina? 
37Gi rixanu ¿klu rupekotanru yineru ruwekinripa? 
38Katukokta gipatewatanno ga wa ntokanuya koxa wa nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine yegi, kgimopataklerune ga wa kmukochirerunni, Gita wa Yineru Wgenno koxa gipatewatanru wale, wa nuninipa Nuru goyaknuya, wanna kpashirine Goyakalutowrerune tengogne gajene numuninipa.”
1Wane chinkoxna Geso, “Galikaka wane nchingi, pimrine gewi gwachine gi wa getumganru gipnalu ma metkanuwalunachi Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka ginachripa giyakluyma.”
 
2Patsrujirgogne rixinri, Geso ganikna Petro, Santiyako, Gwa. Ranikna wannapje satu magka tenolu. Wanna getanu satuko kogetkogatka. 
3Ga wa gimkalu yochigatatka klatpotlu. Wa giwru pixka rixa. Giyagni gi satuna kgerkakleru tye chiji gwachri gimkata klataa gixkakletlu tye pixka. 
4Wanna yegi rupgujewniyna Giliya ga wa Moysisi, Geso giynumsatachine.
 
5Petro, wane chinru Geso, “Yimaklewatachri, poyagnu gewi gawinri. Gewi wkamrutanru mapa gimajechri. Pixanupa satu, Moysisinupa satu, wa Giliyanupa satu.” 
6Gi rumata yanumatana, ga wa pikanna.
 
7Runa kyachgapererumko. Wale chikletyegitna. Waneylu tokanchi kyachgapererumkoya, wane chinachri, “Tyenwa Noturu nalukanru. Wale gyijnakotanu.”
 
8Pshinitsonu potu retanatinna, gikena retatkana wannayma. Gesopjetkani.
 
9Magka yopikyatkana. Yokanatna Geso gike runkakinripna wa retanruna, ma yotunotkanuwa wa Yineru Wgene gipnachineya. 
10Rushinikluna wa tokanu. Rugjekakna wannakakluko, “¿Klunerni wa tye, wa gipnachinyegiya yotunotini?”
 
11Repomgaluna. Wane chinruna, “¿Klunerni wa yonchikgapine chinanru wa Giliya gapkamka ginanu?”
 
12Rugitna Wale. Wane china, “Giliya galikakni rungapkatanu rugletyaplu ptowruko. ¿Gi chinpiranata koxa wa yonchi wa Gita Yineru Wgenno gixo nsalewninripa, ga wa gi nkagwakpiratko? 
13Seyni wane nchingi Giliya ginpatka. Wane rixluna klunerukokta ralukyawakna chinyawaka yonchi walepirana.”
 
14Runinitkana wa yimaklene yegi. Retna gixolune yine wanna yegi. Wa yonchikgapine yoptopiratna wanna. 
15Waneklutka pejnuruneko gixolune yine getlu. Ruglajitna. Rasukyegitluna. Ralukluna.
 
16Geso gepomgana, “¿Klu gyoptopiratyana wanna?”
 
17Gixolune satute gigitlu. Wane china, “Yimaklewatachri, nanikyegityi noturu. Waneyanru kamchi myanumatkatu rixkakjeru. 
18Ginakakokta kashichyanru shipchojtakakjetanru. Soliwanamjetana. Raskereygitana. Ruprigananumtana. Wane nchinna pyimaklene ruknokyapluna maleka, seyni gi rumkatluna.”
 
19Rugita. Wane chinna Wale, “¡Ya nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine malixkane! ¿Gi pejnugognenanukta numwanutkagi? ¿Gi pejnugognenanukta nakotangi? Ganikyegitanno.”
 
20Ranikyegitluna. Retinitkalu waneklutka wa kamchi shipchojtakakpotutanru mturni. Chiji rapokamtana. Ruprurutana. Rushpaksolnamatana.
 
21Geso gepomgalu ruru, “¿Gipshini wane gixlenatkalu?”
Wale wane china, “Mturuyakawa rixini. 
22Gixo kata ruknoklu xirnachri, wa gonga koxa ruylatyapmaklu, seyni pumkatiniplu pupxakanunwu. Petwamonutanunwu.”
 
23Geso wane chinru, “Pumkata galixletinipa, ptowruko gimkata gixkota wa galixachri chinanu.”
 
24Waneklutka mturu giru saplewata. Wane china, “Nalixa. Pupxakanno nma malixlenuya.”
 
25Geso getna gixolune yine. Rasukamtna. Potowurutna. Chigetjetlu kamchi. Wane chinru, “Kamchi myanumatkatu majnakotu, Gita yokanatyi pushpakyegitanru wale. Gi wanepnuteko pjiglokanutkalu.”
 
26Saplewatana. Shipchojtakakpotutanru mturni. Rushpakamtatka. Walenitka gipnachri pixka rixanatka. Giyagni gixo wane china, “Rupnanatka.” 
27Seyni Geso kosemyotlu. Tunwakaklu. Yotunota.
 
28Wa jiglokinitka wa panchi yimaklene gepomgalu wannapje rixini, “¿Klu chinanu wixa gi wumkata giknokletlu maleka?”
 
29Wane chinna Geso, “Wa tye pixkalutu gi gimkata gishpakleta seyni gagjigognerupjeya.”
 
30Wa rushpakinitkana waneya, Kalile yapamtna. Gi raluka gimatkota. 
31Wa runkaklewyegitna Geso yimaklene. Wane chinna, “Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyookalurupno yinemyoya. Ruylatannona. Nupnanu. Nyotunotanu mapgogne rixinri.” 
32Seyni wanna gi gimata jemlu wa tokanu. Pika gepomgaletluna.
 
33Rapokna Kapernawo. Panchi rawinitka, Geso gepomgana, “¿Klu gyoptopirkakananumtya gatnugapoya?”
 
34Wa pochkena. Wannakakluko yoptopirkakananumtna wa gatnugapoya katni wa tsru potu.
 
35Tuplata Geso. Tomgana pamole gepi. Wane chinna Wale, “Girukokta galuka muchinanu gixleta, walepni wa gapkatpotutachri pejnuruneyapa. Pejnuruneko gipxakjetachrinapni.”
 
36Koscheklu mturu. Wanna ganikajite rutaklu. Kampuklu. Wane chinna Wale, 
37“Girukta yoptotlu satu tye pixkalutu mturu Gita giwakaya, Gita yoptota. Girukta yoptotno, gi Gita yoptota seyni wa nyokanatjeru galikaka.”
 
38Wane chinru Gwa, “Yimaklewatachri, wetlu satu wa pgiwakaya ruknokyana maleka kamchine. Wale gi gomkagitwu. Wujretlu gi rixanu gi romkagitwu.”
 
39Geso wane china, “Gi wa gijretanru. Wa gikena wane gixa giyakleta ngiwakaya wa rumkata pshinitsonu gektuchinretno. 
40Wa wma kamnixjetni wixasretni wale. 
41Girukokta genekangi sato girapistonoya gonu ngiwakaya gi rixanu Kristonungi, galikaka wane nchingi gi ramgini wenutikolupa.
 
42“Girukokta gitspeekaklu wa satu wa nyi mturune wa nalixjene Gita, kiglemkalu waleya rushriknojitikolupa wa tsru sotlu ginripiya, tsru wenu ruknokikolupa. 
43Wa pumyo gitspeekakinipyi pustakanru. Kigleyyi wa pjiglokinripa wa puwekinri mastsi, wanepnute gepimyoyi pixinipa wane pyanuna Gigena wa xirnachri muwnakatupa. 
44Wanna tsomne ma mupniyawaka. Wa xirnachri gike rixini ruwnanu. 
45Wa pujixi gitspeekakinipyi, pustakanru. Kigleyyi wa pjiglokinripa wa puwekinri yokmatachriyi, wanepnute gepijixyi pixinipa puknookona Gigena wa xirnachri muwnakatupa. 
46Wanna tsomne ma mupniyawaka. Wa xirnachri gike rixini ruwnanu. 
47Wa puygale gitspeekakinipyi, puknokanru. Kigleyyi wa pjiglokinripa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka paygalepjeya wanepnute gepiygaleyi pixinipa puknookona Gigena. 
48Wanna tsomne ma mupniyawaka. Wa xirnachri gike rixini ruwnanu.
 
49“Wa pejnuruneko tuwutkalurupa xirnachriya. 
50Kiglerni wa tuwu, seyni wa tuwu mushi rixinitka ¿klu gmorotanu? Waneyapgi gixnanuko tuwu. Kigle gimwakaklepgi.”
1Wane yiyatka. Gotesreta ya, Gorta wakanute. Rapatyegitatnakluna gixolune yine. Rumepe ginkaklewyegitatnakna wa rixjetyawaka.
 
2Rapyegitluna Gwariseyone. Repomgaluna wa muklukanutlege giknokagnunrolu wa gnurchi. Rumlukanatluna. 
3Wale gigitna. Wane china, “¿Klu yokanyegitgi Moysisi?”
 
4Wane chinruna, “Moysisi gichichlu kiruka yonatyapa ma ganunrotyanpatkalo. Ruknokanrotka.” 
 
5Wane chinna Geso, “Nshiknu gaji chinanu yonyegitgi wa tye Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru. 
6Seyni yinuwakyawaka giyaklewlu, jeji, suxo kamrutna Goyakalu.  
7Giyagni jeji giknokanna ruru, runro. Rupxaletanrotkani ganunro.  
8Wa gepinanna pamanepje rixanutkana.  Giyagni gi gepimanetkana, seyni pamanepjetkana. 
9Giyagni wa Goyakalu gapatanru ma mutspalkakinitipa wa yineru.”
 
10Wa panchiya repomgatnakluna yimaklene walekotnaka. 
11Wane chinna Geso, “Girukokta giknoklo wa ganunro, sato ganunrotinitnaka rumopatlewata wala chinanu. 
12Wa suxo giknokinri tganuru wa satu tganurutini, tumopatlewata.”
 
13Ranikyegitluna mturune wa kamrukyapna. Wa yimaklene chigetjetna wa ranikjerna. 
14Retinri Geso jigekanuwata. Wane chinna Wale, “Getashatanna mturune runyegitannona. Gi gimaletanna. Gi rixanu wanna pixkalune wannanni wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka. 
15Galikakni wane nchingi, girukokta gi yoptotanru Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka mturu pixka gi wa jiglokanruna.” 
16Kampukna. Wanna gogo rutakamyota. Ruglenshinikanyegitna.
 
17Gatnugapo yapananumtini, runyegitlu satu gasukamtachri. Yoptsojityegitlu. Repomgalu, “Yimaklewatachri kigleru ¿Klu nkamrutanu nyoptotyaplu wa nuwekinri gike rixiniko mnikawnakatupa?”
 
18Geso wane chinru, “¿Klu chinanu wane pchinno kigleru? Gi satuna waneru kigleru. Satupjeru, Goyakalupje. 
19Wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru pumata: Gi pumopatlewatanu. Gi puylalewatanu. Gi pchowguwatanu. Gi wa maleshawaka pupgujtalewashatanu.  Gi pyokwirewatanu. Pkagwakpiratanru puru ga wa punro.” 
 
20Rugitlu. Wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, pejnuruko tyekaka nkamrutatka nmaklutinyakawa.”
 
21Geso yopukgatlu. Raluklu. Wane chinru, “Satupje pmagatya. Pyanu. Pushankanru ptowruko wane pixle. Penekanna wa kwamonurune. Waneyapyi ponikolewlu tengogneyapa. Punanu. Pomkagitanno. Panikanru pkoroshishkitate.”
 
22Seyni wale yanshinikanpotutana tye tokanchiya. Ralimta wamonuwatachri gi rixanu waneyanru ponikowle gixo wane rixle.
 
23Geso geknokyegitna. Wane chinna Wale wa yimaklene, “Kyaprepotlu jiglokinripna Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka wa ponikolune.”
 
24Wa yimaklene giglajita wa tokanuya, seyni Geso gigitatnaka. Wane chinna Wale, “Wiwine, ¡gi payaprenanutkalu wa jiglokyapluna wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka wanna serojiproji gaponshinikanutachine! 
25Myapretmakni kameyo tsapujripna tjiglokinripa wa ponikolu pnute jiglokyaplu Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.”
 
26Wanna giglajpotuta. Wane chinkakna wannakakluko, “¿Katu gimkata gognetkaakotanu?”
 
27Geso yopukgatna. Wane china, “Wa yineru mumkatanutu, wale rumkata Goyakalu. Wa ptowruko rumkata Goyakalu.”
 
28Petro yinuwaka wane chinretlu, “Petanu. Wixa giknokamtlu ptowruko. Womkagitatkayi.”
 
29Giyagni Geso wane china, “Galikaka wane nchingi, girukokta giknokapjimta, yegwakane, repurune, repurone, wa ruru, runro, wugenene, wa rusanatkaka giknokachri Gita chinanu, wa Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi chinanu, 
30wale geneeko satu pacha kata pnute xani tyegognekaka, panchikaka, yegwakane, repurune, repurone, runrone, wugenene, rusanatkaka, kojwawakchi koxa. Pagognesha ginachripa reneeko ruwekinri mnikawnakatupa. 
31Seyni gixo muchichachine gapkatpotutanu. Gapkatpotutachine wannapni wa muchichachinpatka.”
 
32Wanena gatnugapo. Gerosale kanikna. Kosekamtna Geso. Ruglajitna. Romkagitluna pikachineko. Ranikatnakna wa pamole gepine. Yinuwaka Wale wane chinretna wane rixikolpatka: 
33“Xani Gerosale wkanika. Wa Gita Yineru Wgenno samyookotka wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, wa yonchikapine yegi. Ruklukanuwnayegjixannona nupninripa. Samyokannona payinyegiko. 
34Rapnokatannona. Kochipjetannona. Rutskagjetannona. Ruylatannona. Wa mapgogne giknoginpatka nyotunotanu.”
 
35Wa Santiyako Gwa, Sewereyo wgenene, rapyegitluna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, waluklu klunerukokta wagjityayi wane pixanwu.”
 
36Wane chinna Geso, “¿Kluneru galuka wa nixyapgi?”
 
37Wanna wane chinru, “Penekanwu Pixa wuxiplatanyi poyaknu yegi, satu potuklesretate, satu pkegnetesretate.”
 
38Wane chinna Geso, “Gi gimata wa gixa gagjitanru. ¿Gimkatge giiretyalo wa girapistono wa Gita girinro? ¿Gimkatge gkatletikolu wa katlu wa Gita katikolu?”
 
39Wanna wane chinru, “Wumkatlu.”
Wane chinna Geso, “Wa girapistono nurapre girini. Wa katlu wa Gita katikolu wale koxa gkatikolupa. 
40Seyni tuplalu npotuklesretate, wa nkegnetesretate gi wa Gitanni nenekyaplu, ga wa wannanupni galpokyegitkalunepni.”
 
41Wa jeminitkaluna, wa pamole yinuwaka gimtuwnaleta Santiyakoya ga wa Gwaya 
42Geso tomgana. Wane chinna Wale, “Gimata wa tsrukakalune kagwakikalune payinetskalaya towutlewpotutna. Wanna gitsrukatene tsru gitaaka wanna chinanu. 
43Seyni gi wane gixkakanu, seyni girukokta galuka tsru gixletnachriwa gixayegkakluko walepni wa gipxakjerupa. 
44Girukokta gixayegkakluko galuka muchinanu gixletnawa, walepni pejnurune wayegreru. 
45Gi rixanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno gi nuna nupxakikolupa, seyni nuna nupxaklewatinripa, nenekyaplu nuwekinri nwenutyaplu rushpakinripna gixolune yine.”
 
46Geriko yana. Geriko yiyatka Wale, ga wa yimaklene, ga wa gixolune yine. Wartimeyo wa maygaletu, Timeyo wgene, tuplanata wa gatnugapostsi, ragjigognenatlo sroschi. 
47Jemyegitlu Walenwa Geso Nasare gajeru. Yinuwaka saplewleta. Wane china, “Geso, Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanno.”
 
48Gixolune yine chigetjetlu pochke rixinripa, seyni wanepnuteyaka saplewjeta, “Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanno.”
 
49Geso tunwata. Wane china, “Ntomganru.”
Tomgaluna wa maygaletu. Wane chinruna, “Kiglenshinikanupyi. Palnanu. Tomgayi.” 
50Ruknoksapowlechratamta. Rupteka palnaleta. Yayegitatkalu Geso.
 
51Geso gepomgalu. Wane chinru, “¿Klu palukatka wa nixyapyi?”
Maygaletu wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, netinripa.”
 
52Geso wane chinru, “Pyanu. Palixle gitskalakyi.” Waneklutka retatka. Romkagitatkalu Geso wa gatnugapoya.
1Goliwa Magkatetkana. Gi gowukatkana Gerosalestsi, ga wa Wetpage ga wa Wetani. Wane yokanatyana gepi yimaklene. 
2Wane chinna Wale, “Gyanu tujra pokchi gixa ginaple gajeru. Pokchipotuko gapokinpatka wane gikshikinri mporo wgene tsatkaluru, gi satuna yineru mtuplatjitanutuwa. Gkoshrikanru. Ganikanru. 
3Girukokta wane chininipgi, ‘¿Klu chinanugkoshpiroklu?’ wane nchinanu, ‘Gitsrukaachi galuklu. Waneklutka yokanatanutnaklu gewi.’ ”
 
4Wane yana. Rukshikluna mporo wgene tsatkaluru gipgyapto maleka rutspalgapotyawaka. Koshpirokluna. 
5Pimrine wane gwanatachine wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu gkoshpirjetlu mporo wgene?”
 
6Wanna wane china Geso chinyawakna. Retashatkatkana. 
7Ranikatkaluna mporo wgene Geso yegi. Gimkalna sapwakatjitluna. Wale gogo tuplamtatka Geso. 
8Gi gepikna gikwekamkatachine gatnugapo. Pimrine gagmunasurkaka gistakamta. Rukwekamtluna gatnugapo. 
9Kosekamtachine ga wa kaptomtachine saplewjenanumtna. Wane china sapletna:
 ¡Wuya! ¡Gimalwutkaluru 
 ginachri Gitsrukaachi giwakaya! 
 
10¡Gimalwutkaluru wutsrukatni Tawi pogirewtapyawakni!
Waneplu pogirewatyawaka.
 ¡Wuya  tengognepotuya!
 
11Geso gapokamtatkalu Gerosale. Kpashiwakapji ya. Retjetinitkalu ptowrunanuka, kayi rixinitka rushpaka. Wa Wetani ya wa pamole gepiymananuko.
 
12Waleprika Wetani yamtyatkana. Nachlu. 
13Retlu gowukaya gikera kasureru. Yayegimtlu, wane getko rukshikinri pagixanu. Rapyegitinri gike rukshika. Gisurepjeni. Gi gipapkoni wa sagiwatinri wa gikera. 
14Geso wane chinanru gikerni, “Gikena niksagitanutkayi gike pixiniko.” Jemluna yimaklene.
 
15Wane yana Gerosale. Jiglokamta kpashiwakapji. Yinuwaka maleka giknokletna kgishanrewaklerunni ga wa gagjijetachinni wa kpashiwakapjiya. Yawnajkaklo kwalkaka gipekoserojiprojitachineni, motkoko gishanretachinni tuplapijere koxa. 
16Gi ruchichna Wale wa satuna ganikyalo kastonolo wa kpashiwakapji. 
17Runkaklewyegitna. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Gi ge yonatkaluru:
 Wa nopji gagjigognewakapji chinkalurupni 
 ptowruko payinerumnunanuko yegi? 
Ga wa gixa wane gixatkalu
gitawakapna kachowgurune gwiyawaka pixka.”
 
18Yijnakotluna wa tsrukakalune sasertotene wa yonchikgapine. Rujgaluna gi rixpoko giylaletanruna gi rixanu pikluna. Wa ptowruko yine giglajita runkaklewleya.
 
19Wa kayi rixinitka tsru pokchiya yiyatka Geso.
 
20Ruknoginna goyechnokawa, retluna gikera rupriganatka gitskiymananuko. 
21Petro gishinkapatka. Wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, petanru gikera pkamakpiratanruna rupriganatka.”
 
22Geso, wane chinna, “Galixanru Goyakalu. 
23Galikaka wane nchingi, katukokta wane chinru tye magka, ‘Puxrikanu. Wa tsru wenu puknokinwa.’ Gi wa shikpokwakgajitachriko, seyni ralixa wane rixanu chinyawaka, wanepotuko rixanu wale chinanupa. 
24Giyagni wane nchingi, ptowruko girukokta gagjitanu gagjigognetini, galixinri gyoptotanru, waneyapgi gixinripa. 
25Wa ntunwa gagjigogneretini, gkaspukinri wa waneygi gixinipa pnu gixjeru, wa gixa Giru tengogne gajeru koxa kaspukmukochiretyapgi wa gmukochirkaka. 
26Ga wa gixa gma kaspukinri, wa Giru koxa tengogne gajeru gi wa kaspukmukochiretanungi.”
 
27Satokna Gerosale. Yotaljeta kpashiwakapjiya. Runyegitluna wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, wa yonchikgapine, wa tsrune. 
28Wane chinruna, “¿Klu putakika pixa tyekaka pkamrutinri? ¿Katu gitakyi tyekaka pkamrutinri?”
 
29Wane chinna Geso, “Nepomgangi gixa satu tokanchi. Gigitanno. Wanepnute nunkakyapatkagi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri. 
30Wa Gwa katlewle, ¿tengogne giyakatyachrirge? ¿waka yinenukla? Gigitanno.”
 
31Yoptopirkakna wannakakluko. Wane chinna, “Wane wchininipmaka tengogne giyakatyachrini, Wale wane chinanunwu, ‘¿Klu chinanu koxa gi galixlu?’ 
32Ga wa wane wchiniplu, ‘Yinenni’ ”—wanna pikna gixolune yine, gi rixanu pejnuruneko kagwaklu wa Gwa walenwa Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri.
 
33Rugitluna Geso. Wane chinruna, “Gi wumata.”
Wane chinna Geso, “Gita koxa gi ginkakangi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri.”
1Yinuwaka Geso yanumsayegletna yapkakluya: “Satu jeji gitaklu sana gowasha. Pirijeretjetlo. Tapgatyawakapa jitota. Tenopjiru kamruta. Renekamtna sana girukotachine. Pnu yatka. Wajra ya. 
2Talixinipapko yokanatlu wayegrechri sana girukotachine yegi rawapyaplo wa sana girukotachinyegiya wa gwachrotka gowashaya. 
3Kashichluna. Kochipjetluna. Yokanatanruna maleshalni. 
4Rumepe yokanreyegitna satu wayegrechri. Ruylajiwutanruna. Rektutetluna. 
5Rumepe yokanretatnaklu satu. Waleni ruylatna. Pimrinnikoxni gixni. Kochipjetkanna pimrinni. Ruylatkanna pimrinni.
 
6“Waneyawalu satu gituru ralukanru potu. Yokanyegitna waleni koxa gapkatpotutachritka. Wane china, ‘Kagwakpiratanruna noturu.’
 
7“Wa sana girukotachine wane chinna wannakakluko, ‘Tyenwa yoptotachripatka. Ginanu. Wuylaganru. Yoptotanrupmaka wixanpatkani.’ 
8Kashichluna. Ruylatluna. Ruknokluna maleka gowashaya.
 
9“¿Gi rixpokotanu wa kgowashateru? Runanu. Ruylatanunna wa sana girukotachinepni. Renekanna gowasha pimrine. 
10¿Gi ge tye yonchiga getyongata?
 Wa sotlu myoptotkotu kamrupjitachineya, 
 Wale gitaaka yoptowaka gitsejita. 
 
11Gitsrukaachi chinanu kamrutka wa tye.
 Rakaglajiygaletwu.” 
 
12Raluka kashretluna. Wanna tsrukakalune pikna gixolune yine. Rumata jemluna wa wannapirana wa yapkaklu. Kaspukluna. Yatkana.
 
13Yokanyegitluna pimrine Gwariseyone ga wa Giroreyone wa kashtokanutyapluna. 
14Runna wanna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, wumatyi Pixni mayrokletyi. Gike pkagwakpirata. Gi petlu wa yinermanewle giglenu, seyni galikaka potu punkakwu Goyakalu gatnugapotepirana ¿Wa munanshichkotnige renekikolupa wenrukaka wa Susa waka gike? ¿Wenekerge waka gi wa wenekanru?”
 
15Wa Wale gimatlu rixashleyna. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Klu chinanu gimlukanutno? Ganikinno sroschiproji netyaplo.”
 
16Wanna ganikyegitlu. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Katu yaglunwa tye, ga wa katunni toyonga?”
Wanna wane chinru, “Susanni.”
 
17Wane chinna Geso, “Genekanru Susa wa Susanuko, ga wa Goyakalu genekanru wa Goyakalunu.”
Ruglajitna Waleya.
 
18Runyegitluna Sariseyone. Wanna wane china maleshaplu gipnachine yotunre. Repomgaluna. Wane chinruna, 
19“Yimaklewatachri, Moysisi yonyegitwu wa satu yegwakluko gipnini, ruknokagnunrotana, gi ruknokawgenetana wa repuru gwanro wale gnunronanni, ruxolewkakinripa giklopishapa yegwakluni chinanu. 
20Wanenannina payokgiprerune moletkakachine. Muchinanu tsru gnunrowata. Rupnana. Gi ruknokawgenetana. 
21Gapkatatachri gwatnaklo. Rupnana koxa waleni. Gi waleniko giknokawgenetana. Mapa rixinrini waneko pixka rixana. 
22Payokgipre gwalo. Gi wannaniko giknokawgenetana. Suxni gapkata potu gipnaletanatka. 
23Yotunruklupa yotunotinipna, ¿katu gnunropni wa wannaya? Gi rixanu payokgipreni gnunronitka wa wala.”
 
24Rugitna Geso. Wane china, “¿Gi ge mpupjeta gi rixanu gi gimatlu wa Tokanchi Yonatkaluru, gi wa Goyakalu giyaklewleko? 
25Wa yotunotinipna wa gipnachineya gi ganunrowatanutkana, gi kashimyokaakotkana, seyni wa Goyakalutowrerune tengogne gajene wannako pixka rixanutkana. 
26Wa yotunotachinepa gipnachinepirana, ¿gi ge getyongatlo wa Moysisi kirukate, wa Goyakalu giynumatyawaklu kawshipiriya? Wane china: Gitni wa Gawra Goyakalute, Gisaaka koxa Goyakalute, ga wa Gakowo koxa Goyakalutno.  
27Gi wa gipnachine Goyakalutni, seyni giwekachine Goyakalute. Giyagni gixni gamtakanshinikanpotutana.”
 
28Rapoka satu yonchikgapri koxa. Yijnakotna rugjekakyawakna. Rumata kigle gigle Geso gixna. Repomgalu, “¿Girni wa tsru potu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi pejnuruko pnute?”
 
29Geso gigitlu, “Wa muchinanu walenwa: Pjemanu, Gisrayili. Wa Gitsrukaachi Woyakalute, wa Gitsrukaachi satupjeru.  
30Pushinikanru Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute psolpotuyako pajiya, psolpotuyako punshinikanuya, psolpotuyako pmuchkonuya.  Ga ga walenwa muchinanu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi. 
31Gepi chininri tye pixka rixa: Pushinikanru pumole pixnanuko pixka.  Maleshlu satu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi tyekaka pnute tsru.”
 
32Wa yonchikgapri wane chinru, “Kigleru, Yimaklewatachri. Galikaka wane pchina, Satupjeru Goyakalu. Maleshlu satu. Walepjeni.  
33Wushinikanru psolpotuyako wajiya, psolpotuyako wunshinikanuya, psolpotuyako wmuchkonuya. Wushinikanru wumole wixnanuko pixka,  tyekaka ptowruko genekashlu yoxiikalurupa wa genekashlu giylatkalurupa pnute tsru.”
 
34Geso getinri wa yonchikgapri gigitlu rumatleya, wane chinru, “Gi wa gowukyi pogirewatyawaka Goyakalu.”
Gi satuna tserpiranawanshinikanyegitlu repomgiyatkalu.
 
35Kpashiwakapji runkaklewatya. Geso wane china, “¿Gi chinna wa yonchikgapine wa Tawiklopisha rixinri wa Kristo? 
36Wa waleko Tawi wane china wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya:
 Gitsrukaachi wane chinru Nutsrukate, 
 Ptuplatanu npotuklesretate, 
 Wa nutakinpotukna pkamnixjene pujixipta rapukote. 
 
37Waleko Tawi wane chinru Gitsrukaachi. ¿Gi rixpokotyawaka giklopishayapni?”
Gixolune yine rumuwleyna yijnakotluna.
 
38Wane china Geso wa runkaklewleya, “Ggirukotinwa wanna yonchikgapineya, galuka yanretachine gowuukalkaka gimkaluyna. Ralukluna ralukikolupna giputuya. 
39Ralukluna wa tsrukakalune tuplapijere ginkaklewawakapjikakaya, muchinanu tuplapijkaka koxa nikjetikowakaya. 
40Konapjijetkanna gipnagnurutachronni. Rixashleyna gogagjirgognerkakna. Tsru potu ruklukanuwnayegjixikolupna.”
 
41Tuplanata Geso tugnantakikowaka genekashlukaka ginaple. Retjetna yine gi rixpoko gitakletyaplona sroschi gignantakikowaka. Gixna ponikolune gitaklo gixo. 
42Tuna sato suxo gipnagnurutachro kwamonuro. Tutaklo gepi mturomchataaji. Walanwa satopje sintawo. 
43Tomgana Geso wa yimaklene. Wane china, “Galikaka wane nchingi, wa twu suxo gipnagnurutachro kwamonuro wala gitaklo pejnurune pnute gitakachine gignantakikowaka. 
44Pejnuruneko gitaklo ruxetanrona. Wa twu suxo twamonnupoga tutaklo pejnuroko walanu, pejnuruko tuwekinripa.”
1Wa rushpakamtini kpashiwakapjiya, satu yimakleru wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, ¡petanru gi pixka sotlerutkakananni, ga wa gi pixkapjirutunanni!”
 
2Geso wane chinru, “¿Petlu tyekaka tsru panchikaka? Gi wa rutukanu sotlu rogotkakinripa, gi wa mujrolekatunpakni.”
 
3Tuplatini wa Goliwa Magkateya kpashiwakapji ginaple, repomgaluna wanna mkoje rixinna, Petro, Santiyako, Gwa, Gantirishi, 
4“Punkakanwu. ¿Giklupni wa tyekakapa? ¿Klu getkaluru wanepa wa tye pejnuruko wa poyagkakinpatka?”
 
5Yinuwaka Geso wane chinretna, “Xako gi satunako yokwitangi. 
6Gi rixanu runanna gixo ngiwakaya, wane chinachinepa, ‘Gitni wa Kristono.’ Yokwitanunna gixopni.
 
7“Seyni wa gixa jeminiplu wa giylalupirana ga wa pogiwlesha giylalupirana, gi gkegeknanuwatanu. Rumkata wane gixleta, seyni gi wa yoptukyawakapnichi. 
8Gi rixanu ruylakakanna pachijne gajene ga wa pachijne gajeneyma, ga wa pogirewatyawaka giylakakanu pogirewatyawakayma. Waneplu giyolikchijrukaka pachijnemnunanukaya. Waneplu nachlukaka. Tyekakapni muchichachripa wa kachinolkakapa.
 
9“Gixako getinwa gixnanuko. Wa samyokangina jemanshinikankakyawakapna. Ginkaklewawakapjikakaya gkochipjetiko. Gitsrukaachine, pogirchine getanu gixapni tunwatanuna Gita chinanupa gipgujtalewlu waneyapna. 
10Muchinanu ptowruneko payinerumnunanuka runkakikolupna Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchiya. 
11Wa ganiikoklunpatka gixa wa nsamyookoklunupa gma mapookanupachi gi gkojwakinwa wa gixa chinyawakapa. Gi waleko gyanshinikanutanu, seyni wa genekikolupa gixa walepapkopa, wane nchinyawakapa. Gi wa gixni yanumsatachinepgi seyni Giwekikaluru Kpashiripni.
 
12“Gimole samyokanru rupninripa gimoleko ga wa ruru samyokanru gituru rupninripa. Wa wugenenna gimtuwnayegitanuna rurunepnina. Ruylajixanunna rurunepni. 
13Gayegixkalunepgi pejnuruneyako Gita giwaka chinanu, seyni wa kashnantakanshinikanutachripa yoptukyawakpotunanukopa walepni wa gognetkaako.
 
14“Wa getyongatachripa gimata jemanru: Wa getiniplu gagnanutkaluru gimtukpotlewatachri wane rawinri mawiyawakanupmaka, waneklu Gote gwachine gasukanu. Magkakaka yanna. 
15Panchi gogo gwanatachri wa rujrukanmaka, gi jiglokapjitanu ranikyaplu gipji gajeru. 
16Wa sana gwanatachri gi wa satkapanu rawapyaplu gimkalu. 
17¡Gi waneni wa kamshironepni ga wa gashichakachinepni walegognekakpatka! 
18Gagjigognetanu gi waneyapgi ginapuklu gasuktatinripa. 
19Wa walegognekakapa waneplu salewakchi wa mwajejetkatu wa muchi giyakletinitkalu wa Goyakalu giyakle, ga wa xanigognenanu. Gi wane rixanu. 
20Wa Gitsrukaachi ma sustakanmaklu walegognekaka gi pamanenapnikmaka gognetkaakona seyni tsomitkalune chinanu wa Wale tsomitanune sustaklu walegognekaka. 
21Giyagni satu wane chininipgi, ‘¡Gewru Kristo!’ ga wa wane chiningi, ‘¡Getanru. Waneru!’ gi wa galixanu. 
22Rupgujewnanna wale migje Kristone, wa wanna migje Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine. Kamrutanruna getkalurkakapa ga wa koglajrukakapa, yokwitikolupmakna tsomitkalune wa rumkatmaka wane gixleta. 
23Xako gixa. Nunkakatkagi psoluko ma mapookanuwa.
 
24“Seyni walegognekakpatka ruknoginpatka wale salewakchi,
wa tkachi gichpokanu.
Wa ksuru gi wa pokamlatanu.
 
25Wa katagirkaka gijirotanu tengogneyapa.
Wa gichkolkaka tengogne gajeru kowshiwshitko.
 
26Wanepnute retannona Gita wa Yineru Wgenno kyachgapererumkoya ginachripno.  Tsru nuyakle ga wa noyaknu numunanu. 
27Waneklu nyokanatanna notowrene tengogne gajene rapatjetikolupna ntsomitanune. Wa gepkoxamkojesretkakayako yoptukyawakpotuko chiji, yoptukyawakpotuko tengogne rapatjerewatinna.
 
28“Gimatanru yapkaklu gikerapiranaya. Wa tyosnuygalejiplutinitka, tupcheksuretinpatka, gimatanutkalu wa walapustsitkani. 
29Waneko pixka gixa getinpatkalu wane gixlutkani tyekaka, gimatanutkalu gi gowukpatkalu. Gipgyaptostsitkalu. 
30Galikaka wane nchingi, gi ruknoganu tye gimuweekakgognenatachinesha wa ptowruko tyekaka ma mixkanuwa. 
31Wa tengogne ga wa chiji giknoganu, seyni wa ntokanu gi giknoganu.
 
32“Seyni walegogne, wale gipapko gike gimata, gi wa Goyakalu towreruneko tengogne gajene, gi wa Gituruko, ga wa Girchipje galikaka gimata. 
33Giyagni giyokanu. Gagjigognetanu. Gi gimatlu giklupaktani gipapkopa. 
34Waneko pixka rixa wa jeji wajra yachri. Ruknokamtlu gipji. Rutakamtna wayegrene. Satkaka renekamta kamrure. Gipgyapto gwachri towutamta ruyokinripa.
 
35“Giyagni gixa giyokanu. Gi rixanu gi gimata giklu runanu wa kwangixlerupji, patako kayi, patako ganikajyechno, patako gaxawripa yanumatini, patako goyechnokawpotuko. 
36Wa rawraka ginretinipa ma mukshiikyanupgi gimkanatachingi. 
37Wa gixa nchinyagi wane koxa nchinna pejnuruneko: Giyokanu.”
1Gepigogne magatiniwa Tsru Giknoglushgogne wa Tsrugogne jimapro gisekachri myapjetkotu, rujgaluna tsrukakalune sasertotene, ga wa yonchikgapine gi rixpoko kashichyapluna gayroklewluya ruylatyapluna. 
2Wane chinna wanna, “Gi wa tsrugogne wkashichanru, ma mejnugimalewatinitipna yine.”
 
3Wetani rawanata Geso Simopji gijirgitutpachri. Tuplanata nikjetikowakaya. Tuna sato suxo. Waneylo pastono pgamlugalo nartogapje kwenuru potu. Tupokastonotlo. Tuyokjiwutlu. 
4Wanena pimrine gimtuwnachine wannananuko. Wane chinna wanna, “¿Klu chinanu wane tixa saletletatkalo pgamlugalo? 
5Wa tumkata gishankakotmaka wa twu pgamlugalo, wa mapa pachaproji pnute. Walamka kwamonurunni geneeko.” 
6Geso wane china, “Getashatanro. ¿Klu chinanu nsalewnakaklo? Kigleru kamrurchi tkamrutyano. 
7Gi rixanu waneygognenangi wa kwamonurune gixayma. Wa galukiniplu gimkata kigleru kamruyegletna, seyni gi waneygognenanupgi Gita. 
8Wa wala kamrutlu tumkatyawaka. Tuyokagnaputlo pgamlugalo nomane wa nkapnatikolupa. 
9Galikaka wane nchingi, ginakakokta runkakletiko Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi wa psolchijneko wa tye koxa tkamrutanru wala wane chinkalurupa wa tushinikikolupa wala.”
 
10Gota Giskaryote satu pamole gepi rixinri yayegitna tsrukakalune sasertotene samyokyaplu Geso wanna yegi. 
11Wanna jeminitkalu, rumuwatna. Rupiratyaluna renekyapluna sroschiproji. Rujgaluna ruglepoktapinri gi rixpoko samyokletyapluna.
 
12Muchinangogne jimapro gisekachri myapjetkotu wa renekashatinrina giylatkalurupa wa Tsru Giknoglushgogne chinanu, yimaklene wane chinru, “¿Ginaka paluka yokanretwu wa walpokotyaplu wa pnikanrupa Tsru Giknoglushgogne chinanupa?”
 
13Yokanatna gepi yimaklene. Wane chinna Wale, “Tsru pokchi gyanu. Wane yoptotingi satu jeji wa gashgaji gonu gwanru ganikachri. Gomkagitanru. 
14Ginakakta jigloka wane nchinanru wa kapjiru, ‘Yimaklewatachri wane china, “¿Ginaklu wa napokagrukowakle wa nnikyawakapa Tsru Giknoglushgogne nyimakleneyma?” china.’ 
15Wale gekakgitangi satu teno gajeru tsrugruko gali galpokletkalurutka. Wane galpokotinri wixanupa.”
 
16Wane yatkana yimaklene. Tsru pokchi yatkana. Rukshikluna Wale chinyawakpotukna. Ralpokotluna Tsru Giknoglushgognenupa.
 
17Wa kayi chininitka wane ya wa pamole gepiyma. 
18Wa tuplatinitkana nikawakakwa, nikna. Wane china Geso, “Galikaka wane nchingi, wa satu gixate numnikjeru, wale samyokanno.”
 
19Wa wanna yinuwaka wamonuwleta. Wane chinna wanna satkaka, “¿Gitgetkopni?”
Satu koxa, “¿Gitgetkopni?”
 
20Wane chinna Geso, “Wa satu pamole gepi rixinri, wa gigakachri Gitayma kolpetoya. 
21Galikaka Gita wa Yineru Wgenno wane nyanu chinyawaka wa yonchi Gitapiranaya. ¡Gi waneni wa tye jeji, wale chinanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyooko! Kiglemkalu tye jeji chinanu ma mushpaakanmaka.”
 
22Wa nikanatinna wanna, Wale kashichlu jimapro. Ruglenshinikanyegitlu. Jiknaglu. Wane gixachri renekna. Wane china, “Gyoptotanru. Tyenwa nomane.”
 
23Wale kashichlo girapistono. Poyagnutatkalo. Renekna. Rurna walaya pejnuruneko.
 
24Wane chinna Wale, “Tyenwa nograga wa gerotu tokanchi gipiratkaluru chinanu, gixoluru yineru chinanu giyookaluru. 
25Galikaka wane nchingi, gi wa nuranutkalo gowajiga wa walegognepotuko wa nuranro geroto wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawakaya.”
 
26Wa wanna shikaletlu gimalwuru. Rali shikaletinitkaluna, Goliwa Magkate yana.
 
27Wane chinna Geso, “Pejnurunepnikgi gixapni gitspeekaakona. Yonatkalurutkani:
 Nuylakanru wa girukotapratachri. 
 Rupalatanna wa gowegane. 
 
28Nyotunotanu. Nali yotunkakletkoklunpatka, Gita gapka kosekanu gixaya. Kalile nyanu.”
 
29Petro wane chinru, “Wa pejnurunekmaka gitspeekaako, ga wa gita gike.”
 
30Geso wane chinru, “Galikaka wane nchinyi, wa pixa xani tye yechno ma yanumatkanu gnapu wa gaxawripa gepi kata, pnutatanno mapa kata.”
 
31Seyni wale psolmuchkonuko tokanuwna. Wane china, “Wa nupnanmaka koxa Pixayma, gi wa nnutatanyi.”
Pejnuruneko waneko pixka china.
 
32Wane yana Getsemani giwakatletyawaka. Wane chinna Wale wa yimaklene, “Ntuplatanu gewi. Nagjigognetkakopshini.”
 
33Ranikna Waleyma Petro, Santiyako, Gwa. Yinuwaka giglajreta, wamonuwnaleta. 
34Wane chinna Wale, “Nonshinikanu nwamonuwnapotutya gipukchi pixkapotuko. Gkagwakanu gewi. Giyokanu.”
 
35Psotsotaaji wajrayaka ya. Wane yoptsojita chijiya. Ragjigogneta wa rumkata wane gixletikolupmaka, ruknoganu Waleya wale salewakchi. 
36Wane china, “Gagwa, Nuru, ptowru gimkatachriyi Pixa. Pkoshripatinno twu girapistono, seyni gi wa Gita galukyawakapni, seyni Pixa galukyawakapni.”
 
37Runa. Retamtna gimkanatachine. Wane chinru Petro, “¿Simo, pumkanatge? ¿Gi ge pumkata giyokleta pshinitsonu? 
38Giyokanu. Gagjigognetanu gma jiglokinitipa yantaletikowakapa. Wa ginshinikanu galikakni jmererni, seyni manchi muchkotni.”
 
39Rumepe yaletinitnaka ragjigognetyawaka, waneko pixka chintokanutatnaka. 
40Satokatnaka. Retamtatnakna gimkanatachine. Ruxapnewatna. Gi rumata gigretluna.
 
41Runa mapa kata rixinritka. Wane chinna Wale, “Gimkanutka. Gapnanutanu. Wanekotka. Nopapko gapokatka. Xani Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyookatka kmukochirerunemyoya. 
42Gyotunotanutka. Gayanutka. Gi gowukatkalu nsamyokjerupa.”
 
43Waneklutka yanumsanatiniwa Geso, runatka Gota. Walenwa pamole gepi rixinri. Waleymana gixolune yine kyoglolewaprerune, kgagajererune. Wannanwa tsrukakalune sasertotene gayinerutene, yonchikgapineyegirune koxa, tsrunyegirune koxa. Gotaymamnutkana.
 
44Wa samyokjeru genekagnaputatkana saturutu gimaxiklechi. Wane chinna wale, “Girukta namlutanu gita, Walepakni. Gkashichanru. Ganikanru. Ggirukotpotumtanru.”
 
45Runinitka, waneklutka runyegitlu. Wane chinru, “¡Yimaklewatachri! ¡Yimaklewatachri!” Ramlutlu.
 
46Romyokyegimtluna. Kashichluna. 
47Wa satu wane gwanatachri koshpakyoglolewapreta. Rustaklu wa sasertote gitsrukate potu wayegreru. Yostakjepitlu.
 
48Geso wane china, “¿Gishpakamta gixa yoglolewapiyma gagajeyma, kachowguru pixka gixa kashretnoge? 
49Pagognemnunanuka gixayma nwanata, nunkaklewanata wa kpashiwakapjiya. Gi wa wane gkashichyano, seyni wa poyagkakikolupa wa yonatkalurkaka, wane gixyatkano.”
 
50Ruknokamtluna pejnuruneko. Rasukatkana.
 
51Satu jeji gomkagitlu sapwakmanetachri gichrataya. Jejine kashichlu. 
52Wa wale ruknokachratamtlu. Rasukyana mamkatni.
 
53Ranikluna Geso sasertotene gitsrukate potu yegi. Rapatna Walyegiya pejnuruneko tsrukakalune sasertotene, tsrune, yonchikgapine. 
54Wa Petro gomkagitlu gogajxigiyako. Sasertote gitsrukatpotupjipotunanuko romkagitlu. Tuplanata towrechineyma. Rolkanata chichpawa.
 
55Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, pejnuruneko jemanshinikankakjetikowakaya rujgaluna gipgujtalewlumka Gesoya rupninripa, seyni gi rukshikluna. 
56Gi rixanu gixo gipgujtatlu maleshawaka, seyni wa rupgujtalewlena gi wa pixkakakluni. 
57Pimrine gapoka. Rupgujtatluna maleshawaka. Wane chinna wanna, 
58“Wixa jemlu wane chininri, ‘Gita yotkakanunru wa tye kpashiwakapji myochi kamrutikaluru. Wa mapagogne chininri satu nkamrutanu myochi mkamrutikotpatka.’ ”
 
59Seyni rupgujtalna wanna koxa gi pixkakakluni.
 
60Wa sasertote gitsrukate potu tunwata ganikajitskalaya. Repomgalu wa Geso. Wane chinru, “¿Gikeko pugityano? ¿Klu rupgujtatyayina wanna nyi Pixaya?”
 
61Seyni Wale pochkeru. Gike rugita. Sasertote gitsrukate potu rumepe gepomgaletatnaklu. Wane chinru, “¿Pixlege wa Kristoyi Gimalwutkaluru Wgenyi?”
 
62Geso wane china, “Gitakni.
 Gixa getanno Gita, Yineru Wgenno, 
 tuplatyawakapa potuklesreta ruyakle Goyakalu, nuninkoxapa kyachgapererumkoya tengogneya.” 
 
63Giyagni wa sasertote gitsrukate potu suskakamkata. Wane china, “¿Klu wanepnute magatyawu gipgujtalewatachine? 
64Gjematkalu wa mupashiregnuchi china. ¿Gi pixka getle gixlu?”
Wa wanna pejnuruneko wane chinyegitluna wa Wale giklukanuwna rupninripa.
 
65Pimrine yinuwaka gitskagjeretanru, rushyagojitanruna, yotmutanruna. Wane chinruna, “Goyakalu tokanu peneklewatkoxewa.” Towrechine giptagojitlu.
 
66Rapuko rawanata Petro panchiya. Tuna sato rupxakjero wa sasertote gitsrukate potu. 
67Wa tetinri wa Petro rolkanatini, tyopukgatlu. Wane china, “Pixni Waleymalutyi, Geso Nasare gajeru.”
 
68Seyni wale nutata. Wane china, “Gi numatlu. Gi koxa numatjemlu wa pchinyawaka.” Rushpaka. Maleka ya. Yanumatatka gaxawripa.
 
69Wa gipxaklewatachro getinri, tyinuwaka wane chinretatnakna wane gwanatachine, “Tyenwa satu wannate.”
 
70Seyni wale nutatatnaka. Gowukshini wane gwanatachine wane chinruna Petro, “Galikakni pixni satu wannatyi. Gi rixanu Kalile gajeryi.”
 
71Yinuwaka kamakpiirewleta, wane chinreta Wale kawchinanu, “Gi numatpotunatlu wa tye jeji wa Walepirana gyanumsatinri.”
 
72Waneklu gaxawripa yanumatatka gepi kata chininri. Petro gishiniklu wa tokanu Geso chinyawaklu, “Ma yanumatkanugnapu gaxawripa gepi kata, pnutatanno mapa kata.” Yanshinikanunatlu wa wale, chiyagatatka.
1Waneklutka wa goyechnokawa jemanshinikankakatkana wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, wa tsruneyma, wa yonchikgapineyma, wa ptowruneko jemanshinikankakachineyma. Rostutluna Geso. Ranikatkaluna. Pilato samyokatkaluna. 
2Pilato gepomgalu, “¿Pixlege wa Goteyone Pogiryi?”
Rugitlu. Wane china, “Pixa chinyawaka.”
 
3Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene jigyegitlu gixo. 
4Repomgatnaklu Pilato. Wane chinru, “¿Gi ge pugita? Petanu. ¡Gi pajigyeglenanukta rixyegityina!”
 
5Ga wa Geso gi wa waleko rugitya. Giyagni ruglajita Pilato.
 
6Wa tsrugogneklu rushyegjetna gostutkaluru girukokta ragjitna. 
7Wane rawanata satu Warawasu giwakatletachri gostutkaluru yagotkakachineyma, giylalewatachine yagotkakluya. 
8Runna gixolune yine. Yinuwaka gagjiretluna rixjetyawakna.
 
9Pilato gigitna. Wane china, “¿Gi ge galuklu gita gishyegityapgi wa Pogirna Goteyone?” 
10Rumata ranxalna chinanu samyokluna tsrukakalune sasertotene.
 
11Seyni wa tsrukakalune sasertotene komyekanshinikanutna gixolune yine rushyegityapna Warawasu galikakapni.
 
12Rugitatnakna Pilato. Wane china, “¿Klu nixyalu galuka wa gixa giwakatyalu Goteyone Pogire?”
 
13Wanna saplewatatnaka, “¡Koroshishkita putakjixaganru!”
 
14Wane chinna Pilato, “¿Klu gektutu kamruta?”
Wanna saplewpotuta, “¡Koroshishkita putakjixaganru!”
 
15Pilato galuka giglenshinikanretna yine. Giyagni rushyegitna Warawasu. Kochipjetka Geso. Rali kochipjeretkoklunutka, samyoklu koroshishkita rutakikolupa.
 
16Wa solalone ganiklu wa tsru panchi gitokote. Walenwa Pretoryo. Tomgana ptowruneko wa solalone. 
17Yoshmakluna pakni yoshmookaluru pixkalutu mkachri. Yoshmakluna sagyeta kona kamgikolu. 
18Yinuwaka galukletluna, “¡Wuya, Goteyone Pogire!”
 
19Ruylakjiwutluna katsluksuya. Rutskagjetluna. Yonogyegitluna. Yoptsojityegitluna. 
20Wa rali gapnokatletinitkaluna, komkagatkaluna wa pakni yoshmookaluru pixkalutu mkachri. Waleko gimkalu yoshmakatkaluna. Ranikatkaluna koroshishkita rutakyapatkaluna.
 
21Rutjikakluna satu giknogamtachri, Simo, Surene gajeru, Galegantro, Rogwo giru, wa sana ginyachri wa ranikyaplo wa Geso koroshishkitate.
 
22Kolkota chinikowaka ranikatkaluna. Walenwa yokaakaluru, Jiwchiswaga yegi. 
23Renekluna winga smurna yapjetkalurga, seyni gi wa yoptotlo.
 
24Koroshishkita rutakluna.
Kotspaltamkatluna.
Rutakluna rupenookaklena ranikyapluna satkaka.
 
25Wa goyechnokawasreta koroshishkita rutakatkaluna. 
26Wa tokanu rogwaka gwachri yonatkaluru wa jigyegitikolu, wane china, “Wa Goteyone Pogire.”
 
27Waleyma koroshishkita rutaakana gepi kachowgurune, satu potuklesreta, satu kegnetesreta. 
28Poyagkaakatka Tokanchi Yonatkaluru, wane chinachri:
Mugleneyma kagwakikolupa Wale koxa.
 
29Mupashiregnuchi chinruna giknogachine. Ruwnownojiwutna. Wane chinna, “¡Gaga! Wa Pixni wa kpashiwakapji yotkakachripyi, mapgogne chininri pkamrupjitanru. 
30Pixnanuko gognetkakinwa. Pujrukanu wa koroshishkitaya.”
 
31Waneko pixka rixna wa tsrukakalune sasertotene gapnokatletlu. Wane chinkakna yonchikgapineyma, “Pimrine rognetkaka. Walenanuko gi rumkata gognetkakletnawa. 
32Kristo, Gisrayiline Pogire gijrukanu wa xani wa koroshishkitaya. Wetyaplu. Walixyaplu.” Wa Waleyma koroshishkita gitaakalune koxa yangalu.
 
33Tumananutkani ruchpokatka psolchijnepotunanuyako kayinwakasreta rapokinpotunanuko. 
34Kayinwakpapko Geso saplewata. Tsruplaji rixa. Wane china, “Geloyi, Geloyi, ¿Glama sawajtani?” Walenwa yokaakaluru: “Noyakalute, Noyakalute, ¿klu chinanu puknokatkano?” 
 
35Jeminrina pimrine wane gwanatachine, wane chinna wanna, “Gjemanru. Tomgalu Giliya.”
 
36Rasukamta satu. Katsopi kotsgatapyaluna kachgalu. Katsluksu rutaklu. Reneklu ruranrupa. Wane china, “Getashatanru. Wetkoxewa gikta runanu Giliya koshpakapyaplu.”
 
37Geso tsruplaji rixa. Rupnanatka.
 
38Waneklutka mkachrichrata gimaletanatachri kpashiwaka potu gajeru giskakamtatka gepichratatkalu. Teno rumuyaka giskakletyatka chijiina. 
39Wale ginaple tunwanata satu ksolaloteru. Retanata wane rixa gipnaletinri. Wane china, “Galikakpotunanni tye jejni Goyakalu Wgenni.”
 
40Wane koxa tunwanatna suxone. Retanatna gowukayako. Wa wannatskala rawanatna Mariya Maktala gajero, Mariya Santiyako mturu wa Gosi ginro, ga wa Salome koxa. 
41Wa wanna Kalile rawanatiniwa romkagjenatluna. Rupxakjenatluna. Wa pimrone gixo waneklu koxa, Waleyma kanikachine wa Gerosale.
 
42Wa kayi rixinitka wa galpokotikolgogne, walenwa gapnanutikalurgognestsi. 
43Gosi Garimate gajeru, jemanshinikankakjetikowaka gajeru kagwakpiratkaluru. Wale koxa kagwaklu pogirewatyawaka Goyakalu. Wane ya. Mpiikatu jiglokyegitlu Pilato. Ragjitlu Gesnimane. 
44Wa Pilato giglajita wa rupninrinatka. Repuklu ksolaloteru. Repomgalu wa muchikawako rupninrinatka. 
45Runkaklu wa ksolaloteru. Reneklu gimanetka Gosi. 
46Wale gagjitlu mkachrichrata. Jijrukatkalu. Poyitatkalu mkachrichrata. Rutaklu yomlechi wa sotlu jitotikalurupna. Rakaprurjixlu sotlu wa giyomle gipgyaptote. 
47Wa Mariya Maktala gajero, wa Mariya Gosi ginro, getanatna ginakakta rutakanunruna.
1Wa ruknoginitka wa gapnanutikalurgogne, Mariya Maktala gajero, wa Mariya Santiyako ginro, wa Salome, ragjitlona pgamlugalo wa ruyogatyapluna. 
2Goyechnokawpotuko muchinangogne simana wane yana yomlechi yegi. Tkachi gishpakatka. 
3Wane chinkakananumtna wannakakluko, “¿Katmakla gakaprurutyanwure sotlu yomlechi gipgyaptote gajeru?”
 
4Wa retinitkaluna, retluna wa sotlu gajritkalurutka. Gi rixanu tsrupotunanu sotlu. 
5Jiglokatkana yomlechi. Retluna jeji tuplanatachri potuklesreta, gimkalu gowukalu gitakachri klatalu. Ruglajpotutna.
 
6Wane chinna wale, “Gi wa giglajitanu. Gijgalu Geso, Nasare gajeru, wa koroshishkita gitakanatkaluru. Yotunomtatka. Gi gewitkalu. Getanru rutakikowaka. 
7Seyni gyanutka. Ginkakanna wa yimaklene, Petro koxa, Wale gapka wane kosekingi. Kalile yanu. Wane getinitkalu chinyawakpotukgi.”
 
8Wane yiyatkana. Rasukamtna yomlechiya. Wa rutatatna. Ruglajitna. Giketsotaji runkakna, piklena chinanu.
 
9Wa yotunotinitka wa goyechnokawpotuko muchinangogne wa simanatka, rupgujewnayegitlo muchinanu wa Mariya Maktala gajero. Walanwa ruknokakamchitetanro payokgipre kamchine. 
10Tyinitka wala. Tunkakna wa Waleymalunenanu, wa wamonuwnanatachine, chiyaganatachine. 
11Wa wanna jemyegitinitkalu ruwekinritka, wa retikolutka walaya, gi ralixna.
 
12Wanepnute gepi wa wanna yanananumta sana yachine. Geso wane gipgujewnayegitna. Satuko kogetkogatka. 
13Wane yiyatkana. Runkakna pimrine. Gi wannako ralixna.
 
14Ralipretka rupgujewnayegitna Geso pamole satupjene wa tuplanatinna nikawakakwaya. Chigetjetanna wa ma malixleyna shikowgajitinriyna, gi rixanu gi ralixkana retjene yotunomtinritka.
 
15Wane chinna Wale, “Psolchijneko gyanu. Ginkakletanru Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi pejnurunenanuko giyakotkalune yegi. 
16Wa galixachripa katko wale gognetkaako, seyni wa malixakletu giklukanuwnayegjixko. 
17Tyekaka getkalurkaka kamrujetanna wa galixachine. Gita giwakaya ruknokinrina kamchine. Gerotu patokanchikaka yanumatinna. 
18Koschekanruna gimnukaka. Rurinrina kamakalu gi wa rumtukanna. Wa yayixachine gogo rutakamyotanna. Ruglewatanna.”
 
19Wa Gitsrukaachi gali yanumsayegletinitkana, tengogne yoptotikatka. Tuplatatka Goyakalu potuklesretate. 
20Wanna gishpakamtatka. Runkaklewatna pasretamnunanukaya. Wa Gitsrukaachi gikamrurewatna. Wannaya Goyakalu kamrujetlu getkalurkaka. Gitsrukaachi poyegitlu tokanu wa getkalurkakayma. Wane gixkalurupa.
1Wane rixa. Gi gepika yagota yonretlu wixa yegi kamrutikalurutkapirana. Yagota ginkakpokwakletluna. 
2Waneko pixka rixna reyinuwaklewayakawa getachine. Wannanwa tokanchi kamruklerune. Ga wa wanna samyokwu tyekakapirana. 
3Giyagni kigle getle nixlu gita koxa nyonyegityi, kshinikanuru potu Teyogwilo. Rixpokotyawaka nunkakyi. Gi rixanu reyinuwakayakawa nomkaginshinikanpiranpotutlu, 
4pumatpotutyaplu koxa pixa poyegitkalurni wa tokanchi punkakikolu.
 
5Gotechijne pogire Giroreklunanu, waneru satu sasertote, Sakariya giwakatletachri, Gawiyaklopishaneyma gitaakaluru. Ganunronwa Gaaroklopisha. Gilisawetinwa tgiwaka. 
6Ga wa gepiko poyagkakachinni Goyakalu getanuya. Muklukanuwnakane. Romkagitluna pejnuruko Gitsrukaachi yokanatanru, Wale gitakanru. 
7Gi kwugenna gi rixanu migatni Gilisaweti, ga wa gepiko gi gepika walapu waneyanatkana.
 
8Wa gipapko gapokinpatka sasertote kamrure kamrutinri Goyakalu getanu, wane rixa. 
9Sasertotene gixjetyawaka, wale gitaaka yochpikyaplu pgamlupagiri. Kpashiwaka potu Gitsrukaachinu jigloka. 
10Pejnuruneko gixolune yine maleka gagjigognenatya yochpiikakopshini pgamlupagiri.
 
11Gitsrukaachitowreru gipgujewnayegitlu. Pgamlupagiri yochpikjetikowakakwa potuklesretate tunwata. 
12Wa retinitkalu Sakariya, kojwakanshinikanutnanwa. Tsru piklu rixa. 
13Ga wa Goyakalutowreru wane chinru, “Sakariya, gi pikanu. Gi rixanu pagjigognere jemka. Ga wa pganunro Gilisaweti gishpaakakanru puturu. Gwa pgiwakatanru. 
14Pumuwatanu. Pumjikanu. Gixo yine gimuwatanu rushpakinri chinanupa. 
15Gi rixanu tsrupni Goyakalu getanu. Gi wa wingako ruranu. Gi wa kapsagaluko ruranu. Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanru potu rixanu, runronanwakyakawa. 
16Gixo Gisrayiliklopishane satkakanu puturupa Gitsrukaachi Royakalutna yegi. 
17Giwekikaluruya, Giliya pixka, ga wa ruyakleya runanu. Ma mapookanuwa Gitsrukaachi, wale gapka kosekanu. Wale satkakgajinshinikanutanna girchine wugenenna yegi; ga wa kaalirerune satkakyapa kanshinikanurune rixinripna poyagkakachine pixka. Yine galpokotachripni Gitsrukaachi chinanu giglepokotkalunepa.”
 
18Sakariya wane chinru Goyakalutowreru, “¿Gi nixpoko gimatletanru? Gi rixanu tsrutsolejinatkano. Ga wa nganunro koxa gi gepika walapu waneyatkalo.”
 
19Goyakalutowreru gigitlu. Wane chinru, “Gitni Kawrilno. Goyakalustsi tunwatachrino. Gitni yokanatkalurno nuynumsatyapyi, ga wa nunkakyapyi tye kiglerupirana. 
20Ga wa xani myanumatkatupyi. Gi pumkata yanumletannuna wale wane gixkoklugognepotunanukopa, pma malixtokanutkalchinanno. Gigogne poyagkaakalurupni ntokanu.”
 
21Ga wa yine kagwakanatlu Sakariya. Ruglajitna wa kpashiwaka ramginritka chinanu. 
22Ga wa rushpakamtinitka, gi rumkata yanumletanatka. Rumatna wa pagixanu retinrinatka getkaluru kpashiwakaya. Rutsejrigjeyegishatatkana. Myanumatkatunannatkani.
 
23Wane rixa. Poyagkaklu wa sasertote kamrure. Rali poyagkakletinitkalu, gipji yatka. 
24Ruknoginitka walegognekaka, kamshirotkani ganunro Gilisaweti. Pamyo ksuru tyogimatnawa. Wane china, 
25“Giyagni wane rixno Gitsrukaachi, wa walegogne retyano konpatetyapatkano yine getanuya.”
 
26Patsrujire ksuru chininri Goyakalu yokanatlu gitowreru Kawrili. Satu pokchi Nasare giwakatletachri, Kalilesreta, yokanatlu. 
27Makloji jeji metkatowa yegi yokanatlu. Satu jeji gipiratanrotka, Gosi giwakatletachri, Tawiklopisha. Wala makloji giwaka Mariyni.
 
28Wala yegi jigloka Goyakalutowreru. Wane china, “Mariya, gimutkalurpotyi. Pixaymalu Gitsrukaachi.”
 
29Tkojwakanshinikanutnanwa wale tokanu chinanu. Tnutanshinikanuta gi pixkalutuknige wa tye galuklewlu. 
30Giyagni wa Goyakalutowreru wane chinro, “Mariya, gi pikanu. Gi rixanu Goyakalu gimutatkayi. 
31Xani pmushiwatanu. Pushpaakakanru puturu. Pgiwakatanru Geso. 
32Tyepni wa tsru. Teno potu Gajeru Wgene chinko. Gitsrukaachi Goyakalu genekanru rutsrukatni Tawi pogirewatyawaka. 
33Gakowniklopishane yegi pogirewgognenatini. Pogirewatyawaka gike rixiniko nikawnanu.”
 
34Giyagni Mariya wane chinru Goyakalutowreru, “¿Gi rixpokotanu wa tye? Gi rixanu gi jeji numatawa.”
 
35Goyakalutowreru gigita. Wane chinro, “Giwekikaluru Kpashiri ginyegitanyi. Teno potu Gajeru giyakle chikletyegitanyi. Giyagkoxni kpashiripni gishpakachripa wane chinko Goyakalu Wgene. 
36Ga wa petanro. Pumole koxa Gilisaweti wala koxa tutsroginiko tmushiwata. Toturupni. Patsrujire ksuryegitkalo wa migato chinkaluronanu. 
37Gi rixanu Goyakalu gi satuna ma mumkatanutni.”
 
38Giyagni Mariya wane china, “Gitsrukaachi wayegrerno. Wane nixikolupa pixa chinyawakpotuko.”
Wala yegi yiyatka Goyakalutowreru.
 
39Walegognekaka tpalnamta Mariya. Kmagkatewaka tya. Teyakawamta. Gotechijne gajeru pokchi tya. 
40Sakariyapji tjiglokamta. Taluklo Gilisaweti. 
41Wane tixatka. Wa Gilisaweti yijnaka galukletinitkalo wa Mariya, wa mturu tonanwaka gajeru ruptekapa. Wa Gilisaweti Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanro potu gixachrotkani. 
42Tsru saple tixa. Wane china sapleta, “Giglenshinikanyegitkaluryi pixje suxonyegiya. Giglenshinikanyegitkaluru punanwaka gishpakyachripa. 
43¿Gi nixge gita wa tye giknogyapno, wa Nutsrukate ginro ginyegityawakno? 
44Gi rixanu neyijnako galukletiniyakawayi, wa mturu nonanwaka gajeru ruptekapa rumuwle chinanu. 
45Giglenshinikanyegitkaluro galixachro, gi rixanu poyagkakikolupa wa tunkakikolupirana, wa Gitsrukaachi ginkakjixyalo.”
 
46Mariya wane china,
Numalwutlu Gitsrukaachi nonshinikanuya.
 
47Ga wa numuwyegitlu Goyakalu, Nognetkakjeru.
 
48Gi rixanu mpogireto retyano wayegrerno.
Xaniyakawa giglenshinikanyegitkalurno
Wane chinannona pejnurune gimuweekakgognenatachinepa
gapkatatachineshaklumnunanukapa.
 
49Gi rixanu wa Kgiyaklewakleru tsrupirana kamruyegitno.
Kpashiri giwakni.
 
50Retwamonunanumtna pagwashlukaka
gimuweekakgognenatachinmnunanuka wa pikjene.
 
51Muchkowamyota. Galixkotnachinewa rajiyna
ga wa ginshinikanuyna kopalatna.
 
52Pogirewatyawakna tsrukakalune ruknokya.
Mpogirene tsrune rutaka.
 
53Kiglerkakaya jinanu rixkakna nachichachine.
Ga wa ponikolune maleshayalune yokanatna.
 
54Rupxaklu wayegreru Gisrayili,
gi rixanu rushiniklu retwamonrewle,
 
55Chinyawakpotukna wutsrukatenni,
Gawra ga wa giklopishane rushinityawakpotuko.
 
56Mapa ksuru Gilisawetiyma wane twa Mariya. Wanepnute topji tsatokatnaka.
 
57Ga wa Gilisaweti poyagkakatkalu togogne tushpakawgenetinripatka, rushpakatka toturu. 
58Yijnakotinitkana tumwastsitanune ga wa tomolene wa tsru getwamonre rixyalo Gitsrukaachi, rumuwatna walayma.
 
59Wane rixatka. Yokgipgogne chininri runna wa sajruka gistakletyapatkaluna wa mturu. Ruru giwakmaka rutakluna, Sakariya. 
60Tugita runro. Wane china, “Gike. Seyni Gwa giwakatko.”
 
61Wane chinrona, “Gi satuna pumole wane tye giwaka giwakatletachri.”
 
62Rutsejrigjeyegitluna ruru klu giwaka ralukyalu wale. 
63Ragjitlu pamta. Yonatlu. Wane china, “Gwanwa giwaka.”
Pejnuruneko giglajita.
 
64Waneklu Sakariya kotpuknamatka ga wa ginnu. Yanumatatka. Rumalwutlu Goyakalu. 
65Tsru piklu rixanna pejnuruneko rumwastsitanune. Ga wa psoluko Gotechijne gajeru kmagkatewaka pogiwatya pejnuruko tyepirankaka. 
66Pejnuruneko yijnakotachine gimretpiranatlu rajiyna. Wane chinna, “¿Gi gixachrini: xani tye mturu? Gi rixanu waleymalu Goyakalu.”
 
67Ga wa Sakariyni ruru, Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanru potu. Goyakalu tokanu reneklewata. Wane china:
 
68Gimalwutkalurni Gitsrukaachi, Gisrayiline Goyakalute.
Salwayegitna rayinerutene koshpakapna.
 
69Wixa yegi rupgujewnakakyalu Gognetkaklewatachri potu,
satu wayegrerni Tawniklopisha.
 
70Reyinuwakleyakawa wane chinjetyawakpotuko
pejnurunniko kpashirinni tokanchi geneklewatachinniya,
 
71Gognewatikalurupapirana, wkamnixjeneyegiya,
ga wa pejnuruneko wayegixjeneyegiya.
 
72Gi rixanu retwamonutna wutsrukatenni
ga wa rushiniklu kpashiri tokanu rupiratanru. 
73Wutsrukatni Gawrani rupiratya Wale kawchinanu
renekyapwu
 
74Mpiikonepwu wushatkapko wkamnixjenyegiya,
Wale yegi wkamrurewatinripa,
 
75Kpashirinepwu, poyagkakachinepwu
Goyakalu getanu psolgogneko wugogne.
 
76Ga wa pixa, mturu,
teno potu Gajeru tokanu geneklewatachri pchinko
Gi rixanu Gitsrukaachi kosekachripyi
palpokgapotyaplu.
 
77Rayinerutene pumatkakanu gognewatikalurupirana
kaspukmukochiretikolupna,
 
78Woyakalute gishiniklewle ga wa retwamonrewle chinanu,
Wa wale chinanu salwayegitwu
pokamlatachri tengogne potu gishpakyachri.
 
79Wane rixa pokamlatyegityapna mapshagwaka gwachine,
ga wa gipnalchikle tuplanatachinena,
wkosekikolupa, giglewanshinikanrugapo gayinripa.
 
80Ga wa mturu tseruwna. Muchkowata Giwekikaluruya. Yineru mwiyawakanu rawanata walegognepotunanuko wa Gisrayiline yegi rupgujewnini.
1Wane rixatka walegognekaka. Susa Gakosto yokanrewata psolchijne gajeneko gitakgiwakatikolupa. Walepirana pogiwata. 
2Tye muchinanu gapka gitakgiwakatikolu wane gixka wa Surchijne girukotlewatyachri rixini Surino. 
3Satkaka waleko gipokchi ya, rutakgiwakatikolupna pejnuruneko.
 
4Giyagni Kalilchijne gajeru pokchi Nasare yiyatka Gosi. Gotchijne kanika. Tawi pokchi ya Wele chinikowaka. Tawiklopishni wale. Tawnineru. 
5Wa rutakgiwakatikolupa Mariyayma rupiratanro. Kamshirni wala. 
6Wane rixatka. Wane rawanatinna tpoyagkakatkalu togogne tushpakawgenetinripatka. 
7Tushpaakakatkalu muchinanu toturu. Mkachrichrata tpoyitatkalu. Prachine wakane nikjetyawaka tuklukakatkalu, gi rixanu maleshayna pagruko pnu giyakatyachine gwajetyawaka.
 
8Walesretako wanena girukotapratachine, maleka gwachine, girukotaprayechnotachine. 
9Goyakalutowreru gapyegitna wanna. Gitsrukaachi gatajiwnale yochigyegitna. Pikpotutna. Tsru piklu rixna.
 
10Ga wa Goyakalutowreru wane chinna, “Gi mpikanu. Gi rixanu kigleru tokanchi nunkakapgi, tsru gimuwlupirana, pejnuruneko yinenupni. 
11Tawi pokchi rushpakya xani gixa chinanu Gognetkaklewatachri. Walenwa Kristo Gitsrukaachi. 
12Waleko rumatikolupa: Gikshikanru mturu mkachrichrata poyitkaluru; prachine nikjetyawaka giklugachri.”
 
13Walegnapunanu Goyakalutowreruymatkana gixolune solalone tengogne gajene. Goyakalu gimalwutachine. Wane chinachine:
 
14Goyakalu gimalwutkaluru teno potu Gajeru.
Ga wa tyechijne gajene yinenupa giglewanshinikanrewlu,
wa giglenshinikanutachinenupa.
 
15Wane rixatka. Wanna yegi yiyatkana Goyakalutowrerune. Tengogne yatkana. Ga wa girukotapratachine wane chinkakna, “Wele gayanu xani. Wetapanru tyepirana wa giknogachri wa Gitsrukaachi ginkakjixyawu.”
 
16Giyampotu wane yatkana. Rukshiklona Mariya, ga wa Gosi, ga wa mturu prachine nikjetyawaka giklugachritka. 
17Wa retinitkaluna, pogitatkaluna wa mturupirana, wa chinikowakna. 
18Ga wa pejnuruneko yijnakotachine giglajita wa girukotapratachine chinyawakna. 
19Ga wa Mariya pejnuruko tyekakapirana tumreta tajiya. Tyanshinikanpiranatlu. 
20Satokatkana girukotapratachine. Ralixkotluna Goyakalu ga wa rumalwutluna pejnurukopiranaya, wa yijnakotanruna ga wa retanruna, wa chinikowakpotukna.
 
21Yokgipgogne chininitka wa sajruka gistakletikolpatka wa mturu, giwakatka Geso, wa Goyakalutowreru giwakatyawaklu, ma nanwakchi mawakanuwa giwakatlu.
 
22Wa poyagkakgognetkatka powralu rutakikolupna, wa Moysisi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru chinyawakpotuko, Gerosale ranikatkaluna, wa Gitsrukaachi renekyapatkaluna. 
23Wa rixyongatyawaka Gitsrukaachi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru: Pejnuruneko jejine kotpukawugenewlemapatini kpashirine chinkalunepni Gitsrukaachi chinanupa.  
24Wa genekashlu giylatkalurupa renekanna wa Gitsrukaachi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru chinyawaka: Gepirine kamowane, waka gepi motkoko wgenene. 
 
25Gerosale waneru satu jeji, Simo giwakatletachri. Walenwa jeji poyagkakachri ga wa kgipashiregolu. Wale kagwaklu rumnanukikolupna Gisrayiline. Waleymalu Giwekikaluru Kpashiri. 
26Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya runkaaka gichi rupnanu ma metkanuwalu Gitsrukaachi Kristote. 
27Giwekikaluruya kpashiwakapji yatka. Wa kpashiwakapji ranikinitkaluna rurune wa mturu Geso, wane rixyapatkaluna wa rixjetyawakna wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru chinanu. 
28Giyagni wale kampukatkalu. Rumalwutlu Goyakalu. Wane china:
 
29“Xani, Gitsrukaachi, petasha yaletanutkalu pwayegreru
giglewanshinikanutachri pchintokanutyawaka.
 
30Gi rixanu noygalpotuko netyatkalu gognewatikaluru Pixanu,
 
31Wa pejnuruneko yine getanu palpokotanru.
 
32Pokamlatachripni payinyegiya gipgujewnakakachripa.
Ga wa payinerutene Gisrayiline yochigyegitachripni.”
 
33Ga wa ruru, runro giglajita wa wale wane chinikowaka. 
34Simo giglenshinikanyegitna. Wane chinro runro Mariya, “Pjemanu. Wa Tye gitaaka rujrukinripna, ga wa yotunomtinripna gixolune Gisrayiline. Rutaaka rumatikolupa rixinripa. Gapatkalurupni Wale, 
35rupgujewninripa gixolunenshinikangaji. Ga wa yoglolewapi yoglonshinikanutanyi pixako.”
 
36Wane koxa twanata Gana, tokanchi geneklewatachro, Panwuri nshicho. Gaseriklopishni. Gixo potu walapu waneyatkalo. Talixinitka, payokgipre walapu tganuru yegi twanata. 
37Gipnagnurutachrotkani, ga wa yokgipimole gepkoxamkoje walapu waneyatkalo. Goyechno ga wa gogi gi tushpaka kpashiwakapjiya. Togajirewatinri ga wa tagjigognetinri Gitsrukaachi yegi tkamrurewatya. 
38Walepapko tapoka. Wala koxa gipgujtatlu Goyakalu. Walepirana tunkakleta pejnuruneko kagwakachinyegiya, gognewatikaluru Gerosale chinanu kagwakachine.
 
39Wa poyagkakinitkaluna wa pejnurkakakopirana wa Gitsrukaachi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru chinyawaka, satokatkana. Kalilechijne gajeru pokchi, Nasare, yatkana. 
40Ga wa mturu tseruwna. Ga wa muchkowananumta. Kgimatkaleru potu rixinri. Ga wa Goyakalu gimutlewle waneylutni.
 
41Pawalapkaka Gerosale yana rurune, wa meyiwlu yegi, Tsru Giknoglushgogne. 
42Wa pamole gepi walapu chininitka, Gerosale kanikna meyiwlugogneklu, rixjetyawakna. 
43Nikawnagognetinitka, satokatkana. Ga wa mturu Geso Gerosale rutukatka. Gi rumatna rurune rutukinritka. 
44Kagwakluna rumotsananumtjene yegi rawamtinri. Pagogne yanru yinitkana, rujgatkaluna gimolenna yegi ga wa rumatanunna yegi. 
45Wa ma mukshiikanutkaluna, Gerosale satokna. Rujgananumtluna. 
46Wane rixatka. Mapgogne giknoginitka, kpashiwakapji rukshikyatkaluna. Kgimatkalerune ganikajite tuplanata. Jemanatna, ga wa repomgana. 
47Pejnuruneko wa yijnakotjene giglajita rushinikanuwleya ga wa Wale gigityawakna.
 
48Wa retinitkaluna, ruglajitna. Runro wane chinru, “Noturu, ¿klu chinanu wane pixwu? Gi rixanu, gita ga wa puru gijgayi. Kachingajpotwu.”
 
49Giyagni Wale wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu gijgano? ¿Gi ge gimata wa Nuru kamrure numkata kamruretatka?”
 
50Gi rumata jemluna wale tokanu wa chinyawakna.
 
51Wannayma yopikatka. Nasare yatka. Yijnakotna. Runro taji gimretpiranatlu pejnuruko tyijnakotanru ga wa tetanrupirana. 
52Ga wa Geso tseruwnagimatkalewleta. Ya tseruwnaleta. Pnuteyaka Goyakalu gigleretyawaka kamruta, ga wa yine gigleretyawaka koxa.
1Pamole pamyo walapu girukotlewwatinitka Tiweryo Susa, Ponsyo Pilato girukotlewata Gotesretaya. Ga wa Girore girukotlewata Kalilesretaya. Ga wa repuru Wilipi girukotlewata Gitorisretaya ga wa Trakonitesretaya. Ga wa Lisani girukotlewata Gawilinisretaya. 
2Sasertotene gitsrukatene potu rixanatinna Ganasu ga wa Kaygwasu, Goyakalu tokanu ginyegitlu Gwa, Sakariya wgene, yineru mwiyawakanuya. 
3Psoluko Gorta Gapgasretchijne yamta. Runkakletananumtlu katlupirana renshinikanutinripna yine, ga wa kaspukmukochiretikolupna. 
4Wane rixa chinyongatyawaka Gisayiya tokanchi geneklewatachri kirukate:
 Yineru mwiyawakanu saplewatyachri tokanu: 
 Galpokotanru Gitsrukaachi gatnugapote. 
 Mpotukatanru gigapkaka. 
 
5 Pejnuruko magkachpalkaka tsepotkalurupni. 
 Pejnuruko magkamriji ga wa mturu magka 
 patenkaklutkalurupni. 
 Ga wa katpagapkakalu potukatgapotkalurupni. 
 Ga wa kamlojgapolu pgayamta rixgapotko. 
 
6 Ga wa pejnuruko yineru 
 getanru gognewatikaluru Goyakalunu. 
 
7Ga wa Gwa wane chinna gixolune yine gishpakamtachine wale katyapna, “Gimnu pixkalungi. ¿Katu ginkakgi gasukyegityawaklu Goyakalu jgekanupa? 
8Giyagni gkamrutanru genshinikanrewlu gimuknu kamrure. Gi wa gyinuwaka wane chinkakletanu, ‘Waneywu wutsrukatni Gawrani.’ Gi rixanu gita wane chingi, Goyakalu gimkata gipgujewnakakletanna Gawraklopishanemka tyekaka sotlukakaya. 
9Xani koxa gagmunasko rapokatka gepchi. Pejnuruko gagmuna kiglejiru mwanutu kayiikalurni. Xirnachri ruknookona. Waneko pixka rixko yineru kigleru kamrurchi ma kamrutkanupa.”
 
10Ga wa gixolune yine gepomgalu. Wane chinruna, “Giyagni ¿klu wkamrutanu?”
 
11Rugita Gwa. Wane chinna, “Wa gepi mkachri waneyalutu, renekanru waneyamigjetu. Ga wa nikchi waneyalutu waneko pixka rixanu.”
 
12Runkoxna gijgawenutachine katikolupna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, ¿klu wkamrutanu?”
 
13Wale wane chinna, “Gi wa gitaakaluru pnute gijganu.”
 
14Solalone koxa gepomgalu. Wane chinruna, “¿Ga wa wixa klu wkamrutanu?”
Wane chinna wanna, “Gi satuna mpiikakanu sroschi gijginriya. Gi koxa gapatlewatanu. Mpoyagnutanru gwenutikolu.”
 
15Kagwakanatna yine. Pejnuruneko rajiyna gishinikanuwyegitlu Gwa, gikta Kristoni. 
16Pejnuruneko rugita Gwa. Wane chinna, “Gita galikakni katgi gonuya. Ga wa runa gita pnute muchkonurutu. Gi wa gita gimuluni nkoshpirokyaplu yoshmaklejixitsa. Wale katangi Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya ga wa xirnachriya. 
17Ruplokapre gimyo gwa. Triko powratpotutanru giylakaajetikowaka. Rapatjetanru trikneji rumretyawakaplu, ga wa yoxikanru gichicha xirniywaka gike rixiniko muwnakatupa. Waneko pixka rixanunna yinepni. Genshinikanutachine rumretanu, ga wa menshinikanutkane xirnachri ruknokanu.” 
18Giyagni gixo giykolu ga wa pimripirana giykolu kigleru galikakni runkakletna yine.
 
19Giyagni Gwa gijretlu Girore pasreta girukotlewatyachri wa Giroryana repuru Wilipi gnunro chinanu, ga wa pejnuruko mugletu kamrutanru Girore chinanu. 
20Pejnuruko tyekaka pnute potu rixyatka. Yoshmakikowaka rushyayegitlu Gwa.
 
21Ma yoshmaakonuwa Gwa wane rixatka. Pejnuruneko yine katkatka, ga wa Geso koxa katkatka. Ga wa ragjigognetini tengogne kotpuuka. 
22Wale yegi Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gijrukatka, kamanemnuru. Motkoko pixka rixmanemta. Waneylu tokanchi tengogneya wane chinachri, “Pixni Noturyi nalukanruyi. Pixa gigletanshinikanutno.”
 
23Waleko Geso mapamole walapustsitka. Gosi wgene kagwakikaluru.
 
24Ga wa Gosni wa Gili wgene. Walenwa Mata wgene.
Walenwa Rewi wgene. Walenwa Melchi wgene.
Walenwa Ganasu wgene. Walenwa Gosi wgene.
 
25Walenwa Matati wgene. Walenwa Gamo wgene.
Walenwa Nawomo wgene. Walenwa Gesli wgene.
Walenwa Naaka wgene.
 
26Walenwa Mati wgene.
Walenwa Matati wgene. Walenwa Simi wgene.
Walenwa Gosi wgene. Walenwa Gota wgene.
 
27Walenwa Gowana wgene. Walenwa Resa wgene.
Walenwa Sorowawil wgene. Walenwa Salatili wgene.
Walenwa Neri wgene.
 
28Walenwa Melchi wgene.
Walenwa Gawti wgene. Walenwa Kosami wgene.
Walenwa Gelmotami wgene. Walenwa Geri wgene.
 
29Walenwa Geso wgene. Walenwa Giliyase wgene.
Walenwa Goreyi wgene. Walenwa Matati wgene.
Walenwa Rewi wgene.
 
30Walenwa Simo wgene.
Walenwa Gota wgene. Walenwa Gosi wgene.
Walenwa Gonani wgene. Walenwa Giliyachi wgene.
 
31Walenwa Meleya wgene. Walenwa Maynani wgene.
Walenwa Nata wgene. Walenwa Tawi wgene.
 
32Walenwa Gesi wgene. Walenwa Gowe wgene.
Walenwa Poosi wgene. Walenwa Salmo wgene.
Walenwa Naasoni wgene.
 
33Walenwa Gaminata wgene.
Walenwa Gatni wgene.
Walenwa Pare wgene. Walenwa Gota wgene.
 
34Walenwa Gakowo wgene.
Walenwa Gisaaka wgene. Walenwa Gawra wgene.
Walenwa Tara wgene. Walenwa Nachori wgene.
 
35Walenwa Sarochi wgene. Walenwa Rakawo wgene.
Walenwa Paleka wgene. Walenwa Gewre wgene.
Walenwa Sala wgene.
 
36Walenwa Kaanani wgene.
Walenwa Garpaksa wgene. Walenwa Seme wgene.
Walenwa Nowe wgene. Walenwa Lamechi wgene.
 
37Walenwa Matosala wgene.
Walenwa Genochi wgene.
Walenwa Gare wgene.
Walenwa Malereri wgene.
Walenwa Kaanani wgene.
 
38Walenwa Genoso wgene.
Walenwa Seti wgene.
Walenwa Gata wgene.
Walenwa Goyakalu wgene.
1Ga wa Geso Gorta satokyatka. Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanrupotni. Yineru mwiyawakanu raniika Giwekikaluru chinanu. 
2Gepkoxamkojmolgogne tsru kamchi yantaletlu. Gike nika walegognekaka. Ruknoogognetinitka, nachneru.
 
3Giyagni tsru kamchi wane chinru, “Goyakalu Wgene pixinipa, wane pchinanru tye sotlu jimapro rixinwa.”
 
4Geso gigitlu, “Wane chinyongayegitkalurutkani: Gi wa niikalurupje ruwekya yineru.” 
 
5Tenolu potu magka raniklu. Pshinitsonuji rekakgitlu pejnuruko pogirewatyawaakaka psolchijiko. 
6Tsru kamchi wane chinru, “Nutakanyi tye ptowruko chinanu. Ptowruko pogirewle nenekanyi. Gi rixanu gita samyookalurni, ga wa katukta naluka nenekanru. 
7Wa pyoptsojityegitinipno pejnuruko pixanpatkani.”
 
8Geso gigitlu, wane chinru, “Yonatkalurutkani:
 Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute pyoptsojityegitanu. 
 Walepje pkamrurewyegitanu.” 
 
9Giyagni Gerosale raniklu. Kpashiwakapji gwachri tenoptaji potu rutaklu. Wane chinru, “Goyakalu Wgene pchininipa, gewi pakaxikamtini. 
10Gi rixanu wane chinyongayegitkalurutkani:
 Gitowrene towutyegitanyi wanna girukotyapyi. 
 
11Ga wa:
 Kashichanyina gimyoyna, 
 gi pagogneko sotlu putspejixitinripa.” 
 
12Geso gigita. Wane chinru, “Kapiranalutkani: Gi pyantaletanru Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute.” 
 
13Rali yantaletletinitkalu pejnuruko yantaletlewluya, Wale yegi yiyatka tsru kamchi. Wanepshini retashatlu.
 
14Ga wa Giwekikaluru giyakleyma satokatka Geso. Kalile yatka. Psolchijiko walesreta pogiwapiranatyatka. 
15Wanna ginkaklewawaklepjikaka runkaklewatya. Gimalwutkalurni pejnuruneyako.
 
16Nasare yatka, wa tseruwakikwaka. Rixjetyawaka gapnanutikalurgogne jiglokjetlu ginkaklewawakapji. Palna. Retyongata. 
17Tokanchi geneklewatachri Gisayiya kirukate reneeka. Koprakatkalo kiruka. Rukshiklu wane china yongatyawaka:
 
18 Gita rawa Gitsrukaachinu Giwekikaluru. 
 Gi rixanu Wale tsomitno 
 Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi nenekyapna 
 kwamonurune. 
 Wale yokanatno kashikanotkalune yegi 
 nunkakletyaplu gishpakikolupirana. 
 Ga wa maygalene yegi, gimrekgalupirana. 
 Nkoshpakyapna kapsakletkalune. 
 
19 Nunkakletyaplu Gitsrukaachi 
 gimutlewle walapute. 
 
20Saprurutatkalo kiruka. Kamrurewatachri renekatkalo. Tuplatatka. Pejnuruneko ginkaklewawakapji gwanatachine yopukgapotutlu. 
21Yinuwaka wane chinretna, “Xawakni poyagkaakatka tye Tokanchi Yonatkaluru gixa jemanu.”
 
22Pejnuruneko pogitlu. Ruglajyegitluna rumutlewle tokanuya, wa yanumatinri. Wanna wane china, “¿Gi ge Gosi wgenekni wa Tye?”
 
23Wane chinna Geso, “Pejnurunekgi gixa tye yapkaklu nchinanno, ‘Kpinrewakleru, putuukakinwa pixnanuko. Klunerukta wyijnakpiranyegitanru Kapernawo kamrutikaluruya, gewi koxa puchijneya pkamrutinri.’ ”
 
24Wane china, “Galikakni wane nchingi, gi satuna tokanchi geneklewatachri galuukalurni gichijneya. 
25Galikakni wane nchingi, Giliyaklunanu tengogne gishyatkalurunanni. Mapa walapu ga wa patsrujire ksuru rushyanatka, ga wa tsru nachinanni psolchijneko. Waleklu gi gepikananna gipnagnurutachrone Gisrayilichijneya. 
26Seyni gi satona wanna yegi yokanatka Giliya, seyni Sarepta Pokchi, Sitosreta yokanatka, sato suxo gipnagnurutachro yegi. 
27Giliseyo tokanchi geneklewatachriklunanu gi gepikananna gijirgitutachine Gisrayilchijne gwachine. Seyni gi satuna wa nyi powratka. Ga wa Naama galikakni Suri gajeru powratka.”
 
28Giyagni pejnuruneko ginkaklewawakapji gwachine ramewnapotutna, tyepirana yijnakotinna. 
29Palnamtna. Pokchi malekate ranikluna. Pokchi magkatetajgapotuko ranikluna, yotkakyapmakluna gitskata. 
30Seyni Wale wanna ganikajite yapamta. Yatka.
 
31Yopikamtatka. Kapernawo yatka, Kalilesreta gajeru pokchi. Gapnanutikalurgognekaka runkakaklewjeta. 
32Runkaklewle koglajejetna, gi rixanu tsru gitaakaluru tokanni.
 
33Ginkaklewawakapji waneru satu jeji kamchi puchotlewatachri waneyalutu. Wale tsru saple gixa. 
34Wane china, “¡Ya! ¿Gi pixannatkawu Geso Nasare gajeru? ¿Puna pumtukpotutapyapwu? Numatyi katyi Pixa Kpashiryi Goyakalunu.”
 
35Geso chigetjetlu. Wane china, “Pochkepyi. Pushpakanutka waleya.” Giyagni wa kamchi ganikajitskalaya yawnakaklu. Wale rushpakamtyatka. Gi wa rumtukamtlu.
 
36Tsru giglajru rixna pejnuruneko. Wannakakluko giynumsakaka. Wane chinkakna, “¿Klu tokanchinwa tye, gi rixanu tsru gitaakaluru ga wa kgiyaklewaklerni rixa yokanretna kamchine puchotlewatachine? Rushpakamtna.” 
37Pogita piranamtkatka psoluko walesreta sajrukleya.
 
38Palnamta Geso. Ginkaklewawakapji yiyatka. Simopji jigloka. Simo gimajirni tsru pachwalu kashichanro. Wala chinanu ragjitluna. 
39Walastsi tunwata. Chigetjetlu pachwalu. Kaspukatkalo pachwalu. Waneklu tpalnamtatka. Tupxakatkana.
 
40Wa rumxikinitka tkachi, pejnuruneko yayixmoletachine ga wa pimrine yayixachine waneyalune, satumnunanuka gagijewnalkakaya ranikyegitluna. Satkaka rutakamyogogota. Rutuukakna. 
41Kamchi gishpakyegitna gi gepiko koxa. Saplewamtachine wane china saplemtna, “Pixni Goyakalu Wgenyi.”
Seyni rujretna. Gi retasha yanumsaletanna tyepirankakaya, gi rixanu rumatluna Walenwa Kristo.
 
42Gogi rixinitka rushpakamta. Yineru mwiyawakanu ya. Ga wa gixolune yine gijgalu. Yayegitluna. Chipetmakluna wa wanna yegi ma yinitipachi. 
43Seyni Wale wane chinna, “Numkata papokchikaka Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi ginkaklewletya, Goyakalu pogirewatyawakapirana. Gi rixanu wale chinanukni nyokanatka.” 
44Ginkaklewawakapjikakaya runkaklewananumtya Gotechijneya.
1Wane rixatka. Genesare Powgawnaga rawanata. Gixolune yine gachpaklu, Goyakalu tokanu yijnakotinripna. 
2Retlo gepi kanawa, gipowgawnaga gwanatachro. Chalugjetachine gitspakamtanrotka. Rerkachalnetna. 
3Sato kanawa rupteka, Simo kanawate. Simo ragjita ganikajgayaka ranikyaplu. Kanawa tuplata. Runkaklewyegitna gixolune yine.
 
4Rutuka ginkaklewletinitka, wane chinru Simo, “Tengawaka gyanu. Giknokchalnetanu shima gkashichinripa.”
 
5Simo gigitlu. Wane chinru, “Gitsrukaachi, psolyechnoko wkamrurewpotuta. Giketsotaaji wkashichana. Seyni Pixa tokanu chinanu, wuknokanru chalu.”
 
6Wane rixinitkana gixo potu shimni sajikna. Ruskatana chalnenina. 
7Rupxaalunna repnomyoyegitna wa sato kanawa gwanatachine wa rupxakapyapna. Runna. Gepi kanawa tsepotna. Wane tixa gimxiklepotutana kanawni. 
8Wa Simo Petro getinitkalu, Gesosoji rapokamta Petro. Wane china, “Puxrikyegitanno, Gitsrukaachi. Gi rixanu gitni jejno kmukochirerno.”
 
9Gi rixanu ruglajpotutana ga wa pejnuruneko waleymalune gixoluro shima chinanu wa kashichanrona. 
10Waneko pixka rixna Gakowo ga wa Gwa, Sewereyo wgenene, wa Simo gipxaalune.
Ga wa Geso wane chinru Simo, “Gi pikanu. Xaniyakawa kyinegaklerpatkayi.”
 
11Chiji kosepowamtatkalona kanawkaka. Pejnuruko ruknokamtatkana. Romkagitatkaluna.
 
12Wane rixatka. Satu pokchi rawanatini, waneru satu jeji gijirgitutachripotuna. Geso reta. Yoptsojityegitlu. Chiji yonogita. Ragjitlu. Wane chinru, “Gitsrukaachi, palukiniplu pumkata powratletanunno.”
 
13Giyagni romyokyegitlu. Kamruklu. Wane chinru, “Naluklu. Powrapatkayi.” Wanekluyakawa gijirgitlu gitukyegitatkalu wale.
 
14Ga wa Geso gijretatkalu gi satuna runkakinripa, seyni, “Pyanu,” chinru. “Sasertote pekakgitapinwa. Penekashatanru powranuya wa Moysisi yokanatanru. Walepni nupgujtatjeru wanna chinanu.”
 
15Seyni pnute pogitka Walepirana. Giyagni gixolune yine gapatyegitlu wa yijnakotyapluna, wa rutuukakikolupna yayixleyna. 
16Seyni Wale gixrikamta. Yineru mwiyawakanu ya. Wane ragjigognetya.
 
17Pagogne wane rixatka. Wale ginkaklewanata. Wane tuplanatna Gwariseyone ga wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru yimaklewatachine. Wanna papokchimnunanuka ruyakatyana, Kalilesreta, Gotesreta, ga wa Gerosale koxa. Waneru Gitsrukaachi giyakle rutuukakyapna. 
18Giyagni pimrine jejine ganiklu satu jeji gijekoya. Walenwa giktegachri. Rujgaluna wa gitoko yoshmakletanruna, Gesostsi rutakyapluna. 
19Gi rukshikluna gi rixpoko yoshmakletluna gixolune yine chinanu. Panchi gogo ratskotatkana. Washreswa jijrukyaluna gijekoya. Ganikaji Gesostsi rutakluna. 
20Geso getlu wanna galixle. Wane china, “Jeji, pmukochirkaka kaspuukatkayi.”
 
21Giyagni wa yonchikgapine ga wa Gwariseyone yinuwaka yanshinikanretna. Wane chinna, “¿Gi gixachrinwa Tye wa mupashiregnuchi china yanumsaleta? ¿Katu gimkata kaspukmukochiirewleta? Satupjeru, Goyakalupje.”
 
22Giyagni Geso gimata wane rixanshinikanutinrina. Rugita. Wane chinna, 
23“¿Klu chinanu wane gixanshinikanuta tyekaka wa gajiya? ¿Girni wa myapretpotu, wane chinyalu giktegachri, ‘Wa pmukochirkaka kaspuukatkayi,’ ga wa wane chinyalu, ‘Pyotunotanu. Pyanutka?’ 
24Wa gimatyaplu wa Gita Yineru Wgenno gitaakalurno tye chijiya kaspukmukochirewletachripa,” wane chinru giktegachri, “Pixa wane nchina, Pyotunotanu. Pkoschekjekomtanu. Pyanutka pupji.”
 
25Waneklu yotunomtatka wa pejnurune wanna getanu. Koscheklu rukluganatyawakamta. Gipji yatka. Rumalwumtlu Goyakalu. 
26Pejnurunniko giglajitana, ga wa rumalwutluna Goyakalu. Tsru piklu rixna. Wane chinna, “Koglajlewatachri weta xawakni.”
 
27Wanepnute rushpakamta. Retlu satu gijgawenutachri. Rewi giwakatletachri, gijgawenutikwaka tuplanatachri. Wane chinru, “Pomkagitanno.”
 
28Ruknokamtlu pejnurkakako. Palnamta. Romkagitatkalu.
 
29Rewi tsru nachnewlu kamruta gipjiya. Gi gepikna wane gijgawenutachine ga wa pimrine koxa wannayma tuplanatachine nikikowakaya. 
30Gwariseyone ga wa yonchikgaprenna kegemgana Geso yimaklenyegiya. Wane chinna, “¿Gi rixatka wa wannayma nika, rura, wanna gijgawenutachine, wanna kmukochirerune?”
 
31Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Wa gichkolune gi galuklu kpinrewakleru, seyni yayixachine galuklu. 
32Gi wa nuna ntomgiyapna poyagkakachine seyni wanna kmukochirerune ntomginripni renshinikanutinripna.”
 
33Giyagni wanna wane chinru, “Wa Gwa yimaklene gogajirewata gixo kata ga wa ragjigognetkoxna. Waneko pixka rixna wa Gwariseyone yimaklene. Ga wa Pixa yimaklene nikna ga wa rurna.”
 
34Wane chinna Geso, “Gi rumkata gogajirewletna kashimyolu getachine, wanna yegi rawinikopshini gnunrowatachri, xani pixka Gita gimwakopshinna nyimaklene. 
35Runinpatka pagogne wa gnunrowatachri konikolgognepatka wannaya. Waneklugogne rogajirewatanna wanna.”
 
36Yapkaklu koxa runkakna. Wane china, “Gikena gamatlu gerotsama wa mkachritsole. Wane rixkoklunu wa gerotsama suskaktsoletlu. Gi koxa pixkakakluni gitsole ga wa gerotsamayma. 
37Gikena giyokgatlu winga gerotu tsapkaka tsrutsoleji. Wane rixkoklunutka winga gerotu suskakanru tsapkakni. Tuyokgata wino. Tsapkaka salewna. 
38Seyni wa winga gerotu tsapa gerotu tuyokgatka. 
39Gi satuna kapokotga girachri galuklu gerotga. Gi rixanu wane china, ‘Kapokotga galikaka kiglepotlu.’ ”
1Wane rixatka. Sana yapanatna Gesoyma gapnanutikalurgogne. Ga wa yimaklene sustakagwumtluna gitaklugwu. Gimyoyna jipekamtluna. Nikamtluna. 
2Pimrine Gwariseyone wane china, “¿Klu chinanu wane rixna gapnanutikalurgogne wa ginanshichkalurgogne?”
 
3Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “¿Gi ge pagogne getyongapiranyegitlu Tawi kamrutanru wa nachichini wale ga wa waleymalune koxa? 
4Gi rixpoko jiglokletlu Goyakalupji. Jimaprokaka gekakgitkalurkaka koscheka. Niklu. Ga wa waleymalune koxa reneka. Walenwa ginanshichkaluru niklu. Sasertotenepje nikanruni.”
 
5Wane chinna, “Gapnanutikalurgogne koxa Gitsrukatno Gita wa Yineru Wgenno.”
 
6Wane rixa koxa satu gapnanutikalurgogne. Ginkaklewwakapji jigloka. Wane runkaklewatya. Wane rawanata satu jeji potuklemyo giprigamyotyachri. 
7Giruktatluna yonchikgapine ga wa Gwariseyone, wa gapnanutikalurgogne rutuukaklewjetinri. Rujgaluna wa jigyegityapluna. 
8Seyni Wale gimatlu yanshinikanutanruna. Wane chinru wa jeji giprigamyotachri, “Pyotunotanu. Ganikaji ptunwatanu.”
Giyagni yotunomtatka. Ganikaji tunwata. 
9Giyagni Geso wane chinna, “Nepomgangi, ¿girni wa gapnanutikalurgogne muklukanutu kamrutkalurupa, waka kiglerge waka gektutlege? ¿Gognetkaklurge giweklu waka giylalu?”
 
10Geso geknokyegitna pejnuruneko. Wane chinru, “Pomyokanu.” Wane rixa. Ruglewamyotatka. 
11Seprolokpotutatkana. Yanumsayegkakna wannakakluko gi rixpokotanruna Geso.
 
12Wane rixatka walegognekaka. Magka ya. Ragjigognetapa. Psolu yechnoko ruynumatlu Goyakalu. 
13Gogi rixinitka, tomgana yimaklene. Tsomitna pamole gepi wanna. Yokanatanune chinkoxna. 
14Wa Simo. Wale rutakgiwakata Petro. Ga wa repuru Gantirishi, ga wa Santiyako, ga wa Gwa, ga wa Wilipi, ga wa Wartolo. 
15Ga wa Matiyo, ga wa Tomasu, ga wa Santiyako, Galgweyo wgene, ga wa Simo wa Muchkopiranawatachri chinkaluru. 
16Ga wa Gota, Santiyako wgene. Ga wa Gota Giskaryote. Walenwa samyokjerupa.
 
17Wannayma yopikatka. Wa gimta chiji rawna ga wa gixolune yimaklene ga wa gixolune potu yine, psoluko Gotesreta gajene, ga wa Gerosale gajene, ga wa tsru wenustsi Tiro ga wa Sitosreta gajene. 
18Runna yijnakotyapluna, ga wa ragijewnalna rutuukakikolupna. Ga wa kamchine puchotlewatachine kojwakanunena gituukaakalunetkani.
